title: 1 'Mochenu Omochenu
markdown:
### 1 'Mochenu Omochenu   

  **1.**   
'Mochenu Omochenu or' Omonguru,   
Ekero bogokia tokobake Aye;   
'Mochenu 'Monyamabera bw'echinguru,   
Nay'omogambi kare na kare.

  **2.**   
'Mochenu malaika bagosasima,   
Babek' egutw'as'enyancha y'ekerore;   
'Megand' emeganda bakogosasima,   
Naye oreo kare na kare.   
    
3   
'Mochenu nony'omosunt'ogontuba,   
Nonya titokoror'obonene bwao;   
Nay'or' omochenu kobua bonsi,   
'S'obwanchani, 'nguru n'obochenu.

title: 2 Tobake Nyasae
markdown:
### 2 Tobake Nyasae   

  **1.**   
Tobake Nyasae, As'Omwan' Omwanchwa,   
Ase Yes'okwete bon'ore Igoro.   
 Haleluya tokobake, Haleluy'abe bo;   
Haleluya tokobake, toboki emioyo.

  **2.**   
Tobake Nyasae, As'omoik Omuya;   
Otworokirie Yeso Omotoria.

  **3.**   
'Gotogigw'ase, 'Manw'eria yakwete;   
Kabogorl' ebibe na gotosibia.

  **4.**   
Atogigw'ere Nyasae bw'obuya;   
Oy'otogorire na gotoraa.

  **5.**   
Toboki'emioyo, toichori' Obwanchani;   
Morero lgoro okune chinkoro.

title: 3 Motogie Tat'Okorir' Amanene
markdown:
### 3 Motogie Tat'Okorir' Amanene   

  **1.**   
Motogie Tat'okorir' amanene,   
Agancha'ens agato' Omwan'oye,   
Akerua gokwa atosibi' ebibe,   
Oyoranche anyore Obogima.   
 Mobake 'Monene, Ense emoigwe,   
Mobake 'Monene, Abanto bagoke;   
Inchwo ase Tata Yes'abarete,   
Momotogie okorir' amanene.

  **2.**   
Okoborigwa ogoikeranu,   
oyobwanchire nare na eira   
Mosari'onde bwensi oramwegene,   
Kegim'ere nanyore okwaberwa.

  **3.**   
Okorire na kwegeri'amanene,   
Twagokire ime y'Omwana Yeso,   
Nkob'ogokumia 'bochenu, 'bonene,   
Tomoroche gator'as' orogendo.

title: 4 Togi' Okobua Kwa Yeso
markdown:
### 4 Togi' Okobua Kwa Yeso   

  **1.**   
Togi'okobua kwa Yeso   
Malaika sasima,   
Ret'egutwa y'obogambi,   
mobekere Yeso;   
Ret'egutwa y'obogambi,   
mobekere Yeso.

  **2.**   
'Nw'abachore b'Omonene,   
mwaborigwe nere,   
Moiogi'Oyobatotitie   
As'Obuya bwaye;   
Motogi'Oyobatoririe'   
As'Obuya bwaye.

  **3.**   
Na inwe abanto bonsi   
mor' ase ense eye,   
'Howse hwonsi nobwaye,   
mobeker'egutwa;   
'Bonene hwonsi nobwaye,   
mobeker'egutwa.

  **4.**   
Amo n'omoganda'gigoro,   
Natomosasime,   
Ntosange am'ogotera,   
Komoa 'bonene;   
Ntosange am'ogotera,   
Komoa 'bonene.

title: 5 'Ba Igoro Mosasim' Omogambi
markdown:
### 5 'Ba Igoro Mosasim' Omogambi   

  **1.**   
Aba Igoro sasim' Omogambi,   
Tera Obwanchani bw'ogokumia;   
Enguba Embingwa nere botambe.   
Y'oichire n'obuya n'ogotogigwa.

  **2.**   
Ter'obobui n'obuya bwaye,   
Ere bwenisetie Oborabu;   
'Ndamwamu yaye yareta rirumbe,   
Nabuet'obotindi bwemerindo.

  **3.**   
Borendi bwao mbogokwaneka,   
Bwarosi'embeo bwarabi'omobaso;   
Bwaika korw'ebitunwa gochi'omweya,   
Bwatoerer'ase rime n'embura.

  **4.**   
Ntw'ab'eriroba ntor'abareu,   
Twagosemeri'aye n'omobui;   
'Maber'ao y'obworor'a botambe,   
'Motongi, Omoboria, n'Omosani'oito.

title: 6 Tata Twagochera
7 Nyasaye 'Motoria Oito
markdown:
### 7 Nyasaye 'Motoria Oito   

  **1.**   
Nyasae 'Motoria oito,   
Korw'emiaka yonsi;   
Ekiriri'as'emechando,   
Enka ya botambe.

  **2.**   
Inse y'ekiriri kiao,   
natomenye buya;   
'Koboko kwao ngoisaine   
gotorenda twensi.

  **3.**   
Otaratonga ens'eye,   
Tikiarenge gento;   
Nyasae kwareo nay'   
orab'emiaka yonsi.

  **4.**   
'Biare elfu 's'ore   
bing'e mogorob'eyemo;   
'Bieng'e bun'ensa ya mambia   
Ko bogokiamoka.

  **5.**   
Nyasae 'Motoria oito,   
As'emiak'egocha;   
Torae gatore moyo,   
'S'enka ya Igoro.

title: 8 'Gw' Ekerero Nyoroki' Amabera
markdown:
### 8 'Gw' Ekerero Nyoroki' Amabera   

  **1.**   
'Gw' ekerero nyoroki'amabera   
Omotoria inchuo;   
Moy'orosire nkogania oche   
Omotoria inchuo.   
 Natarire ense eye embe,   
Natarir'are korwa nka,   
Nyoyi'ong'iranie ase obweri,   
Omotoria inchuo.

  **2.**   
Tindi n'ase ndebise botuko   
Omotoria inchuo;   
Nay'obogim'okong'omobaso   
Omotoria inchuo.

  **3.**   
Inche bweka narosir'enchera,   
Omotoria inchuo;   
Narora omosasoko as'ore,   
Omotoria inchuo.

  **4.**   
Tori kwanga Omoyo bwerure,   
Omotoria inchuo;   
'Gwa'gosaba n'okorera kwane,   
Omotoria inchuo.

title: 9 Omotongi One
markdown:
### 9 Omotongi One   

  **1.**   
Omotongi one,   
bionsi pi nebiao;   
Naye bweka kwabing'ete   
Nay'ogonsesenia,   
Naye bweka kwabing'ete   
Nay'ogonsesenia.

  **2.**   
Egetongwa kiao,   
Ing'a obogima,   
Nyasae one ngotogie   
omoy'ogotogie,   
Nyasae one ngotogie   
omoy'ogotogie.

  **3.**   
Ninki ndakoe ko   
bionsi bir'ebiao,   
Nkeri keegwa keraisan   
'obwanchani bwao,   
Nkeri keegwa keraisan   
'obwanchani bwao.

  **4.**   
'Buya bwao bombeke   
'nguru chia' igoro,   
Kera ring'ana n'okogania   
bib'ebiao pi,   
Kera ring'ana n'okogania   
bib'ebiao pi.

title: 10 Nchw' Ensoko
markdown:
### 10 Nchw' Ensoko   

  **1.**   
Nchw' Ensoko ya Ker'egesio,   
Ninter'obuya bwao,   
Maber'amang'ataere,   
Agere tokobake.   
Nyegerie kogosasima,   
Nyorok'obuya bwao,   
'Gosemeria Kw'Obonene,   
Nkor'eichorw'obwanchani.

  **2.**   
Nateneniri 'Ebenesa*,   
kwandendire goik'aa,   
Nasemeirie as'obuya   
bwao ning'ike inka,   
Yes'akandigi'omosiru,   
Konareng'are nere,   
Gonkonya korw'emechando,   
Gaiter'amanying'aye.

  **3.**   
Botambe nd'omonyasira   
's'obuya bwa Nyasae,   
'Buya buna chingatare   
bombwaterani' as'ore.   
Mbetereirie ntayaye   
ntige Nyasae nyanchete,   
Ir'enkoro yane tata   
yegach'agwo igoro.

title: 11 Yes 'Omonyaira
markdown:
### 11 Yes 'Omonyaira   

  **1.**   
Yes' omonyaira, nonya nabake   
Bachire gosaba, nobe aroro;   
Twanchire ring'ana togosasime,   
Yeso tosesenie, natokorore.   
 Yeso tosesenie, nao toraa;   
Inchuo tosesenie, mono botambe.

  **2.**   
Nkwabete na intwe korw'agwo kare,   
Ko ntokoganetie goika oche;   
Inchuo Omoboria, toe obuya,   
Toigwe otwanche, otosesenie.

  **3.**   
Yeso otokonye, natogotogie,   
Totere as'ore, igw' ogosaba;   
Buna togosaba, erio twegene,   
Erio tosemerie, twanche kobua.

title: 12 'Mariogi Onsi Tig 'Atare
markdown:
### 12 'Mariogi Onsi Tig 'Atare   

  **1.**   
Mariogi onsi tigatere,   
'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;   
'Kobakwa kwa Nyasae oito,   
'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya.   
 Rieta rigiya, 'Rieta rigiya,   
Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;   
Rieta rigiya, 'Rieta rigiya,   
Rieta ria Yeso rigiya

  **2.**   
Nigo rikorusi 'obwoba,   
'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;   
'Monyene ebib' amwanche,   
'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya.

  **3.**   
Riasaria nguru chi'ebibe,   
'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya;   
Amanyinga yogosibia,   
'Rieta ria Yeso rigiya.

title: 13 Baka Tat' Ogesesenia
markdown:
### 13 Baka Tat' Ogesesenia 

 Baka Nyasae 'Mosesenia,   
Bitongwa bi'ense mobake,   
Mogand' o Igoro mobake,   
Tata, Omwana n'Omoika.   
Amen.

title: 14 Nyasae Nintare N' Aye
15 Kwana N'enkoro Yane
16 Ninkoganeti' Omonene!
markdown:
### 16 Ninkoganeti' Omonene!   

  **1.**   
Ninkoganeti' Omonene!   
Igo inde n'ebibe;   
Mbwate okoboko ndae,   
Erio nyare korora.   
 Botambe, botambe,   
Ninkoganeti' Omonene!   
Botambe, botambe,   
Omotoria ondende.

  **2.**   
Mbekere oboitongo,   
Ebibe biambuire;   
Nyoroki' oboreu bwane,   
Ing'a chinguru chiao.

  **3.**   
Tinkoiroka as'ore,   
aye nondae buya;   
Tara na inch' Omotoria,   
Nay' obogima bwane.

  **4.**   
Kende gionsi nagechicha,   
'Mogoko n'obororo;   
Omoyo nobe as'ore,   
Naye orantimokie.

title: 17 N'Yeso Tai Nche
markdown:
### 17 N'Yeso Tai Nche   

  **1.**   
N'Yeso, tai nche, Kristo,   
Anchwe naend' asikwe;   
N'Yeso, tai nche,   
'Manywe, aigweke,   
N'Yeso, tai nche,   
As' ebikorwa bionsi   
N'Yeso, tai nche,   
's'ebirengererio.

  **2.**   
N'Yeso tai nche,   
Aremi' as'obororo;   
N'Yeso tai nche,   
Atinyi'amariga,   
N'Yeso tai nche,   
Aimokie egurube,   
N'Yeso tai nche,   
Aserie obwoba.

  **3.**   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Tinkwana ayar'amabe;   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Tintera amabe   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Tinyeimokia igoro,   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Tinyetang'ania inche.

  **4.**   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Ner' 'okong'isanekia,   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Obogima bwane,   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
Mobere nomoy'one,   
N'Kristo, bweka,   
'Ns'eye na Igoro.

title: 18 Omotoria Torae Ntwe
markdown:
### 18 Omotoria Torae Ntwe   

  **1.**   
Omotoria torae ntwe,   
otorende kegima;   
Toe 'ndagera engiya,   
Tobe riicho riao.   
 Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,   
Aye gwatogorire;   
Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,   
Aye gwatogorire.

  **2.**   
Intwe naba' omosani,   
Totang'ane enchera;   
Torende riicho riao,   
Torigie titosira.   
 Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,   
Toigwe ogosaba;   
Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,   
Toigwe ogosaba.

  **3.**   
Kwarire eira twanche,   
Natoba abasaria;   
Nonyare gotwabera ntwe,   
tosibie n'amanyinga;   
 Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,   
Natokoiranere;   
Yes' omuya, Yes' omuya,   
Natokoiranere.

title: 19 Mosalab' Omotori' Agakwa
markdown:
### 19 Mosalab' Omotori' Agakwa   

  **1.**   
'Mosalab' Omotori' agakwa,   
'Gwo nkarera nsibigw'ebibe,   
'Manying'ay' agansibi 'enkoro,   
moe 'bonene.   
 Moe 'bonene, 'Moe 'bonene,   
Manying'ay' agansibi'enkoro,   
Moe 'bonene.

  **2.**   
Nchera y'ogokumi' antoririe,   
Yes'omenyete ime yane,   
Agw'omosalab'ombogoirie   
'moe bonene.

  **3.**   
Ensok'engiya y'ogotoria,   
nagokire gosoa ime,   
Yeso antoria na gonchena,   
moe 'bonene.

  **4.**   
Nchwo 's'ensok'entenenk' engiya,   
karu'enkoro ya' eyi'entaka   
Soa 'me rer'oikeranigwe   
'moe bonene.

title: 20 Nyasae Oito Negetare
markdown:
### 20 Nyasae Oito Negetare   

  **1.**   
Nyasae oito, negetare,   
'Botamero emechando,   
'Gokonyeka kore ang'e,   
Emechando ende yonsi.   
 'Getare gototimokia,   
'Kiriri gokenderera,   
'Morai as'orogendo,   
'Botamero emechando.

  **2.**   
Botuko, mobaso nere,   
'Botamero emechando,   
Igo titokoiroka,   
Ekiagera are naintwe.

  **3.**   
'Mechand' ende netonyora,   
'Botamero emechando,   
Twamanyire nomorendi,   
Oyore ang'e botambe.

  **4.**   
Nyasae negekengano,   
'Botamero emechando,   
Amatuk' onsi norwaki,   
Oyore ang'e botambe.

title: 21 Ngwekane Buna Yeso
markdown:
### 21 Ngwekane Buna Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ngwekane buna Yeso;   
Amenye ime yane,   
Ng'ichorie obwanchani,   
Nindabe omwororo,   
Ngwekane buna Yeso,   
kangotara as'ense,   
Mbe n'omoika oye,   
'Monene nchwo ase nde.

  **2.**   
Gakoigwa chinyoni,   
Nagochirenda buya,   
Nanyigwe ekerero,   
n'ogochandeka kwane;   
Nanyorokie boronge,   
Anyabere 'komocha,   
Nchenek' enkoro yane   
'Monene nchwo ase nde.

  **3.**   
Ngwekane buna Yeso;   
Amatuko onsi pi,   
Nintimoke as'are,   
Ninyw' amache amaya;   
Nimbe n'obuya bwaye,   
Nyor' obwanchani bwaye,   
Ninyegene kegima   
'Monene nchwo ase nde.

title: 22 Tong'etani' Omotori' One
markdown:
### 22 Tong'etani' Omotori' One   

  **1.**   
Tong'etani' Omotori' one,   
'Gwa kangosaba;   
Gokorangeria abande,   
Takong'etania.   
 Yeso, Yeso,   
'Gwa kangosaba;   
Gokorangeria abande,   
Takong'etania.

  **2.**   
'S'ekerogo ki'amabera,   
Ntimokereo;   
Ntung'ame as' oboitongo,   
Nkonye nyegene.

  **3.**   
Nsemereti' Obuya bwao;   
Nkoror' Obosio;   
Ngweni' omoy'osaregete,   
Ntori' as' obuya.

  **4.**   
Naye ore omoremia,   
Kobua bionsi;   
Kai ar'oyomoreng'aine,   
Nse nonyaigoro.

title: 23 Ngwanchete
markdown:
### 23 Ngwanchete   

  **1.**   
Ngwanchete, Ngwanchete,   
Ngwanchet' Omonda,   
Ngwanchet' Omotoria,   
Ngwanchete Nyasae.   
Ngwanchete, Ngwanchete,   
kwamanyir' Aye,   
Bikorwa biorokie,   
buna Ngwanchete.

  **2.**   
Ngogete, Ngogete,   
Mono kobua,   
Ntenen' egetunwa,   
ngoke botambe   
Nyerore enibo,   
agwo ndamenye,   
Yeso, malaika,   
n'abaya bonsi.

  **3.**   
Yes' Omotori'one,   
'R'ogotoreka;   
Bogima, mogoko,   
n'ogotimoka;   
Ndiatore erieta,   
nter' obwanchani;   
Buya bwao bokune   
bogima bwane

  **4.**   
Ning'o ogwekaine,   
'Mogamb' omuya;   
Anyancha, nsasoka,   
Ang'ogotera;   
Mobake mobake,   
goter'okuya;   
'Ndoche chi'omogoko,   
Enkor' etere.

title: 24 O Yes' Omobori' One
markdown:
### 24 O Yes' Omobori' One   

  **1.**   
O Yes' Omobori' one,   
'Mogok' ogotera,   
'Motori' omosasoko,   
'Kero nchandegete.   
 O Yes' Omobori' one,   
Ninkobake aye,   
Mosani onde tari,   
Bw' amatuko onsi.

  **2.**   
Nay'ore okoremia,   
As' emiaka yonsi,   
Mosunte korantube,   
'Marig' agotonya!

  **3.**   
Ninkwegen' Omotoria,   
Mosani Omorai,   
Naki aye nomuya,   
Kobua bonsi pi.

  **4.**   
Nintere nomogoko,   
Kond' ense y'ebibe,   
Nintere n'omogoko,   
Bisieri bia Igoro.

title: 25 Naye Obogima Bwane
markdown:
### 25 Naye Obogima Bwane   

  **1.**   
Naye obogima bwane,   
bobuet' obwenseye,   
Orogendo rwane nseye,   
'Motoria ntare naye.   
 Mbe naye, mbe naye,   
mbe naye, mbe naye   
Orogendo rwan' enseye,   
'Motoria ntare naye.

  **2.**   
Tari mogoko ngosaba,   
tindigeti obonene,   
'Meremo as'emechando,   
bwanche intare naye.   
 Mbe naye, mbe naye,   
mbe naye, mbe naye   
Meremo as'emechando,   
bwanche intare naye.

  **3.**   
Ntang'ane ime yomosunte,   
'Nyimokie erio mbue,   
Omonene nsoe naye   
'bogima botaere.   
 Mbe naye, mbe naye,   
mbe naye mbe naye,   
Omonene nsoe naye   
'bogima botaere.

title: 26 Chimeme Chionsi Chitere
markdown:
### 26 Chimeme Chionsi Chitere   

  **1.**   
Chimeme chionsi chitere;   
Kobak'Omoboria!   
Kobak'Omoboria!   
'Buya bwa Nyasa'Erwoti;   
(Bobui bw'obuya)   
Bobui bw'obuya   
Bobui bw'obuya,   
Bobui bw'obuya.

  **2.**   
Omonene Nyasa'one;   
Onkony'erio ndarie!   
Onkony'erio ndarie!   
Ndari'Erieta riao ense;   
('Bonene bw'Erieta,)   
Bonene bw'Erieta   
Bonene bw'Erieta,   
Bonene bw'Erieta.

  **3.**   
Yeso n'Erieta ri'obobui;   
Riseria obwoba!   
Riseri'Omoichano!   
Goter' as'Omonyabibe;   
('Bogim'omorembe)   
'Bogim'omorembe   
'Bogim'omorembe   
'Bogim'omorembe

  **4.**   
Abuna 'nguru chi'ebibe;   
'Sibor'omosibwa!   
sibor'omosibwa!   
Manying' ay'asibi' ababe;   
(Nainche nansibie bo)   
Nainche nansibie bo,   
Nainche nansibie bo,   
Nainche nansibie bo.

title: 27 Ning'ore?
markdown:
### 27 Ning'ore?   

  **1.**   
Ning'ore ngu'mbu bweri   
'Barasia basasima?   
 N'Omotoria bw'ogokumia,   
N'Omogambi bw'obonene   
Togw' as'amagor' aye   
Kae Yes' obogambi.

  **2.**   
Ning'or' emechand' ime   
Kweng'ata as'eroro?

  **3.**   
Ning'o gosesenigwa   
'Samang'an' obwororo?

  **4.**   
Ning'o bakoretera   
'Barwaire nebirema?

  **5.**   
Ng'o 'teneine korera   
'S' embera ya Lazaro?

  **6.**   
Ning' oyio emeganda   
'Gokwania nobobui?

  **7.**   
Ning'o botuko gati   
Gosaba Gethsemane?

  **8.**   
Ng'o ng'umb' omote goro   
'Gokwa as'obororo?

  **9.**   
Ning'o 'yio korw' embera   
Gocha gotori' abanto?

  **10.**   
Ng'o korw' as'ekerogo   
'Kogamba chinse chionsi?

title: 28 'Rieta Ria Yeso Rigiya
markdown:
### 28 'Rieta Ria Yeso Rigiya   

  **1.**   
Rieta 'giya 'goro n'ense   
nkoro yan'emanyete   
Nyasae Tata aruete   
As'Omwana Omwanchwa.   
 Richenu kobua rire riororo;   
Riarwete as'omonwa O Tata,   
'Karetwa n'abamalaika botuko;   
Rieta rigiya ria Yeso.

  **2.**   
Risesenia im' enkoro,   
Ninditogie kobua,   
Nindiatore as'abanto,   
Mbwatore buya bwaye.

  **3.**   
Nintere mbotogi' obwanchani,   
Bwaye bw'ogotoria,   
Ntogi' Eriet'erio botambe,   
Riyabuete onsi.

title: 29 Yes' Omwanchi Omorisi 'One
markdown:
### 29 Yes' Omwanchi Omorisi 'One   

  **1.**   
Yes' omwanchi Omorisi' one'   
Obuya botareme   
Tinkonyara koremerwa   
Nare nainche botambe.

  **2.**   
Ngatig'enchera ngasira   
'Kandigia nobwanchani   
Kanyimoki' as 'egekuba   
Kang'ira nka ngogete.

  **3.**   
As'amache y'obogima   
Ondendire botambe   
Ondisirie Ondendire   
Yes' Omorisi' Omuya.

  **4.**   
Amakweri tinkwoboa   
'Kero Yes'are nainche   
Onkiriri' ontenenirie   
Nere ogontang'ana.

  **5.**   
Ong'ariganeiri' emesa   
Onkoreir'ekeng'wanso   
Ongokiri' as'endagera   
'Manying'ay' ansibirie.

  **6.**   
'S'amatuko y'obogima   
Gonsesenia botambe   
Omorisia ninkobake   
Nyomba mwao botambe.

title: 30 Nter' Obwanchani Bwa Nyasae
markdown:
### 30 Nter' Obwanchani Bwa Nyasae   

  **1.**   
Nter' obwanchani bwa Nyasae,   
'Moik' oy' omeny' ase nde   
Goichan' ogokor' omogoko,   
Nyaber' ebibe biane.   
'Mosunte noba omonene,   
otebire nabe nainche   
'Ng' oborabu 's' ekiriri,   
'Kieni ribaga rie ribu.   
 Ongokirie (ongokirie)   
as' obororo ('s'obororo)   
'Ng' obwanchani ('ng'obwanchani)   
nseri' obwoba (nseri' obwoba)   
'Ng'a Borabu 's' ekiriri,   
Kieni ribaga rie ribu.

  **2.**   
Nter' obwanchani bw'Omotoria,   
'chandeget' as' omote   
'Bobisi bw'okoba kwaye oo,   
Nche mbe omosibore   
'Gacha gotori' abanyaibibe,   
Chinkoro echi chiarosire   
'Ng'a 'mogoko 's'okweumia,   
Kieni ribaga rie ribu.

  **3.**   
Nintere obuya bw'enchili,   
Ekoreta obuya   
'Kong'a mogoko n'oborabu,   
And' onsi ase ndabe   
'Mboyi' eyanga y'omogok' oye,   
Kero nde nobwob' obonge   
Bong'a borabu, kiriri,   
Kieni ribaga rie ribu.

title: 31 'Binto Biakobak' Aye
markdown:
### 31 'Binto Biakobak' Aye    

  **1.**   
'Binto biakobak' Aye;   
'Goro, n'ense, n'enyancha   
Bionsi kwabitongete,   
Bikorari' Omonene   
Bionsi bigosasime;   
'Monene tokobake.

  **2.**   
Bikobaka botuko   
Bitera bokiriru;   
Bikobaka mobaso   
Biatora 'nguru chiao;   
Chinsa n'ense mobake   
'Monene tokobake.

  **3.**   
Bikobaka bionsi pi   
'Mbura, mokobinyongo   
'Mogoroba, amare   
Chindoche, n'emerindo   
'Nsakia, bokendu; bionsi   
'Monene togotogie.

  **4.**   
Bionsi bikobak' Aye   
Omotongi, Ring'ana   
Omoik'oyoreo   
Twatung'amir' as'ore   
Tokoe nkoro chiaito   
'Monene; tokobake.

title: 32 Mbe N'Obosera Bwa Yeso
markdown:
### 32 Mbe N'Obosera Bwa Yeso   

  **1.**   
Mbe n'obosera bwa Yeso ime yane,   
'Mabera n'obochenu bwaye bwonsi;   
Omoik' Omochenu Anchene kegima,   
Goika Yes'arorekane ime yane.

  **2.**   
Mbe nobosera bwa Yeso ime yane,   
'Buya bwaye bororekan' asende;   
Tig'amang'an' ane Nebikorwa biane,   
Bioroki' obosera bwaye Yeso.

  **3.**   
'Ker'orogendo rwane rwaerire,   
Ntare na Yeso botamb' as'obuya;   
Nkoimokigwa igoro 'S'enka y'omorembe,   
Neb' omogok'one komenya Nere.

title: 33 Tata Tosibore Bono
markdown:
### 33 Tata Tosibore Bono   

  **1.**   
Tata tosibore bono,   
N'ogwanchera okuya   
Toe omogoko oo,   
Torusie ebibe pi   
Toe gwancha, Toe gwancha   
Gatokogend' ens' eye.

  **2.**   
Twagokire rero mono,   
As' amang'ana ao;   
Togwanch' ogochika kwao,   
Natogoke botambe   
Natoteme natoteme   
Kogotokonya aye.

  **3.**   
Gatokogenda ens'eye,   
mbuya togokorere   
Gatogotunya enchera,   
Totokona tatiga   
Obe ang'e, obe ang'e   
Goika Oirane.

title: 34 Motoria Twabak'Erieta Riao
markdown:
### 34 Motoria Twabak'Erieta Riao   

  **1.**   
Motoria twabak'erieta riao,   
As'ogotera kw'ogotigana;   
Gatwakorire ogosasima,   
Twatung'ama kogany'omorembe.

  **2.**   
Toe 'morembe gatokogenda,   
Twachaka twakora ituko naye;   
Rend'emenwa n'enchinkoro chiaito,   
Abwo bagwatoir'as'enyomb'eye

  **3.**   
Toe' morembe gator'ens' eye,   
Riog' as 'obororo n'amatemwa;   
Ker'orachik'esegi eere,   
Toe 'moremb' okare na kare.

title: 35 Ira Erieta Ria Yeso
markdown:
### 35 Ira Erieta Ria Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ira erieta ria Yeso,   
Oyore n'obororo;   
Rikoreter' omogoko,   
Rirarie ande onsi.   
 Erieta....... Rigiya.......   
Mogok'ense na'goro,   
(Erieta) (Rigiya)   
Erieta....... Rigiya.......   
Mogok'ense na'goro.   
(Erieta) (Rigiya)

  **2.**   
Ira erieta ria Yeso,   
Ribe buna enguba;   
Goetanan' amatemwa,   
sab' Erieta richenu.

  **3.**   
'Rieta rigiya ria Yeso,   
Rikoremia chinkoro;   
Atoimokie n'amaboko,   
N'amatera motogie.

  **4.**   
Orogendo rokoera,   
Twekanye gosasima;   
Tomobekere egutwa,   
Mogambi bwa'bagambi.

title: 36 Yeso Nagwanchire Aye Noyone
37 Yes' Omwanchi Omoy'one
markdown:
### 37 Yes' Omwanchi Omoy'one   

  **1.**   
Yes' omwanchi omoy'one, Ancha menye as'ore,   
Merindo nemenene, nomwaga nomotindi.   
Nyebise Omotoria, Goik' emechando eere,   
Rokoer' orogendo As'aya Kristo ng'ira.

  **2.**   
Tindi n'ogokonyeka, Tig' aye Omonene;   
Tontiga inche bweka, obe ang'e botambe,   
Negenire as'ore, Nyor'ogokony' as'ore   
Otube omotw'one, Na orobaba rwao.

  **3.**   
Kwang'isanire aye, Nas'ore bire bionsi   
Abororo n'ababe, Nkobakony' ore bonsi   
Omuy' ore Nyasae, Inche tindi n'obuya   
Oyore n'obochenu, Nabwatirwe n'obobe.

  **4.**   
'Buy'obonge nas'ore, korusi' ebibe bionsi   
As'amache amaya, Norigetie onsibie   
Kwabeire ase tore, Ensoko y'obogima   
Obe ime asende, Emiaka na emiaka.

title: 38 Nintere Obwanchani
markdown:
### 38 Nintere Obwanchani   

  **1.**   
Nintere obwanchani,   
Motoria, Onyanchete,   
Agacha, gokwer'ense,   
S'omot' o Kalwari.   
 Nintere (Nintere) obwanchani   
Mogoko (Mogoko), as' omoyo   
Agakwa (agakwa) imbe moyo,   
Nter' obwanchani bwaye.

  **2.**   
'Mariga 'Omonene   
'gaiteka 'ngencho yane;   
Ng'inyore Ogosaba,   
Ere nanyanchete.

  **3.**   
Bwanchani bwaye   
'bonge Ense tekobomanya;   
Ebibe bun' ebiane,   
Mbirabe kegima.

  **4.**   
Tindarua kend' ekiya,   
Okang'a Obwanchani;   
'Moy'one ob'as'ore,   
Ng'orokie obwanchani.

title: 39 Ninde N'ogoter' Okuya
markdown:
### 39 Ninde N'ogoter' Okuya   

  **1.**   
Ninde n'ogoter'okuya,   
Naki naborigwe;   
N' Omotoria one Yeso,   
Naki naborigwe.   
 Naki naborigwe,   
Naki naborigwe;   
Ntogie erieta riaye,   
Naki naborigwe   
Nintogi' Erieta ri'Omotoria.

  **2.**   
Kristo ner' ong'isanire,   
Naki naborigwe;   
Nkore buna arigetie,   
Naki naborigwe.

  **3.**   
Ninde na kirori omuya,   
Naki naborigwe;   
Oyogoseria obwoba,   
Naki naborigwe.

  **4.**   
Naroserigwe omochie,   
Naki naborigwe;   
Ase ndamenye botambe,   
Naki naborigwe.

title: 40 'Karar' As 'Embera
markdown:
### 40 'Karar' As 'Embera   

  **1.**   
'Karar' as' embera,   
Yes' Omotoria;   
Kaganya Koboka,   
'Monen' one.   
 Kaboka korw' embera,   
Nobobui as' omobisa   
Akabok' akabua omosunte   
Amenyete n'abachenu kogamba   
Kaboka, kaboka, Alleluy' akaboka.

  **2.**   
Bakarend' embera,   
Yes' Omotoria;   
Bakarenda bosa,   
Monen' one.

  **3.**   
Tabuetwe nogokwa,   
Yes' Omotoria;   
Kabu' ebisibo,   
Monen' one.

title: 41 'Se Kalvari
markdown:
### 41 'Se Kalvari   

  **1.**   
'Se Kalvari yes'agakwa,   
'Monen'one akabambwa;   
'S'amanying'ay' akangora,   
Erio nyore amabera.   
 O Kalvari y'omosunte,   
Ase Yeso ankwerete; (inche)   
O Kalvari 'sesenirie!   
Nao 'Motori'ankwerete.

  **2.**   
'Bitare bigatandoka,   
'Rioba rikab'omosunte;   
'Getambaa gotandoka   
bikarag'ogotoreka.

  **3.**   
'Monen'one naki yare,   
Ay'okang'a obogima;   
'Kabogori' omosalaba,   
N'oboror'aria Kalwari.

title: 42 'Gwancha Tikogokwaneka
markdown:
### 42 'Gwancha Tikogokwaneka   

  **1.**   
Bwanchani Yes'anyanchete,   
Agankwer'omosalaba;   
Erio nyaberwe ebibe,   
Tibogokwaneka.   
 Bwanchani mbogokwaneka   
(Gokwaneka),   
Bwanachani mbogokwaneka   
(Gokwaneka);   
Bwanchani Yes'anyanchete,   
Tibogokwaneka.

  **2.**   
Boror' obong'anyorete,   
Gatwekw'engata y'amagwa;   
Erio mbe moyo botambe,   
Tibogokwaneka.

  **3.**   
Morembe mbwate as'Are,   
Ansororera Nyasae;   
Bobui as'amanying'aye,   
Tibogokwaneka.

  **4.**   
Mogoko mbwate Kar'ang'e,   
Ko ndaire tindi kwoboa;   
Gosemeria mbwate as'are,   
Tikogokwaneka.

title: 43 Ntebi' Amang'ana A Yeso
markdown:
### 43 Ntebi' Amang'ana A Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ntebi' amangana a Yeso,   
Mbeke onsi omoyo   
Nyorokereria boronge,   
Maya abuete onsi   
Ntebie bun' Amalaika,   
Baterete kaiborwa   
"Obonen' ase Nyasae,   
'Moremb' obuy'as'ense".   
 Ntebi' emeremo ya Yeso,   
Mbeke onsi enkoro   
Nyorokereria boronge,   
Maya abuete onsi.

  **2.**   
'Keng'ata bweka eroro,   
Ntebi'engak' akorete   
'S'ebibe biait' agatemwa,   
Omoeri'akabua   
Ntebi' engaki y'emeremo,   
N'oboror'anyorete   
Achayetwe nagochandwa,   
'Motak' otari n'enka.

  **3.**   
Ntebie ase abambetwe,   
Akaba n'obororo   
Ntebi' ember' atindegetwe,   
Ntebie bun'are moyo   
'Bwanchani 'S'mang'an' ayio,   
Bore maiso marore   
Karakira ndararera,   
'Bwanchani bwamboririe.

title: 44 Naborigwe, Naki Ndararie!
markdown:
### 44 Naborigwe, Naki Ndararie!   

  **1.**   
Naborigwe naki ndararie!   
As'amanyinga y'engondi   
Koborigw' as' amaber' aye,   
Nabeir' omwan'oye bori.   
 Koborigwa!   
As'amanyinga y'eng'ondi   
Koborigwa!   
Nabeir'omwan' oye bori.

  **2.**   
Koborigwa ngok' ase Yeso,   
Kobua buna ndakwane   
Oborabu bw'okoba kwaye,   
Nabomenye nainche bori.

  **3.**   
Ndengereri' Omoboria one,   
Morengererie botambe   
Nter' ekiagera tingokira,   
Eganga neb'obwanchani.

  **4.**   
Nindore as' obuya bwaye,   
'ngokiri' as'amachik' aye   
'Yokondenda ker' ase ndabe,   
kong' amatera botuko.

  **5.**   
Inche nagacheirwe egutwa,   
Yabekirwe ang'e igoro   
'Kero toraikeranigwe,   
Erio as'are nimbeo.

title: 45 E Rituko Riomogoko
markdown:
### 45 E Rituko Riomogoko   

  **1.**   
E Rituko ri'omogoko,   
Nachoret' Omotori' one   
Tig'enkoro yan'echenge,   
Nakorari' obuya'onsi.   
 Rituko! mogoko!   
Kero Yeso ansibetie   
'Kanyegeria ogosaba,   
'Menye nomochengo rioka.   
Rituko! `mogoko!   
Kero Yeso ansibetie.

  **2.**   
Okobwatana kwabeire,   
Nche n'oyoye, ner'oyone   
Akang'usa nkamotunya,   
Nagokigwe komwatora

  **3.**   
Enkoro yane timoka,   
Ase obotoereru   
Gose torw' as' Omonene,   
Ere oyore n'obuya.

  **4.**   
'Gor'ekaigw' okobwatana,   
okoyia kera rituko   
Goik' omoerio nyekanye,   
Goseseni' okobwatana.

  **5.**   
'Ker'omoganda o Igoro,   
Gotirimboka goch'ense   
Eri Omonen'atenene,   
'Gambe nk'engiya botambe.

title: 46 Nkoro Nere N'Omogoko
47 Yeso Omotoria Bethlehemu
markdown:
### 47 Yeso Omotoria Bethlehemu   

  **1.**   
Yes' Omotoria Bethlehemu,   
'S'obweri bw'ororo n'obosoku;   
Nakumirie buna antoririe,   
Agacha kondigia.   
Agatha kondigia,   
Agacha kondigia   
Nakumirie buna antoririe,   
Agacha kondigia.

  **2.**   
Yes' Omotoria ase Kalwari,   
Agaakan' esir' akamboria;   
Naichanire ng'aki yabete bo,   
Ere agankwera   
Ere agankwera,   
Ere agankwera   
Naichanire ng'aki yabete bo,   
Ere akandigia.

  **3.**   
Yes' Omotori' one korwa kare,   
'Kandigia konare gotayaya   
As' obwororo agansorora,   
Er' akandangeria   
Er' akandangeria,   
Er' akandangeria   
As' obwororo agansorora,   
Er' akandangeria.

  **4.**   
'Motori'one nache korw' Igoro,   
Bun'eira yaye egoteba   
O nimorore ere kagocha,   
Gochicha konyoyia   
Gochicha konyoyia,   
Gochicha konyoyia   
O nimorore ere kagocha,   
Gochicha konyoyia.

title: 48 Yeso Obeire Omosani
markdown:
### 48 Yeso Obeire Omosani   

  **1.**   
Yes' obeire omosani,   
Obogima bwonsi;   
Ombekire omokia pi,   
Nere onkonyire.   
Kondemeire arangokie,   
onde tari omobuete   
Chinsa chionsi arangokie,   
'Mosani.

  **2.**   
Yes' obeire Omosani,   
Ase emechando;   
Ning'end' as'are botambe,   
Korigia ebisio.   
'Mobaso bwonsi n'embura,   
Bikorabia endagera;   
'Mobas' oye, otomire,   
'Mosani.

  **3.**   
Yes' obeire Omosani,   
Tinkomotig' Ere;   
Naki ndamokanie bono,   
Gankonyire mono?   
Kondamotunyane Ere,   
Tingosira nonya ng'ake;   
Nimotunye, Kero gionsi,   
'Mosani.

  **4.**   
Yes' obeire omosani,   
Tindigeti onde;   
Okwegena okonene,   
'mwegene botambe.   
'Bogima buya as'are,   
'Bogima botakoera;   
Obogima natokoe,   
'Mosani.

title: 49 Ng'usa Ang'e N'enkoro Yao
50 'Motoria Bw'Ogokumia
markdown:
### 50 'Motoria Bw'Ogokumia   

  **1.**   
Kristo bwerur' ekeng'wanso,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
Twaborigw' orur' esira,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
 'Motoria bw'ogokumia   
nere Yeso one!   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia   
nere Yes' one!

  **2.**   
Nimobak' as' amanyinga,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
Ang'anchanetie na Nyasae,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!

  **3.**   
Agansibi' enkoro yane,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
Ner'okogamba korwa ime,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!

  **4.**   
Atara nainche botambe,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
Na gonkora omwegeni,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!

  **5.**   
Ang'a nguru chi'obobui,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
Erio nabua ker'ensa,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!

  **6.**   
Namoeir' enkoro yane,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!   
'Nse tekonyora getari,   
'Motoria bw'ogokumia!

title: 51 Nchiare Emerongo Kianda Na Kianda
markdown:
### 51 Nchiare Emerongo Kianda Na Kianda   

  **1.**   
Nchiare emerongo, kianda na kianda   
Chiaraire egora ime,   
Eyemo egasirer' ebitunwa   
Are are n'egeita gi'enka   
Are ase ebitunwa ebibe   
Teri ase omorisia omuya   
Teri ase omorisia omuya.

  **2.**   
"Monen' emerongo kianda na kianda   
Echio tichigoisaini"?   
'Morisi' akairania: Eyemo yane   
Yasirire korwa ase nde-   
Nonya enchera ere embe mono   
Ning'ende as'eroro koyerigia   
Ning'ende as'eroro koyerigia.

  **3.**   
'S' ababorigwa onde tamanyete   
Chindiba echi ambogete   
Gos' omosunte Yeso aetete   
Ataranyor' engondi yaye   
Ar' as' eroro akaigwa ekwana   
'Ndwair'etari kwenyar'er'ang'e gokwa   
'Ndwair'etari kwenyar'er'ange gokwa.

  **4.**   
"Monene ng'ai amanying'aya arwa,   
'Nyororoget' egetunwa?"   
'Nigo aitekeret' omosiru,   
'Morisi' ataramoirania'   
"Ninki giasionoir' amabok'ao"   
Nigo asionorwa n'amagw' amange   
Nigo asionorwa n'amagw' amange'.

  **5.**   
As 'ebitunwa chinkoba chigoaka,   
Korwa egetare 'goro   
'Riogi rikaigweka gochia igoro,   
'Goka nanyorire eng'ondi!   
Malaik' agater' as' ekerogo,   
"Monen' oiranirie egiasirete   
Monen' oiranirie egiasierete.

title: 52 Ar 'As' Egetunwa
markdown:
### 52 Ar 'As' Egetunwa   

  **1.**   
Ar' as' egetunwa   
nor' omosalaba,   
Bw' emechando n'obosoku;   
Naywanchir' Omote,   
S'omuy' Omosera,   
Gatokwer' abanyabibe.   
 Ngoker' omosalaba oria,   
bobui bwane mbeke inse   
Nintarer' omosalab' oria,   
Kaa nyoonchoreri' egutwa.

  **2.**   
Omosalab' oria,   
ochayire n'ense,   
Nore nomong'us' ase nde;   
Ng'ondi ya Nyasae,   
Gatig'obonene,   
Koyoira aria kalwari.

  **3.**   
'S' Omosalab' oria,   
Nimbe Omwegenwa,   
Nyimoki' obosoku bwaye,   
Erio nandangerie,   
gochia nka igoro,   
'Nsange obonene bwaye.

title: 53 Togi' Omonen' Omotoria
markdown:
### 53 Togi' Omonen' Omotoria   

  **1.**   
Togi 'Omonen' Omotoria,   
'Moik' atobwatanie,   
Gatobwatanirie 'go,   
tobe n'omoy'oyomo.

  **2.**   
'Tochikire tober'aa,   
Tob'abam' as' are,   
Erio totere gator'amo,   
Gochi' enchera 'goro.

  **3.**   
Abanchet'erieta riay   
'obaeir 'ebiegwa;   
Natworoki 'obuy'obonge,   
Gatwanchaine buya.

  **4.**   
Toigwanaine buy'as'ense,   
Togok'ase Yeso;   
Mogoko ki oyi'orabe,   
Gatwaikire Igoro.

title: 54 "Bw'emechando"
markdown:
### 54 "Bw'emechando"   

  **1.**   
"Bw'emechando!" Ndieta   
ki as'Omwana O Nyasae   
'Chete kobori' ababe   
Haleluya n'Omotoria!

  **2.**   
'Kabogori' obosoku,   
'Gaitwa ribaga riane   
'Kangora 'S' amanyinga,   
Haleluya n'Omotoria!

  **3.**   
'Bamochi ababe tware,   
'Re tare nakemoa   
Ekeng'wanso ekiya,   
HaIeluya n'Omotoria!

  **4.**   
'Kaimokigwa agakwa,   
Karera "Yaerire!"   
Bono Igoro are,   
Haleluya n'Omotoria!

  **5.**   
'Ker 'arach' Omogambi,   
kwoyia ababorigwe   
Ntotere ogotera,   
Haleluya n'Omotoria!

title: 55 Nter' Okobua Kwa Nyasae
markdown:
### 55 Nter' Okobua Kwa Nyasae   

  **1.**   
Nter' okobua kwa Nyasae,   
Gwatong' ebitunwa,   
Kwaara chinyancha chionsi,   
kwaagacha Igoro;   
Bong'aini bwaye bwachika,   
Risase kobara;   
Motienyi, ching'enang'eni,   
nkoigwera bire.

  **2.**   
Nter' obuya bw'Omonene,   
Bwaret' endagera;   
'Kabitonga nering'ana,   
kabikor' ebiya,   
'Monen' a'makumia ao,   
Aichir' ense yonsi!   
Nonya nas'ense ngotacha,   
N'erioba igoro!

  **3.**   
'Mote tori ense aa,   
otagokobaka;   
'Mare aichora n'omwaga,   
Gokwayachikire;   
Bionsi bire moyo   
obo nay'okobirenda;   
Ense teri torebise,   
Nyasae otarore.

title: 56 Nere Embura Engiya
markdown:
### 56 Nere Embura Engiya   

  **1.**   
Nere embura engiya   
'Gotwa koret' ebisio;   
Goisanekia ab'erang'o   
'Monene nainche ntwerie.   
 Nonya nche Nonya nche,   
Tig'amatoim' angwere.

  **2.**   
Tong'etania Tat'omuya;   
nimba omonyabibe   
Amaber' ao botambe   
'Monene Onyorokie.

  **3.**   
'Natebanir'as'ebibe   
nkogechia na gokwanga,   
Ense nigo ensibete,   
Nyaber' erind'onkonye!

  **4.**   
Tong'etani' Omoik' omuya,   
'Nkoru'ore okorora,   
Ooroki' Obuya bwa Yeso,   
ntebie ay'Omorembe.

title: 57 Ichw' Omoik' Omochenu
markdown:
### 57 Ichw' Omoik' Omochenu   

  **1.**   
Inchw' Omoik' Omochenu   
Onsibi' omoyo one,   
Onsibie enkoro yane,   
Inchuo ng'ichorie bono.   
 Ng'ichorie, Ng'ichorie,   
Yeso nchwo ong'ichorie   
N'okoboko kwao ogochenu,   
ng'ichorie bono.

  **2.**   
Nong'ichori' Omoik' omuya   
Nonya tinkogotebia   
Ko ninkoganetie mono   
Inchuo ng'ichorie bono.

  **3.**   
Naichoirwe n'oboreu   
Nekanyire as'ore   
Omoika Omochenu   
Ombekere chinguru.

  **4.**   
Nchene, ndemie, nsesenie   
nkony' osibie 'nkoro yane   
N'ay' okoremia, gotoria   
Bono nkong'ichori' ore.

title: 58 Omoika Omochenu
markdown:
### 58 Omoika Omochenu   

  **1.**   
Omoika Omochenu,   
Omorai 'Mwegenwa;   
Tobwate okoboko,   
Abator' abatari;   
Toche as'ore toigwe,   
Eriogi ri'obwororo,   
"'Motari, nchwo ase nde,   
Ningoikie Igoro."

  **2.**   
Naye or'Omosani,   
'Gokonywa kore ang'e;   
Tototiga emechando,   
N'ase omosunt' ime;   
K'emerind' ekogusa,   
Chinkoro chikwoboa,   
Monyerere "'Motari,   
Inchuo ningotang'ane."

  **3.**   
'Meremo gekoera,   
Togany'ogotimoka;   
Totari n' okogania,   
Tatiga Igoro oka;   
Titori n'okogania,   
Manyinga a Yes'oka,   
Monyerere "'Motari,   
Notimoke Igoro."

title: 59 'Moika Igw' Ogobaba
markdown:
### 59 'Moika Igw' Ogobaba   

  **1.**   
'Moika igw' ogosaba,   
Omeny' as'enkoro   
Nechinguru ochich' aye;   
Omoika inchuo.

  **2.**   
Inchuo buna oborabu,   
'Keene twagania   
Tworoki' enchera endonge,   
Tokor' emeremo.

  **3.**   
Inchuo buna omorero,   
Tosibie chinkoro   
Tochirw' ekengwans' ekiya,   
Ase obwanchani.

  **4.**   
Bun' embura tosesenie,   
Kero 'ga twerure   
Ker' enkoro yororobe,   
'Se chinguru chiao.

  **5.**   
Bun' omwaga 'Moika nchuo,   
Buna Pentekote   
Otworoki' ogotoreka   
As' abanto bonsi.

title: 60 Moik' Omochenu O Igoro
markdown:
### 60 Moik' Omochenu O Igoro   

  **1.**   
'Moik' Omochenu o igoro   
Rab' as' enkoro yane   
Oserie Omosunte   
Oyokor' Oborabu.

  **2.**   
'Moika 'nguru chia Igoro   
Ochen' enkoro yane   
Ebibe biangambeire   
As' engaki entambe.

  **3.**   
'Moik' omogok' oigoro   
Enkoro yane remia   
Seri' emechand' emenge   
Gwenia enkoro yane.

  **4.**   
'Moika, bionsi bia igoro   
Omenye omoy'one   
Nsererie chisanamu   
Ongamber' aye bweka.

title: 61 Ngosanga Ki Mogok'o Igoro
markdown:
### 61 Ngosanga Ki Mogok'o Igoro   

  **1.**   
Ngosanga ki, 'mogoko Igoro   
Nyeegek' ase Yeso bweka   
Ngosesenigwa ki 'Morembe ki   
Nyeegek' ase Yeso bweka.   
 Eegeke, Moremb' otari n'obobe   
Eegeke, Eegek' ase Yeso bweka.

  **2.**   
Ninyenyar' enchera enyerere   
Nyeegek' ase Yeso bweka   
'Nchera nenyare koba enyango   
Nyeegek' ase Yeso bweka.

  **3.**   
Tikeri kende gekonyirokia   
Nyeegek' ase Yeso bweka   
Ninde nomorembe bw'Omonene   
Nyeegek' ase Yeso bweka.

title: 62 Tari 'Mosani Obuete Yeso
markdown:
### 62 Tari 'Mosani Obuete Yeso   

  **1.**   
Tari Omosani obuete Yeso,   
Tario kegima;   
Tari' oratogwenie chinkoro,   
keen', ekeene.   
 Omanyir' emechando yaito,   
Natorae goik' omoerio   
Tari Omosani obuete Yeso,   
Tario kegima.

  **2.**   
Tari' omosani 'mochenu o igoro,   
Tario kegima   
Tari' omoitongo buna Yeso,   
Tario kegima.

  **3.**   
Tikeri ker'atari'ang'e naintwe,   
Tikeri, kegima   
Tibori botuk' atatoremie,   
Tibori kegima.

  **4.**   
'Mochenu tari omotigire,   
Tario kegima   
Mobe tari aranyare kwanga,   
Tario kegima.

  **5.**   
Keegwa buna Yeso nkiaruetwe,   
Nkiareo kegima   
Tagotwanga gotoira bwoye,   
Takwanga kegima.

title: 63 'Masase As' Egetunwa
markdown:
### 63 'Masase As' Egetunwa   

  **1.**   
Masase as' egetunwa,   
Masase ar' enyancha,   
Akobara ebirubo,   
As' oborisi' obuya;   
Korende mbor' oborabu,   
Bor' omoy' one ime,   
Omoboria nao ore,   
Oborabu mboreo.   
 Amasase amaya mono,   
Ayare omoy' one   
Yeso kare amo nainche,   
Namasase enkoro.

  **2.**   
Nintugut' omoichano,   
buna eang' engotu;   
Kwamboyirie omogoko,   
Naichorw' ogotogia;   
Nor' omochie bw' oborabu,   
Agw'aye kwandoseirie   
'Moy' one orengererie,   
Nakobwatirie Yeso.

  **3.**   
Omoboria kwangorire,   
Obogima n'obwao;   
Ekemore ki'abwanchani,   
Kemoreke boronge;   
Nor' omochie bw' oborabu,   
Agw' aye kwandoseirie   
'Moy' one orengerereirie,   
Nakobwatirie Yeso.

title: 64 Ko ndabe Amo Na Yeso
markdown:
### 64 Ko ndabe Amo Na Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ko ndabe amo na Yeso,   
Nyigw' Amang'ana' Amaya!   
Aase agiya ndabe,   
Mbe aroro botambe!   
Kondabe amo na Yeso,   
Ning'inyore botambe;   
Bwanchani bwaye n'obuya,   
Bwankonyire kegima.

  **2.**   
Kondabe amo na Yeso,   
Ase ndasesenigwe;   
'Bibe biane motigere,   
Anyare gontimokia   
Kondabe amo na Yeso,   
Ninyare komosaba,   
Ere nang' Obuya bwaye,   
Na kondemia botambe.

  **3.**   
Onsesenie, Omotoria,   
Kondabe amo n'Aye   
Nyoroki' obwanchani Bwao,   
Ndore obosio bwao   
'Monene ngwekane Yeso,   
Omochenu bun' Ere   
Kondabe amo na Yeso,   
Nere obuya bwane.

title: 65 Omonene Ningwanchete
markdown:
### 65 Omonene Ningwanchete   

  **1.**   
Omonene ningwanchete   
Kobua ebiense   
Kwang'eire omoremb' oo   
Kende getasarie.   
 Abange tibaramanya (bamanye)   
'Bwanchani obuya;   
Abange tibaramanya (bamanye)   
'Manying' ansibirie (nsibirie)

  **2.**   
Namanyire nore ang'e   
Kobua abense   
Aye n'omuya Kobua,   
Kobua bionsi pi.

  **3.**   
Kwangokirie as'omoyo,   
Nsasoke Kobua   
Ntware obwanchani bwao,   
Ting'ichana mono.

  **4.**   
Omotori' omuya mono,   
Otar' amo nainche   
Natonyore omogoko,   
Gatorakorore.

title: 66 Nanyorire Omosani
markdown:
### 66 Nanyorire Omosani   

  **1.**   
Nanyorire Omosani!   
'Kanyancha ntaramanya;   
Akang'usa n'obwanchani,   
Nabo inche ndamwanche.   
Ime as'enkoro yane,   
Ere, ong'eir' obuya   
Nind' oyoye ner'oyone,   
Igo kare na kare.

  **2.**   
Nanyorire Omosani!   
Agakwa na gontoria;   
Tari ekeegwa goika,   
Akerua omonyene.   
Tindi gwetogeria gento,   
Bionsi nebiaye Yeso;   
'Nkoro, chinguru, 'bogima,   
Biaye kare na kare.

  **3.**   
Nanyorire Omosani!   
Oeirwe okobua,   
Kondaa gochia Igoro,   
Na kong'ikia aroro   
Bonene bwarorekana,   
Mboinyore botambe   
Bono nkore emeremo,   
Nintimoke botambe.

  **4.**   
Nanyorire Omosani!   
'Muya omoitongo   
Agonsemia na kondaa,   
Oyokondwanerera   
Ere akanyancha mono,   
Ninki kerandusie o?   
Ogokwa tigokondusia,   
Noyoye nde botambe.

title: 67 Nyasa' Abarende Botambe
markdown:
### 67 Nyasa' Abarende Botambe   

  **1.**   
Nyasa' abarende botambe;   
Abateneni' abarae   
Buna abanchani baye;   
Nyasa' abarende botambe.   
 Erio (erio) tororane,   
Tororan' omoerio (moerio)   
Erio (erio) tororane,   
Nyasa' abarende botambe.

  **2.**   
Nyasa' abarende botambe,   
Ababise n'echimbaba   
Endagera ebaisane;   
Nyasa' abarende botambe.

  **3.**   
Nyasa' abarende botambe,   
Ase emechando yonsi   
Abaagate kegima,   
Nyasa' abarende botambe.

  **4.**   
Nyasa' abarende botambe,   
Mobe n'obwanchani mwensi   
'Siri' obwoba bw'amakweri,   
Nyasa' abarende botambe.

title: 68 Amaena Yeso N'Oyone
markdown:
### 68 Amaena Yeso N'Oyone   

  **1.**   
Amaene 'Yeso n'oyone,   
Bwansu bw'obonene obochenu   
Omonyamwando O Nyasae,   
'Boirw' as' Omoika, n'amanyinga.   
 'Mogano n'ogotera kwane,   
Motogie 'Motoria botambe   
'Mogano n'ogotera kwane,   
Motogie 'Motoria botambe.

  **2.**   
Koigwera n'omogok' omuya,   
'Ndoto chingiya chianchichera   
'Malaika barwa igoro,   
Baret' amaber' obwanchani.

  **3.**   
Koigwera n'ogotimoka,   
Ningoke ime y'Omotoria   
Ndende, nganye, ntengere 'goro,   
Ng'ichorw' obuya n'obwanchani.

title: 69 Ntebi Omogano O Igoro
markdown:
### 69 Ntebi Omogano O Igoro    

  **1.**   
Ntebi' omogano o lgoro,   
otakororeka;   
O Yeso n'obonene,   
n'obwanchani bwaye   
Ntebi na obwororo,   
buna as' omwana;   
Nch' omworo omorosu,   
otakonye kende.   
 Ntebi' omogan' okare,   
Ntebie mogan' okare   
Ntebi' amang'an'a Yeso,   
N'obwanchani bwaye.

  **2.**   
Ntebi' omogano ng'ora,   
Nario ndayomanye;   
Koborigw' okonene,   
kogwenia chinkoro   
Oyontebie botambe,   
Nigo nkweba bwango;   
Mang'an'ayio nyamanye,   
Nyanche ekeene.

  **3.**   
Ntebererie boronge,   
Neriogi rigiya;   
Narenge monyabibe,   
Yeso agantoria   
Onyorokie Enjili,   
Gotokonya buya;   
Kobek' omonto buya,   
Kero ki'emechando.

  **4.**   
Ntebi' Enjili kegima,   
'Mang'an' amaronge;   
Mogoko bw'ens' ong'ura,   
Bogima bw'enkoro   
Eri' ens' enkiamokere,   
kondaike Igoro;   
Ntebi' Enjili kegima,   
Ya Yes' Omotoria.

title: 70 Seseni' Obwanchani
markdown:
### 70 Seseni' Obwanchani   

  **1.**   
Seseni' obwanchani   
Bwe chinkoro chiato   
'Bomo bwe chinkoro chiato,   
Bonga bwa Igoro.

  **2.**   
Obosio bwa Tata,   
Tosabe n'omoyo;   
Ogosemeria kwegeria,   
Bib' omoy'oyomo.

  **3.**   
Sanger' emechando,   
Noborito bwonsi;   
Botambe tororerane,   
Amabera rioka.

  **4.**   
Gatogotigana,   
Natwechande mono;   
Korende ntobwatanigwe,   
Tokoumerana

title: 71 Ng'a Ay' Ebuku
markdown:
### 71 Ng'a Ay' Ebuku   

  **1.**   
Ng'a ay' Ebuku etaya engiya,   
Gokony' abanto bachandekire;   
Kende tikegotanga okwegena,   
Buna Yes' achete gototoria.   
 Ng'a ay' Ebuku amang'an' amaya,   
Amasas' aye nanyare kondaa;   
Gochika kwaye eir' obwanchani,   
Goik' omoerio bigenderere.

  **2.**   
Ng'a ay' Ebuku konde nogoichana,   
Ker' omoyo oichoirwe n'ebibe;   
Ng'a ring'ana riakwanetwe na Yeso,   
Nyegene morore Yeso ang'e.

  **3.**   
Ng'a ay' Ebuku inyare komanya,   
Mechando yonsi ere ens'eye;   
Amasas' aye aseri' omoichano,   
Ayerabi' enchera y'omorembe.

  **4.**   
Ng'a ay' Ebuku 'taya y'obogima,   
Gokoiran' achiche komboria;   
Onyorokie etaya ya Igoro,   
Nindore obonene bwa Yeso.

title: 72 Nanchir' Eng'ana ya Nyasae
markdown:
### 72 Nanchir' Eng'ana ya Nyasae   

  **1.**   
Nanchir' eng'an' ya Nyasae,   
Kende tigekoribua   
Rikonyoroki' obomenyo,   
Rintebia ntame korw' abe.

  **2.**   
'Mang'an' amay' anyorokia,   
'Monene, one ntarochi   
Korw' as'ore negeire,   
'Mogok' okoretwa nere.

  **3.**   
Nobe ribaga Riay' aa,   
Ontebi' obwanchani Bwaye,   
Ningosome n'okwegena,   
Nsang' omogok' o Igoro.

  **4.**   
'Me yao nao nkonyora,   
'mwando bw'Omotongi one   
'S' enibo y'obong'aini ere,   
Goichori' ebirengererio.

  **5.**   
Karu' amasase arabi' ense,   
Andae im' omosunte   
Morek' enkoro emwamu,   
Tinsira korwa as'ore.

title: 73 Nintebe Omogano
markdown:
### 73 Nintebe Omogano   

  **1.**   
Nintebe omogano,   
Bw'ebinto bia lgoro,   
O Yeso n'obonene,   
Nobwanchani bwaye,   
Nintebe omogano,   
'Kiagera namaene,   
Nig'okong'isanekia,   
Kende getanyare.   
 Nintebe omogano,   
Nob'omogoko one   
Nteb' omogan' o kare,   
N'obwanchani bwaye.

  **2.**   
Nintebe omogano,   
'Yore bw'ogokumia,   
Kobu'ebiens' ebiya,   
Nonya 'ndoto ngiya   
Nintebe omogano,   
Onkonyire mono,   
Nakio ekio kiagera,   
Nkogotebia bono

  **3.**   
Nintebe omogano,   
N'omuya koirorwa,   
Ker' ekero ngoteba,   
'Mwansu bw'ogokumia   
Nintebe omogano,   
Bande mbarayoigwa,   
'Ng'ana y'ogotoreka,   
Ring'ana ria Nyasae.

  **4.**   
Nintebe omogano,   
'S'abayomanyete,   
Bare nchara n'erang'o,   
Koigwa bun' abande   
As' obonene ntere,   
Gotera okoyia,   
Nob'omogan'o kare,   
oyio naganchire.

title: 74 Inchwo Abegeni
markdown:
### 74 Inchwo Abegeni   

  **1.**   
Inchwo abegeni abamwabuire,   
'Nchwo Bethelehemu 'nw'ababui,   
Ror'Omogambi O'goro Oiboirwe.   
 Inchwo tomosasime,   
Inchwo tomosasime,   
'Nchwo tomosasime Omonene.

  **2.**   
Ter'amalaika, tera n'omogoko,   
Ter'abanto bonsi bare igoro,   
'Bonene bwonsi ase Nyasae igoro.

  **3.**   
Togochengere kwaiboirw' emambi'engiya,   
Yeso oegw' obonene bwonsi,   
'Ng'ana ya Tat' oboirw' as' omobere.

title: 75 Nindigetie Manye Yeso
markdown:
### 75 Nindigetie Manye Yeso   

  **1.**   
Nindigetie manye Yeso,   
'Buya bwaye mboorokie   
Ndor' ogotoreka kwaye,   
'Bwanchani bw'oy'onkwerete.   
 Kobua, kobua,   
nimomanye Yeso   
Ndor'ogotoreka kwaye,   
'Bwanchani bw'oy'onkwerete.

  **2.**   
Ndigetie nyegere Yeso,   
N'obochenu bwaye manye   
'Moik' oye ab'omworokia,   
Konyoroki' onsi a Kristo.

  **3.**   
Manye Yes' ase Ring'ana,   
Nkwane n'Omonene one   
Erio nyigw' eriogi riaye,   
'Mang'an' aye ab' ayane.

  **4.**   
'Manye Yes'as' obogambi,   
'Bonda, 'Bonene nebiaye   
Bonda bwaye bomenteke,   
'Mogambi bw'omoremb' ache.

title: 76 Kobusura Mambia
markdown:
### 76 Kobusura Mambia   

  **1.**   
Kobusura mambia,'mbusuro chingiya,   
Kobusura mobaso, mogoroba   
Toganye rigesa n'ogosangereria,   
Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.   
 Reta rigesa, Reta rigesa;   
Natochenge tokoreta rigesa   
Reta rigesa, Reta rigesa;   
Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.

  **2.**   
Twabusur' ensakia nonya n'ekiriri,   
Titobugwa n'obokendu n'omwaga   
Mbwango eraere emeremo yonsi,   
Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.

  **3.**   
Busurera Yeso Ase amariga,   
Nase emechando n'omoichano   
Ero gekoera natoire bwoye,   
Natochenge tokoreta rigesa.

title: 77 Tori' Abagosiria
markdown:
### 77 Tori' Abagosiria   

  **1.**   
Tori' abagosira, Gweni' abagokwa,   
Taboria korw' embera y'ebibe   
Rer 'abakomocha, 'Moki' abakogwa,   
Batebie Yeso ner'Omotoria.   
Tori' abagosira, Gweni' abagokwa   
Yes' omonyamaber' abatorie.

  **2.**   
Nonya bachayete, Nabaganyete,   
'Ganyete oyom'ogoonchoka   
Bakurere mono, Baebererie,   
Nababere kabaramwegene.

  **3.**   
Motemi'osaririe, chinkoro chiabo,   
'Buya bokony' ebirengererio   
'Bwanchani, Bwororo, Bikun'enkoro,   
Nebe moyo ase Omonene.

  **4.**   
Tori' abagosira, Nab'eganeirie,   
'Monene ere nakoe chinguru   
'S'oboremereria, obairanie,   
Batebi' Omotori' obakwereire.

title: 78 Korer'Omonen' Emerem'Emiya
markdown:
### 78 Korer'Omonen' Emerem'Emiya    

  **1.**   
Korer'Omonen' emerem'emiya n'ogwancha,   
Kabe n'oboremu kora motari koiroka.

  **2.**   
Nonya Saitani nabek'emeribo y'obobe,   
Oy'otorangeirie n'omwegenwa natorende.

  **3.**   
Eira yaye as'abasomba baye ner'eye'   
"'Meremo yao as'Omonene teri bola"

title: 79 Totamera Kende
markdown:
### 79 Totamera Kende   

  **1.**   
Totamera kende, 'Meremo nereo,   
Kabe ang'ogende, Ase oratomwe   
Okorangeirire, Botamb' as' obuya,   
Tibwang' emeremo, 'Miya ya Igoro.   
 Aye nchwo (bono) Totamera kende,   
Aye nchwo (bono) Kabe ang' ogende   
Totamera kende, Ande notebigwe,   
"Aye gwanchayete, Togochia Igoro".

  **2.**   
Totamera kende, 'Monen' orangeirie,   
Kwangir' aye mono, Igw' eriogi bwango   
Rigesa riamire, 'Bagesi nabake,   
Kabe n'omogoko, Korer' Omonene.

  **3.**   
Totamera kende, Bono totebana,   
Tomochaya Ere, Ande nagotige   
Ribaga korire, Orore Igoro,   
Ngosororwa ore Inchuo nabwaberwe.

title: 80 Omonene Rigoro Nainyora
81 Kor' Emeremo Mboire
markdown:
### 81 Kor' Emeremo Mboire   

  **1.**   
Kor' emeremo mboire, oyekore mambia;   
Kora korime rire, As' ebisicha   
Yekore kobogokia, Risase korire   
Kora bwango naboire, Ker' otakore.

  **2.**   
Kor' emeremo mboire, Yekore mobaso   
Kera ensa yekore, Bwang' otimoke   
'Kero gi'ensakia nyora, Egent' okogacha   
Kor' emeremo mboire, Ker' otakore.

  **3.**   
Kor' emeremo mboire, kora kobokoira;   
Kamasas' akomesa, 'Tuko riaeta   
Masase akorima, Atabare rinde   
Ker' omosunt' ogocha, Ker' otakore.

title: 82 Tekob' Egetunwa Igoro
markdown:
### 82 Tekob' Egetunwa Igoro   

  **1.**   
Tekob' egetunwa Igoro,   
Gose ng'umbu y'enyancha,   
Gose tai oroari ime,   
Nyasa' Aranganerie;   
Gakorangeria ng'or' obwororo,   
Nintamany' enchera,   
Korambwat' okoboko ningende,   
As' origetie ngende.   
 Ningende as' origetie ngende,   
Bitunwa, 'birubo, 'nyancha;   
Nintebe bun' aganetie ntebe,   
Nimbe buna aganetie.

  **2.**   
Nare amang'ana obwanchani,   
Yes' arigetie ntebe,   
Gose nab' omonto' 'as' ebibe,   
'Yongwenerete ndigie;   
'Motoria korab' Omorai one,   
'Nchera neb' embe,   
Ninkwan' amang'an' ao amaya,   
Bun' origetie nintebe.

  **3.**   
Ase nare ens'achayire,   
ko rigesa ndireo,   
'Se ndakore emeremo ya   
Yeso obambetwe;   
Kondegene as' oborai bwao,   
'Manyete nonyanchete,   
Ninkore obwanchani bwao obuya,   
Nimbe buna origetie.

title: 83  Nimbwate Omosani
markdown:
### 83  Nimbwate Omosani   

  **1.**   
Nimbwate Omosani,   
Nimwanchete mono;   
Nigo anyanchete mono,   
Anchete kegima;   
Tinkoba moyo ataiyo,   
Mbuya kare ang'e,   
Erio twamenya amo:   
Ere nainche.

  **2.**   
Kero kende narosa,   
Ere namanyete;   
Kagontebia mweegeke,   
Nanyor' ogokonywa;   
Nere okondaa nchera,   
Tinyara kogochwa;   
Erio twatara amo,   
Ere nainche.

  **3.**   
Nigo nkomworoki' onsi;   
Omogoko one;   
Naende obororo bo,   
Nony' Omoichano;   
Antebia nkore amaya,   
Buna nche ndateme.   
Erio twakwana amo,   
Ere nainche.

  **4.**   
Namanyet' okogania,   
Morete oyomo;   
Onchikire ntebie 'bande,   
Ring'ana rigiya,   
Ntebe obwanchani bwaye,   
'Kiageret' agakwa.   
Twakora emeremo,   
Ere nainche.

title: 84 Kondaror' Omosalaba
markdown:
### 84 Kondaror' Omosalaba   

  **1.**   
Kondaror' Omosalaba,   
Ase Kristo ankwerete   
'Nibo yane yonsi mbosa   
Ntig' oboenenu bwaye.

  **2.**   
Rora omobere oye   
Obororo n'obwanchani   
Biana koumerana rinde   
Gos' amagwa kob' egutwa?

  **3.**   
Nche omosiru nabeirwe   
'S' erieta, Ring'ana riaye   
Tinyetogeria gent' ense   
Tatig' omosalaba' oo.

  **4.**   
Nintwar' obotongi bw'ense   
Tibogoisan' Esadaka   
'S' Obwanchani bwogokumia   
Bonganetie nche na bionsi.

title: 85 Tokor' Emerem' Abasomba ba Yeso
markdown:
### 85 Tokor' Emerem' Abasomba ba Yeso   

  **1.**   
Tokor' emerem' abasomba ba Yeso,   
Tobwatie enchera yaye aetete   
'S' ogosemia kwaye Tonyore chinguru,   
Tokore eki'amabok' aito akonyara.   
 Omokia, omokia, Omokia, omokia   
Tosabe. . . . Torende. . . .   
Tokore ach' Omonene.   
(mono) (rioka)

  **2.**   
Tokore emeremo bonsi baigote,   
Amache abare n'erang'o bayanywe   
'Mosalab' ebendera yaito erabe,   
Baranderie "ogotoreka kwa bosa."

  **3.**   
Tokor' emeremo amo toyekore,   
Obogima bw'omosunte n'abosire   
Rieta ria Yehova rimokigwe Igoro,   
'S'Ogotera "Ogotoreka kwa bosa."

  **4.**   
Tokore emeremo goik' omoerio,   
Rigesa ndiike bagesi bachiche   
Omochie bw'ababorigwe nobe seito,   
Natotere "Ogotoreka kwa bosa"!

title: 86 'S'Omogoko Natomokerere
markdown:
### 86 'S'Omogoko Natomokerere   

  **1.**   
'S'omogoko natomokorere,   
Omonen'emerem'emiya;   
Kende gionsi bun'Er'arachike,   
'S'okwegena natogekore.   
 Korera (Korera) Yeso,   
As'omogoko (ee) As'omogoko,   
Korera (Korera) Yeso,   
'S'omogond'oy'as'ense.

  **2.**   
'S'omogoko ntoteb'omogano,   
Bw'obwanchani bway'as'abanto;   
Krist' ore oborabu bwa Tata,   
Natoe ogosesenigwa.

  **3.**   
'S'oboitongo tomotunye Yeso,   
Totare chincher'atarete;   
Toirani' abasiru as'Omotoria,   
Baror' Emanwa ya Nyasae.

title: 87 O Ng'ai Abagesi
markdown:
### 87 O Ng'ai Abagesi   

  **1.**   
Ong'ai abagesi bakogesa,   
Abant' abegeni korwa ense?   
'Merem' ekorek' as' ekeene,   
Onde tatimoka goika eere.   
 Ng'ai abagesi bare bache,   
Basang' obonen' enka y'erigesa   
'Ng' oratokonye, kobareta,   
Bant' abegeni korwa ense.

  **2.**   
Gend' as'ebinchera mobarigie,   
Babe mbange k'abaya mbareo   
Barigie nchera timotig'onde,   
Basangererie kogenda 'goro.

  **3.**   
Rigesa riarabire And'onsi,   
'Nse bono neganyete rigesa   
Bagesi mbake, merem'emenge,   
Abange mbasire rikonyorwa.

  **4.**   
Bono nchwo n'emeyio mwanyabanto,   
Mogese embusuro engiya   
Kor' omoki' Omonene nachiche,   
Twegokie ner as' enka yaye.

title: 88 'Ngegu Y'enyancha Ngu'mbu
markdown:
### 88 'Ngegu Y'enyancha Ngu'mbu   

  **1.**   
Ngegu y'enyancha ng'umbu,   
'Kobara buya mono   
Riogi rikondangeria,   
Ng'ayerere ng'ikeo.   
 Ning'ende tintebana,   
Monene ondangeirie   
Ningende inyigwere,   
Minto tigara buya.

  **2.**   
'Monene otebire,   
"Bagesi ayerera!"   
Mogondo ng'ar' okare,   
'Baminto tiga ng'ende.

  **3.**   
Eng'umbu y' emerindo,   
'Koboko nkoimokirie   
Ebisieri mbigoire,   
'Basiru bandageirie.

  **4.**   
Tata, Baba, n'abana,   
Mwensi tigara buya   
Aria ng'umbu y'enyancha,   
'Meremo nenganyete.

title: 89 Gosimekr' Amarigo
markdown:
### 89 Gosimekr' Amarigo   

  **1.**   
Gosimeker' amariga,   
'Mbusur'as' 'obwanchani;   
Takorosa na korara,   
Nonyor' obuya bwaye.   
 Rigereria ense yonsi,   
Rigesa ndire ang'e;   
Ror' endagera yamire,   
Rigesa ng'ang'e rire.

  **2.**   
Ngotw' ere korwa Igoro,   
'Borabu bw'omobaso;   
Emete yonsi nayame,   
Ne chinguru chia Nyasae.

  **3.**   
Toros' as'ogosimeka.   
Tobaisa koiroka;   
Nonyor' emechand' emenge,   
Nogese n'omochengo.

title: 90 igw' Omogano Bw'ogokumia
markdown:
### 90 igw' Omogano Bw'ogokumia   

  **1.**   
Igw' omogano bw' ogokumia,   
Twamenyet' abasiru   
Yes' agaika n'obonene,   
Gatorusi' egesibo.   
 Ng' otorusiri' omosunte?   
(Nere Yeso obambetwe)   
'Nki akorete? (Agankwera)   
Ng'ai akare? 'goro gotosabera   
(Egene Igoro gotosabera.)

  **2.**   
Taiyo orenge gototoria,   
nonya namalaika   
'Kabambwa agachayw' akangwa,   
'Yomo ase Nyasae.

  **3.**   
Mbwerue ase Omotori'oyo?   
Mbwanche bwekany 'as'are?   
Naye noror' obuya bwaye,   
Nagotori' ere bono.

title: 91 Korangerigwa Nkore Korwa Ng'umbu
markdown:
### 91 Korangerigwa Nkore Korwa Ng'umbu   

  **1.**   
'Korangerigwa nkore korwa ng'umbu,   
Toma oborabu   
Chinkoro chiganetie ogokonywa,   
Toma oborabu.   
 Borabu 'nchili 'sesenirie,   
Borabe goik' engegu   
Botome masari' ayerabie,   
Ense yonsi botambe.

  **2.**   
'Korangerigwa korwa Makedonia,   
Toma oborabu   
Twerue intwe as' omot' abambetwe,   
Toma oborabu.

  **3.**   
Tosabe buya boche ense yonsi,   
Toma oborabu   
'Koba buna Kristo kobe and' onsi,   
Toma oborabu.

  **4.**   
Titorosa gokora obwanchani,   
Toma oborabu   
Tosangererie baye as' egutwa,   
Toma oborabu.

title: 92 Nkorandi'ore Ring'ana Ri'obonda
markdown:
### 92 Nkorandi'ore Ring'ana Ri'obonda   

  **1.**   
Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda   
'Yominto ko ribaga rire?   
Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda   
'Yominto k'omobaso ore?   
 Rigesa bono ng'ang'e rire ('ng'e rire);   
Meremo y'abagesi eere (kegima)   
Rigesa riao naki rirabe;   
'Monene kagosangereri' abanto.

  **2.**   
Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda,   
'Botuko botoererete?   
Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda,   
Rigesa rigiya richenu?

  **3.**   
Nkorandi' ore ring'ana ri'obonda,   
'Ncher' eyi' abanto baraigwe?   
Nosangererie rigesa rigiya,   
Inchwo obwatane n'abande.

title: 93 Tiga Ker' Etaya Yoke
markdown:
### 93 Tiga Ker' Etaya Yoke   

  **1.**   
Tiga ker' etaya yoke,   
Omosunte ngoch' ore   
'Mosunte bw'ens' Omonene,   
Omonen' ataracha.   
 Rosia chitay' abaminto,   
Mochirosie n'okoiroka.   
Gocha kwaye ng'ange kore,   
Kera etaya yoke.

  **2.**   
Nony' abange mbasundoka,   
Bakwanga gwanch' enchili   
Kwegena gwaito ntobeke,   
'S' eira yokoirana.

  **3.**   
'Ng'ana riaye nari'etaya   
Ntokonyara gosira   
'Mechando neba ker' ase,   
Titokonyara kwangwa.

  **4.**   
'Merem' emiy' eoroke,   
eyesokie ens'eye   
'Koigwera koret' ebisio,   
Gatore n'okwegena.

title: 94 Motori' Atotebia Torende
markdown:
### 94 Motori' Atotebia Torende   

  **1.**   
Motori' atotebia torende,   
tosabe rioka   
Aru' Omoika bwe chinguru   
'Se baria banchire.

  **2.**   
'Totebia torende tosabe,   
Tob' abarwani   
Tokonye toigw' eriogi riao,   
Koigwer 'obogima.

  **3.**   
'Totebia torende tosabe,   
Naki bwango ng'ache   
Gototimokia atoire,   
Enka ya botambe.

  **4.**   
'Totebia torende, tosabe,   
'Mogambi ochire   
Na toigwere n'omogoko,   
Torende goik' ache.

title: 95 Bugia Engoma Y' Enchili
markdown:
### 95 Bugia Engoma Y' Enchili   

  **1.**   
Bugia engoma y' enchili,   
Ker' omont' akurerwe;   
Oyokoigwa Ring'ana,   
Aonchok' abe moyo.   
 Bugi' engoma Omwegeni,   
Yebugi' ense n'enyancha;   
Nyasae ochikire   
ker'omosibwa asiborwe.

  **2.**   
Yebugie chinsinyo chionsi,   
'Se abasibwa bare;   
Teba "Bionsi ng'ang'e bire,   
Tata obarangeirie."

  **3.**   
Yebugi' ebitunwa igoro,   
Ase chiroro chionsi;   
Chindiba chiiranerie,   
'Mogok' ogotoreka.

  **4.**   
Yebugie 'S'abarosire   
'Ganetie batimoke;   
Omotori' obachikire,   
"Mbuya moche as'ende."

title: 96 Imok' Abakristo Bun' Abesegi
markdown:
### 96 Imok' Abakristo Bun' Abesegi   

  **1.**   
Imok' Abakristo bun'abesegi,   
Mosalaba O Yes' otang'aine bosio   
Kristo natang'aine ase esegi,   
Bosi' as'esegi ror' ebendera.   
 Imok' Abakristo bun'abesegi   
Mosalaba 'O Yes'otang'aine bosio.

  **2.**   
'Riogi ri'obobui Saitani atama,   
'Bakrist' abarwani rwana mobue   
Makweri aiguswa koigw' okobaka,   
Abaminto tera 'moki'amariogi.

  **3.**   
Kanisa ya Nyasae bun' abarwani,   
Toet' as'abegeni baetete;   
Titwatananeka, intwe nabamo,   
gosemeri', ogwancha, kwegeri'okomo.

  **4.**   
'Bagambi baeta, Magambi agwa,   
Kanisa ya Yeso nebeo rioka;   
'Nguru chi'amakweri, Nchikoyebua,   
Ntore n'eira ya Yes' etabugwe.

  **5.**   
'Nchwo abanto mwensi togende amo,   
Tera naintw' ogotera kwo'bobui;   
Gosik' ogotogia Kristo Erwoti,   
'Malaika, 'banto tera botambe.

title: 97 Enkoro Yane Imoka
markdown:
### 97 Enkoro Yane Imoka   

  **1.**   
Enkoro yane imoka,   
Ne chinguru chionsi,   
Esegi n'ey' Omonene,   
Keegwa n'egutwa.

  **2.**   
Eriogi n'eria Nyasae,   
Rigokorangeria,   
Ner' omonyene okorwa,   
'Gutwa y'obogima.

  **3.**   
'Barofi nabwo abange,   
Bakorigereria;   
Toinyora as' okorwa,   
Bwatia orogendo.

  **4.**   
'Monene gwatochakirie,   
Koamererania;   
Buna intwe tokobua,   
Kobua nokwao.

title: 98 'Bachenu More N'oboros' Obuya
markdown:
### 98 'Bachenu More N'oboros' Obuya   

  **1.**   
Bachenu more n'oboros'obuya   
ase okwegena ring'ana riaye;   
Nkiaratebe Kebuet'egiatebete,   
Ning'onagotamera Omotoria?   
Ning'onagotamera Omotoria?

  **2.**   
Timoiroka ninde amo nainwe,   
Naki Ninche Nyasae orabatorie;   
Nkoe 'nguru, ngotorie, ngotenenie,   
nkobwate n'okoboko gwe chinguru,   
Nkobwate nokoboko gwe chinguru.

  **3.**   
Kondakorangerie korw' as'amache,   
Ndoche chi'obororo nchigokobua;   
Naki nimbe naye kogosesenia,   
Na kogochena korw'as'emechando   
Na kogochena kortv'as'emechando.

  **4.**   
Nonya kogoet'emechand'emenge,   
Obuya bwane obonge mboisaine;   
'Morerb' omong'orakobue,   
Nayobekir'ogochen' ogosibie'   
Nayobekir'ogochen' ogosibie.

  **5.**   
Nkoro etimogete ase Yeso,   
Tinkoyetig'egend'as'ababisa;   
Nkor'eyio amakweri nayenyegeria,   
Tinkoyetiga yaya tinkoyetiga,   
Tinkoyetiga yaya tinkoyetiga.

title: 99 Enkoro Yane Renda
100 Tindi N'eki Nyegenete
101 Tenena Bokong'u ase Nyasae
markdown:
### 101 Tenena Bokong'u ase Nyasae   

  **1.**   
Tenena bokong'u ase Nyasae,   
Komwaga omonge okogusa;   
Ner' egetare, nere chinguru,   
'Bibe kobire ang'e.   
 Totenene bokong'u as' egetare,   
'Getare Kristo bweka;   
Gatoraremererie ntotenene,   
'S' ekerogo ki'obonene.

  **2.**   
Tenena bokong'u s' oboronge,   
Nkoro y'ekeene y'okwegena;   
Nas' Egetare orabuere,   
Obonge bw' obosiru.

  **3.**   
Tenena bokong'u s'ekeene,   
nonya kegotebana nkebue;   
'Getar' Omorembe   
Motimoko 'merindo keraete.

title: 102 Rend' Engaki Nenke
markdown:
### 102 Rend' Engaki Nenke   

  **1.**   
Rend' engaki nenke, Ndero ibaga rire,   
Rend'ense tebua, Morende mosabe   
Renda ntw' abareu. mobisa mokong'u,   
Renda tari are, 'Monene bw'enyangi.   
 Renda, Saba, Renda, Saba,   
Rend' osabe obotuko na omobaso,   
Renda mosabe.

  **2.**   
Oserie chitoro, Nechitang'utang'u,   
Eira Neyao, 'Mogoko botambe;   
'Monen' akarenda, As'engencho yao,   
Akagoiterera Amanyinga Aye.

  **3.**   
Aye mwanche Yeso nenchinguru chiao,   
'Mobisa ng'ang" are, 'boyi' ebirwanero,   
Bono ribaga ndire, Tirieta bosa,   
Renda na gosaba, 'Bakristo renda.

title: 103 Aka Eriogi
markdown:
### 103 Aka Eriogi   

  **1.**   
Aka eriogi! Ror' omobisa!   
'Moki' ebendera ya Nyasae   
Beka ebinto bi'esegi yaye,   
Mwegen' Amarik' Amachenu.   
 'Barwani etanan' ebendera!   
S'oboremu raria ring'ana   
Genda bwango Motere Hosana!   
'Sagini yaito nere Kristo.

  **2.**   
Tob' abakong'u as' omobisa,   
Twensi twamanya ntobue   
'Nguba, 'bendera chimekameke,   
Rwaner' ekeene ntobue.

  **3.**   
Nyasa' otoigwe gatogosaba,   
Tokonye n'obuya, bwao   
Segi ekoera tob'ababui,   
Ntobek' egutwa bosio bwao.

title: 104 Toagach' Egetare Ke Moyo
markdown:
### 104 Toagach' Egetare Ke Moyo   

  **1.**   
Toagach' Egetare Ke moyo,   
Yes' Egetare kiemiaka;   
Toremererie okogoswa,   
Omwaga gokogusa.   
 Natoagache As' egetare   
Toagach' egetar' egekong'u   
'Se Krist' Egetare.

  **2.**   
'Bande baagach' amaroba,   
Korora kw'enibo y'ense   
Aband' emerindo y'ebibe,   
'Megok' ogotogigwa.

  **3.**   
Agach' egetar' ekeene,   
'Boroso botasareke;   
'Gosemeria kare na kare,   
Ogotoreka gwaito.

title: 105 Nkogenda Nde Bo Igoro
markdown:
### 105 Nkogenda Nde Bo Igoro   

  **1.**   
Nkogenda nde bo igoro,   
Ngosukande gochia ang'e;   
Ngosaband' amatuk'onsi,   
"Yes' antenenie igoro.   
 Onyimokie Ontenenie,   
'Sokwegen' ense ya igoro   
'Ns' engiya kobua chionsi,   
Yes' antenenie igoro.

  **2.**   
Tinkogoka komeny' as' obwoba,   
ne chitang'utang'u;   
'Bande mbancha komenyao,   
Gosaba kwane nchie igoro.

  **3.**   
Nindigetie 'menye igoro,   
Nonya Saitani ogontema   
'S'okwegena naigur'   
ogotera kw' abachenu Igoro.

  **4.**   
Ndigetie ng'ike igoro,   
Ndor' amasas' obonene;   
Ngosaba nde goika ng'ike,   
Yeso Ndae ng'ike igoro.

title: 106 Morendi Obonene Mboche
markdown:
### 106 Morendi Obonene Mboche   

  **1.**   
'Morendi obonene mboche,   
bwa Zayoni as'emambia?   
'Bimanyererio bi'ogocha   
biakorabeiri' enchera?   
Omotoria Oramokie,   
'Masase nkobar' are,   
Eboyie ase enyangi,   
Bwakire boka! boka!

  **2.**   
Omorendi, amasaria   
'Mentekire kobua,   
'Bimanyererio as'ense,   
Biorokirie ogocha   
'Getureri gekobuga,   
geture abakure,   
Abachenu nababoke   
beboyeti ogotakwa.

  **3.**   
'Morendi rora bwakire,   
Rituko ri'Omonene;   
Natoake amariogi,   
Obonda ng'ang'e bore,   
Omotari ndora ng'umbu   
Kanani ekoorokia,   
Yerusalemu omuya   
boig' ororekanire.

  **4.**   
'Morendi nka yedhahabu'   
Karanset' Omogambi;   
Ochabeire buya mono,   
'S' omoremb' agamb'onsi   
'Borabu as'ebitunwa   
Amasaria akomesa   
Chinsoko chingiya mono,   
Ebisicha ebiya.

  **5.**   
'Morendi, ror' ens'egocha,   
Yamete buya mono;   
Ere ng'umbu ang'e mono!   
omogond'o Edeni   
Igwa amater' amaya,   
Agoterwa Igoro,   
Ror' abange bagotera,   
Omotari nabeo.

title: 107 Omonyamwando Naki Ogosundoka?
108 Abarendi Ba Zayoni
markdown:
### 108 Abarendi Ba Zayoni   

  **1.**   
Abarendi ba Zayoni,   
Teba ay' obotuko   
Eng'enang'eni yachire?   
Nabokiamoke gose?   
Mwarorire,   
amasase agocha?   
Mwarorire,   
amasase agocha?

  **2.**   
Ebimanyererio bi'ense,   
twabietire gose?   
'Ngoika tor' ekiambokero,   
nonya nengegu gose?   
Amaene,   
twarorir' obogambi?   
Amaene,   
twarorir' obogambi?

  **3.**   
Oborabu bwachichire,   
Toake egeturi;   
Twarorir' eng'enang'eni,   
Igor' endabu mono!   
Chenga mwensi,    
'Gotoreka gwachire   
Chenga mwensi,   
'Gotoreka gwachire.

  **4.**   
Twanyorire omorai;   
Ense ng'ang' eberete;   
Natogende bosio bwango,   
Tosoe as'agiya,   
Tera mono,   
na kogoka kegima   
Tera mono,   
na kogoka kegima.

title: 109 Tokob'Omosunte
markdown:
### 109 Tokob'Omosunte   

  **1.**   
Tokob'Omosunte Yes'ogocha,   
Tokob'Omosunte Yes'ogocha;   
Tokob'Omosunte Yes'ogocha,   
Kobaira abanchwa nka.   
 Kobaira abanchwa nka ('ra nka),   
Kobaira abanchwa nka ('ra nka);   
Tokob' Omosunte Yes' Ogocha,   
Kobaira abanchwa nka.

  **2.**   
Bororo mbokoba Yes' Ogocha,   
Bororo mbokoba Yes' Ogocha;   
Neb'emambi' engiya Yes'ogocha.   
Kobaira abanchwa nka.

  **3.**   
Kweumia ngokaiy' Eker'agocha,   
Kweumia ngokaiy' Eker'agocha;   
Rigesa rigiya Yes'ogocha,   
Kobaira abanchwa nka.

  **4.**   
'Matera, makwania Yes'ogocha,   
'Matera, makwania Yes'ogocha;   
Koumer' abasani Yes'ogocha;   
Kobaira abanchwa nka.

title: 110 Krist' Omorai Oito
markdown:
### 110 Krist' Omorai Oito   

  **1.**   
Krist' Omorai oito kogend' esegi,   
Titogokung'ia, karatorangerie:   
Natotamanya okogania kwaye;   
Ntobwati' enchera yonsi.   
 Bosio bosio! Yes' ochikire;   
Bosio bosio! Ense y'omwando;   
Bosio bosio! Tiga totere,   
Natobue na Yes' Omogambi.

  **2.**   
Bendera yait' eramboke botambe,   
'S'ebibe biegachete mbitugutwe,   
Krist' Omorai oit' Obuire ense,   
Tobwati' e'nchera yonsi.

  **3.**   
'Segi nendoro ko tekoira geka,   
Nobobui tosoe omoganda;   
Totere ogotera kw' obobui,   
Gatorabwati' enchera.

title: 111 Twagosabire Chinguru
markdown:
### 111 Twagosabire Chinguru   

  **1.**   
Twagosabire chinguru,   
Chiria chiare riria kare   
Chiagerete bakerua pi,   
Bakabua emechando.

  **2.**   
Ng'ai Omoika oria ore,   
'Koret' Abramu oyoo?   
'Kanyete Paul' enkoro,   
'Kaba na nguru chia Igoro.

  **3.**   
Omoik' oria orandetie,   
'Bwanchani chinchera chiao   
'Karabi' amarik' a Isaya,   
N'amatera a Daudi.

  **4.**   
Buya bwao mbori nguru,   
'Bun' ekero kia Elija   
Mus' akaror' obonene,   
Ayub' akaremereria?

  **5.**   
Inyor' amatuko aria,   
Keror' emeremo yao   
Gatwakoeire chinkoro,   
Toiterere omoik' oo.

title: 112 Tenena Ase Yeso
markdown:
### 112 Tenena Ase Yeso   

  **1.**   
Tenena ase Yeso,   
Abarwani baye,   
'Moki' ebendera igoro,   
Tebaisa kobugwa!   
Morae mogand' oye,   
Bobui as'obobui   
Mobabu' ababisa   
Erio Krist' agambe.

  **2.**   
Tenena ase Yeso,   
Igwera engoma,   
Esegi yarorire,   
'tuko ri' Obobui   
Abaye mokorere,   
korwani' ababisa   
Remereri' emechando,   
Ogokwa nokoba

  **3.**   
Tenena ase Yeso,   
'Se chinguru chiaye   
Naki amabok' aino,   
Takobaisana;   
Bek' enguba y'Enchili,   
Gesa mogosaba;   
'S'emerem' egotoka,   
Timoirana nyuma.

  **4.**   
Tenena ase Yeso,   
Esegi neere;   
Rero nario esegi,   
ankio nobobui   
Ere Oyorabue,   
Gutwa y'obogima   
Er'amo n'Omorwoti,   
Mbagambe botambe.

title: 113 Ong' Okwegen' Okonene
markdown:
### 113 Ong' Okwegen' Okonene   

  **1.**   
Ong' okwegen'okonene,   
Babisa mbamiga;   
Gotaiguswe 'S'obotaka,   
nonya nemechando,   
Nonya n'emechando.

  **2.**   
Ogotakwemurungania,   
'kero ki'emechando;   
Korende as' emechando   
nobororo Kwegeme Nyasae.

  **3.**   
Okwegena gokobara,   
Komwag' okogusa;   
Nakoba ase aabe,   
tikwoboa kende,   
Korem' Omosunte.

  **4.**   
Gotagoswe n'ab'ens'eye,   
Nagosekwa bori   
Ogotabugwe n'ebibe,   
gosirigwe bori   
N'ebiya bi'ens'eye.

  **5.**   
'Monene ng'a okwegena,   
Erio kende ngecha   
Ninyor' Omogok' omuya   
nonya nde as'ense   
Bw'enka ya igoro.

title: 114 'Mokristo Boka
115 'Morendi Bw'Omosalaba?
markdown:
### 115 'Morendi Bw'Omosalaba?   

  **1.**   
'Morendi bw' Omosalaba,   
'Motunyi bw' eng'ondi   
Tinkwobo' emeremo yaye   
nonya Nerieta gwatora.   
 Totang' e --------- Merindo   
Erio taik' as'are   
Totang' e --------- Merindo   
Erio toik' As'are

  **2.**   
Ng'irwa igoro yamare,   
As' agiya mono   
Bande korwanerera keegw'a   
eke as'obokong'u.

  **3.**   
Bosi' ababisa tibaiyo?   
Nimbwatesie omorindo   
'Ns'eye mb' omosani bw'obuya   
konyira 'se Nyasae?

  **4.**   
Ndwane omoerio ngambe,   
Ondemi' Omonene   
Ndemererie obororo bwonsi,   
Nyore nguru 'se Yeso.

title: 116 Abanchete Nyasaye
markdown:
### 116 Abanchete Nyasaye   

  **1.**   
Abanchete Nyasae,   
Moche nomogoko   
Ter'ogotera okuya,   
Ter'ogotera okuya   
Ase ekerogo,   
Ase ekerogo.   
 Togende Zayoni,   
Omochi' omuya Zayoni   
Totire gochia Zayoni,   
'Mochi' omuya o Nyasae.

  **2.**   
Batamomanyeti   
Nyasae mbatera,   
Bana b'Erwoti ya igoro,   
'Bana b'Erwoti ya 'goro   
Boroki' Omogoko,   
Boroki 'Omogoko.

  **3.**   
Rimisu rigiya   
rirw' ase Zayoni   
Totaraika igoro,   
As' ebitii bia Igoro   
Gotara chinchera   
chiria chiedhaabu.

  **4.**   
'Matera abuche,   
'Mariga asire,   
Bana b'Erwoti ens' eria,   
Ens'eria ya Imanueli!   
Gochia chinse chinde,   
chingiya chia Igoro.

title: 117 'Monene Nakwegene?
markdown:
### 117 'Monene Nakwegene?   

  **1.**   
'Segi yokorwanerera,   
'Keene noboronge   
'Segi ndoro yokorwania,   
chinguru chi'omosunte   
Baremu barigirie,   
Eri'ere nakwegene?   
 Monene Nakwegene,   
Nomoe, obonene   
Rem' okwane nomokia,   
Eri'ere nakwegene?

  **2.**   
Rora bacha nendamwamu,   
Nechinguru chi'omobe   
Nechinguru chi'omobisa   
korw' ense y'omosunte,   
'Baremu barigirie,   
Eri' ere nakwegene.

  **3.**   
Tata igo atoroche,   
'Malaik' atotoria   
Yeso ner' Omorai oito,   
titokonyara kogwa   
Baremu nababua,   
Eri' ere nakwegene?

title: 118 Emeremo Yaerire
markdown:
### 118 Emeremo Yaerire   

  **1.**   
Emeremo yaerire,   
Esabato yachakire;   
Esasoki' enkoro yane,   
Rirende n'amasikani.

  **2.**   
Motogie obaeire,   
Abarosu 'gotimoka   
'Mioyo yabo etimoka;   
kobua amatuk' ande.

  **3.**   
Omoiranerie mbuya,   
Buna rimisu rigiya   
Tonyore omotimoko,   
onde tari orayomanye.

  **4.**   
'Mogoko bw' enkoro ime,   
Nokogach' ogotimoka;   
Ogacheire ekanisa,   
Omoerio bw'emechando.

title: 119 'Sabato Enchenu
markdown:
### 119 'Sabato Enchenu   

  **1.**   
'Sabato enchenu,   
'Banto bagokeire,   
Toganyete koigw' eng'ana,   
Chinkoro chigoke. 

  **2.**   
'Tuk'erio Esabato,   
Neri'a'aye Tata,   
Naintwe otosesenie   
Tokogosasima.

  **3.**   
Seseni' abachenu,   
Kero togosaba,   
Togoker' ogotimoka,   
Torend' Esabato.

  **4.**   
Chisabato chikoera   
inse aiga,   
Esabat'etakoera   
Ntotimoke Igoro.

title: 120 Tibweb' Esabato
markdown:
### 120 Tibweb' Esabato   

  **1.**   
Tibweb' Esabato   
Monen' asesenirie   
Erituko rigiya,   
Goetania onsi   
Riret' ogotimoka,   
Nomogoko bori   
'Masari' ay' agoika,   
Nobuya bwa Igoro.   
 Ika Ang'e, ika ang'   
Esabat' enyansu;   
Ika ang'e, ika ang'   
Esabat' enyansu.

  **2.**   
'Yerend' Esabato,   
mosasime rero   
Ere oyotebete;   
"Nche ninch' enchera"   
Gatoramotunyane,   
Omotoria oito   
Natonyoinsie mono,   
Amach' Obogima.

  **3.**   
Rituk' omogoko,   
Renda chinsa chiaye   
Totere ase Yeso,   
'Mosani Omuya;   
Omogweni' Omwanchwa,   
'Muya bw'Ogokumia!   
Omenye naintwe bori,   
chinkoro botambe.

title: 121 'Mochakano Nyasae
markdown:
### 121 'Mochakano Nyasae   

  **1.**   
'Mochakano Nyasae,   
'Gatonga Esabato   
Eri' akayesesenia,   
'Kayerwa as'abanto.   
 Twagokire, Twagokire   
Twagokire rituko,   
'Sabato ya Nyasae.

  **2.**   
'Ria gatano narimo,   
'Meremo ekaera   
'Sabato egachaka,   
Toigwere totimoke.

  **3.**   
'Bange bayeonchoire,   
'Timoka Jumapili   
Rigi' Ebuku momanye,   
Teri kobatebia bo.

  **4.**   
'B'ekeene mbatebe,   
mwanyabant' onchoorete   
Korende as'ebuku,   
Goonchoka tikori oo.

  **5.**   
Nkarigia na ekero,   
narora Esabato   
Nkayerera koigwera,   
hero yoka enchera.

title: 122 Rituko Ri' Omogoko
markdown:
### 122 Rituko Ri' Omogoko   

  **1.**   
Rituko ri'omogoko,   
Rire ri'amasase   
Eriagi ri'omoichano,   
Ri'ekieni rigiya   
'S'ore', banene, 'bake,   
'Bacha gosasima   
Batera Omochenu,   
O kare na kare.

  **2.**   
Aye nekiambokero,   
'S' emerind' etache   
'Mogondo bwe chinsoko,   
Chingiya chia Igoro   
Ensoko y'ogokendia,   
Bogima bokong'u   
'S' ore negetengero,   
Gia ense y'omwando.

  **3.**   
Rituko ri'okomesia,   
Naye bw'obwanchani   
Rikoboki' amaiga,   
Y'ebinto bia Igoro   
Tonyor'obuy'oboyia,   
As' ogotimoka   
Torigi' ogotimoka,   
Ogosesenirie.

title: 123 Eskuru Y'Esabato
markdown:
### 123 Eskuru Y'Esabato   

  **1.**   
Eskuru y' Esabato,   
Ngiya mon'ase nde;   
Moy'one okogokeire,   
Esabat enyansu.   
 Sabato (Sabato)   
Enyansu (enyansu)   
Sabato (Sabato)   
Enyansu (enyansu)   
Moy'one okogokeire,   
Esabat'enyansu.

  **2.**   
Nkoro yane entayayi,   
'Karor'encher' enyia;   
Nkarigia aas'agiya,   
Enka y'esabato.

  **3.**   
As'eriogi riobwanchani,   
Yeso ondangeire;   
Erio' mochor'erev bweka,   
'S'enka y'Esabato.

title: 124 Kegima Twaikire Omokubio Naende
markdown:
### 124 Kegima Twaikire Omokubio Naende   

  **1.**   
Kegima twaikire   
Omokubio naende,   
Tiga torigi' ebisio   
Toganyet' alga mwaye   
 E rituko rinene,   
'Gotimoka okuya   
E rituko rinene,   
'Gotimoka okuya.

  **2.**   
Gatokorigi' obuya,   
'S'Erieta ri'Omotoria   
Tworoki' obosio bwao,   
Torusi' ebibe bionsi   
 'Maboko atimoke,   
Totimoke as'ore   
'Maboko atimoke,   
Totimoke as'ore.

  **3.**   
Tobak' Erieta Riao,   
Nay' obe ang'e naintwe   
Bonene toborore,   
Gatore nyomba mwao   
 Omonene tomenie,   
'Ndagera y'obogima   
Omonene tomenie,   
Eya kare na kare.

  **4.**   
Ng'an' ekune ababe,   
Eremie abachenu   
Obuchi' obuya bwao,   
Ogweni' abachandeku   
 Chisabato chibe bo,   
Goika togambe n'Aye   
Chisabato chibe bo,   
Goika togambe n'Aye.

title: 125 Rituko Riao Richenu
markdown:
### 125 Rituko Riao Richenu   

  **1.**   
RituKo riao richenu,   
Kobua ayande,   
Titorengereria ense,   
Tatiga Nyasae.

  **2.**   
Ribaga ria ogosaba,   
Tonyare kwaberwa,   
Tokwane na oboremu,   
"Tat' ore Igoro".

  **3.**   
'Mang'ana ay'omorembe,   
Ere atotebie,   
Koraa omoonchoki,   
Aike Igoro.

  **4.**   
'Bibe biaito biaberwe,   
Tosibore buya,   
Ere bwanchete enkoro,   
Natoe obuya.

title: 126 'Meremo Yaerire
markdown:
### 126 'Meremo Yaerire   

  **1.**   
Meremo yaerire,   
'Sabato y'Omonene,   
Twasoa ogotimoka,   
n'Omorembe chinkoro.

  **2.**   
Namany' as'okwegena,   
'Sabat' as'obotongi,   
N'ogwancha kway'Omotoria,   
N'omochengo chinkoro.

  **3.**   
Korigereria ng'umbu,   
As'amais' atarore,   
'Buya bwaye bw'ogokumia,   
Sabato chinkoro ime.

  **4.**   
Togosoa ens'enyia,   
'S'obuya bwonsi bore,   
'S'Esabato etaere,   
Tomenye goika kare.

title: 127 'Monen' Obuya Bwao
128 Rituko Richenu Mono
markdown:
### 128 Rituko Richenu Mono   

  **1.**   
Rituko richenu mono,   
Riatongetwe na Nyasae,   
Totimoke rituko riaye,   
Natosesenigwe mono.

  **2.**   
Twatimokir' Esabato,   
Twagokire gosasima;   
N'ogotera tomobake,   
Ase obwanchani bwaye.

  **3.**   
Tobake Nyasae mono,   
Ase Yeso Omotoria;   
Ase amanyinga aye,   
Twanyorire okwabera.

  **4.**   
'Kina ki'ebibe nogokwa,   
Atokweret' Omotoria;   
Tobwat' amachiko Aye,   
Titosari' amang'an' Aye.

title: 129 Ika Ang' Omokubio
markdown:
### 129 Ika Ang' Omokubio   

  **1.**   
Ika ang' omokubio,   
Boitongo ase ense;   
Kun' enkor' enyororo,   
N'amasaria Igoro.

  **2.**   
Rituko gotimoka,   
Ngaki yao ngoet' ere;   
Neriogo 'S' obororo,   
Goik' emeremo eere

  **3.**   
Erituko richenu,   
Gotogia na gosaba;   
Gosemia abororo,   
'Bisio biao ebinge.

  **4.**   
Ika ang' omokubio,   
N'omong'us' Omochenu;   
Sesenia chinsa chiao,   
Nkoro yan' eganyete.

title: 130 Ker'Emambia
markdown:
### 130 Ker'Emambia   

  **1.**   
Ker'emambia nobwanchani,   
Torenda rituko rionsi.   
Gatwarendirw'obotuko,   
Meber' ere nechinguru.

  **2.**   
Kabogokia n'amabera,   
Se tore gatogosaba;   
Mechand'eete twaberwe,   
Tosemeretie igoro.

  **3.**   
Emeremo ye rituko,   
Toisa koyerengereria;   
Bond'oboyia, nib' enene,   
Nyasaye nerue ekengwanso.

  **4.**   
Bimoremo bisinini,   
Mbitotange titosaba;   
Na kwang'enchera endonge,   
'Gotoiki' ase Nyasae

  **5.**   
S'obwanchani bwao Tata,   
Tobwenere gotimoka;   
Tokonye rero botambe,   
Tobe buna togosaba.

title: 131 Omonene Ka Bogokia
markdown:
### 131 Omonene Ka Bogokia   

  **1.**   
Omonene kabogokia,   
Noigw' eriogi riane;   
'S' ore inche ningosabe,   
Ninkogaramere.

  **2.**   
Igoro Kristo achiete,   
Gosaber' abaye;   
Komworokia Tata oye,   
Ebirero biaito.

  **3.**   
Omoika oo andae,   
Chinchera chindonge;   
Rongeyia ker' omoremo,   
As'obosio bwane.

  **4.**   
Abanchet' erieta riao,   
abasemeretie;   
Monguru obaetanane,   
'Buya bun'eng'aya.

title: 132 Rituko Riaerire
markdown:
### 132 Rituko Riaerire   

  **1.**   
Rituko riaerire,   
Tata mbuya mono;   
Chinsa chia omosunte   
tichib' echi'ebibe.   
O Yes' ototengerere,   
Torend' as' obotuk' obo.

  **2.**   
'Megoko yaerire,   
Toiranie mbuya;   
Chinsa chi' omosunte   
tichitobera chimbe.   
Yeso tomorekere,   
Torend' as' obotuk' obo.

  **3.**   
'Meremo yaerire,   
Natogoterere   
Chinsa chi'omosunte   
nchib' echi' emechando.   
O Yes' ototengerere,   
Torend as' obotuk' obo.

  **4.**   
Tokanyekie chinkoro,   
Nyasae kwamanyire,   
'Mechand' eng'aki eng'ana   
etoganyet' ense.   
Yes' omwanchwa otoigwe,   
Otorend' otorusie oo.

title: 133 Kabe Nainche
markdown:
### 133 Kabe Nainche   

  **1.**   
Kabe nainche mbwango bokoira,   
Mosunte oichoire kabe nainche;   
Abande basinyirwe kondemia,   
Mokonyi bw'aboro, Kabe nainche.

  **2.**   
Bogima bwane bwaeta bwango,   
'Mogoko bw'ense nig'ogoeta,   
Ebinto bionsi biaonchokire,   
'Yotagoonchoka, menya nainche.

  **3.**   
Ninkoganetie ekero gionsi,   
Buya bwao mbobu' omobisa;   
Ng'o bun' ay' oranyare kondaa,   
S' obuya n'obobe, menya nainche.

  **4.**   
Amo naye tindi n'okoiroka,   
Marwair' obororo bionsi mbosa   
Nonya nogokwa tikori kende,   
Nabuire onye kore nainche.

title: 134 Ker' Erioba Riagure
markdown:
### 134 Ker' Erioba Riagure   

  **1.**   
'Ker' erioba riagure,   
'Mosunt' otubir' ense   
Ching'enang'enit kobara   
Motogie Omotongi bw'obotuko.   
 'Mochenu Nyasae,   
bw'emeganda   
Gwaichoire Igoro n'ense,   
Bionsi bikobak' Aye   
Tat'o Igoro.

  **2.**   
Omonyen' obogima,   
'Menyet' oboiko bwonsi   
Tosangereri' abao,   
Ase riicho riao, ng'ang'e ore.

  **3.**   
Bwanchani bwa' obonge,   
Bobe naintwe botuko   
Gator' ase chitoro,   
'chiche im' as' omoika, Togosaba.

  **4.**   
Kero ching'enang'eni,   
Rituko n'obotuko   
Biaetire korw' ense,   
Monene nabonkiere, Botaire.

title: 135 'Mobaso Bw'enkoro Yane
markdown:
### 135 'Mobaso Bw'enkoro Yane   

  **1.**   
'Motori' omobaso one,   
Botuko mbori koreo   
'Mechando y'ense tetoka,   
Gontanga korw' amais' ao.

  **2.**   
Konanyorire chitoro   
Ng'ichori' ebirengererio   
Naki ere buya ndare,   
'Gekuba kiao botambe.

  **3.**   
Kabe nainche kobogokia,   
Otaiyo tinkoba moyo   
Kabe nainche kobokoira,   
Otaiyo nigo ndakwe.

  **4.**   
Onsesenie gankoboka,   
Ntarasoa ase ense   
'Bwanchani bwao bombue,   
Goika ntoke Igoro.

title: 136 'Megondo Yamire Mono
markdown:
### 136 'Megondo Yamire Mono   

  **1.**   
Megondo yamire mono,   
'Ndagera yarabire,   
Ande onsi yarabire,   
'Magoko n'ebirubo.   
 'Monene tom' abagesi   
igw' ekerero giaito   
Basangererie rigesa,   
Emeremo eere.

  **2.**   
Bagende kero bogokia,   
Na mobaso bagende,   
Goika erioba rigwe,   
Basangererie onsi.

  **3.**   
Abamwatomirwe Reta   
okwama kwain' okuya,   
Mogoroba so' asare   
N'omogok' omonene.

title: 137 Igwa Ring'ana Ria Nyasae Oito
markdown:
### 137 Igwa Ring'ana Ria Nyasae Oito   

  **1.**   
Igwa ring'ana ria Nyasae oito,   
Reta chitaisi as'emonga;   
Karue chinkoro chiano chionsi bori,   
mwegen'eira y'ebisio.   
 "Morete chitaisi as'emonga,   
Montem" Otebir 'Omenene;   
"Nimbatwererie ebisi'ebinge,   
mono goetani'ebi moganetie.

  **2.**   
Norigeti' omanye 'nguru chi'omoika,   
Reta chitaisi as'emonga;   
Menya n'Ere buya chingaki chionsi,   
Gakoru'eira y'esbisio.

  **3.**   
Kwamocheir' Omonene oo gose?   
Reta chitaisi as'emonga;   
Reta bun'erikir'ime y'ebuku,   
're nagoiterer'ebisio.

  **4.**   
Mosabe ner'Omonen' Omorwoti,   
Kamokoreta chitaisi asare;   
Egen'eir'okobaka koigweke,   
Korw'enkoro y'omwegeni.

  **5.**   
'Mater'aigweke 'goro as'amare,   
Kamwaretire chitaisi emonga;   
Amatera y'omogok'aigwekane,   
Ntore neira Y'ebisio.

title: 138 Nki Keransibi' Ebibe?
markdown:
### 138 Nki Keransibi' Ebibe?   

  **1.**
