Nki keransibi' ebibe?   
Namanyinga aye Yeso;   
Nki keranchene ime?   
Namanyinga aye Yeso.   
 Ogoitek' okuya,   
Kogonchena bori;   
Nsoko ende teiyo,   
Tatig' amanying'a Yeso.

  **2.**   
Kegochena tikeiyo,   
Tatig' amanying'a Yeso;   
'S'okwaberwa ninsabe,   
Amanyinga aye Yeso. 

  **3.**   
Kende ngekombwatania   
Tatig' amanying'a Yeso;   
Tindakora ekiya   
Tatig' amanyinga 'Yeso.

  **4.**   
Tindi n'ogosemeria   
Tatig' amanying'a Yeso;   
'Buya gos'oboronge   
Tatig' amanying'a Yeso.

  **5.**   
Obonene! nintere,   
Amanyinga aye Yeso;   
Nintere na kobaka,   
Amanyinga aye Yeso.

title: 139 Ngakoa 'Bogima
markdown:
### 139 Ngakoa 'Bogima   

  **1.**   
Ngakoa' bogima,   
Ngaiter' amanyinga   
Ob'omoborigwa,   
Korw' as' abakure   
Ngakoa ngakoa obogima,   
Aye nki kwang'eire?   
Ngakoa ngakoa obogima,   
Aye nki kwang'eire?

  **2.**   
Natigete Tata,   
N'obonene bwaye   
Nechandete ense,   
Ase omosunte   
'S' engencho yao nkabitiga,   
Nki gwantigareirie?   
'S' engencho yao nkabitiga,   
Nki gwantigareirie?

  **3.**   
Nkagochandekera,   
'Monwa otakwane   
'S'oboror' obonge,   
Gokorusia aabe   
Ngakobogoreria bionsi,   
Nki kwambogoreirie?   
Ngakobogoreria bionsi,   
Nki kwambogoreirie?

title: 140 Rigi 'Abasiru
markdown:
### 140 Rigi 'Abasiru   

  **1.**   
Rigi'abasiru obasoror'aba-   
sireir'ebitunwa igoro;   
Na kobatebi'amang'ana aye,   
'inchwo ase nde nimbanchete.   
 (Bass)   
Nindagende are gochi 'ebitunwa,   
mbairani 'abasiru'se riicho,   
Ase obweri bw'Omoboria one,   
Yes'okweret'abanyabibe.   
 (S.A.T.)   
Nindagende gochi 'ebitunwa,   
Nimbairanie 'basiru gocha;   
As'obweri bw'omobori'one,   
Yes'okweret'abanyabibe.

  **2.**   
Rigi 'abasiru borokie Yeso,   
Abwo barosire chinkoro;   
Nakobar' as'ogotoreka,   
boroki'enchera y'obogima.

  **3.**   
Ningende naki Yes'ondangeirie,   
motunyane kera rituko   
Ndend'abagokwa moki'abakogwa,   
Mborokie Yeso ner'enchera.

title: 141 Yes' As' Obworor' Okorangeirie
markdown:
### 141 Yes' As' Obworor' Okorangeirie   

  **1.**   
Yes' as'obworor' okorangeirie,   
Eri' oche nka, oche rero   
Naki ogotayaya korw' asare,   
Gokogend' are mono?   
 Inchwo rero   
(Inchwo rer'okorangeirie)   
Inchwo rero   
(Inchwo rer'okorangeirie)   
Inchwo rero   
(Inchwo rer'okorangeirie bono)   
Okorangeirie n'obwororo.

  **2.**   
'Rangeiri' omorosu otimoke,   
oche rero, oche rero   
Ret' egurube nagosesenie,   
Ere takogoseria.

  **3.**   
Yeso nakoganyete ochiche,   
koganyete, aye rero,   
Inchw' omworokie ebibe biao,   
Totebana nchuo bwango.

  **4.**   
Yeso ogosoroire omoigwe,   
Igw'eriogi riaye rero;   
Abegeni baye nabagoke,   
Imoka genda bwoye.

title: 142 'Mogeni Ngesieri Are
markdown:
### 142 'Mogeni Ngesieri Are   

  **1.**   
'Mogeni ngesieri are, Igora;   
('Motori' asoe 'Motori' asoe)   
Nao are botambe, Igora;   
('Motori' asoe 'Motori' asoe)   
Igor' ataragenda Igorer' Omochenu   
Yeso Kristo O Nyasae Igora   
(Motori' asoe Motori' asoe)

  **2.**   
Igor' enkoro yao, Igora;   
(Motori' asoe Motori' asoe)   
Gokoganya nagende, Igora;   
(Motori' asoe Motori' asoe)   
Igorer' Omosani,   
Arende nkoro yao;   
Nabe naye botambe, Igora   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)

  **3.**   
Origw' eriogi riaye, Igora;   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)   
Mochore ab'oyoo, Igora   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)   
Ngesieri ateneine,   
Omogoko nonyoro   
'Rieta riaye ribakwe, Igora   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)

  **4.**   
'Mogeni korwa Igoro, Igora;   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)   
Omoyega arosie, Igora.   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)   
'Bibe biao biaberwe,   
K'ebiense bikoera   
Nakoire Igoro, Igora   
(Motori' asoe, Motori' asoe)

title: 143 Nkorangeri' Are Ng'ora
markdown:
### 143 Nkorangeri' Are Ng'ora   

  **1.**   
Nkorangeri' are ng'ora n'obwanchani,   
Korangeri' aye nainche,   
Aganyete egesieri gi'enkoro,   
'koganyet' aye nainche.   
 Nchwo nka . . . Nchwo nka . . . ,   
Mwarosire moche nka;   
'Sogosorora Yeso okorangeirie,   
Monyabibe nchwo inka.

  **2.**   
Titotebana, Yeso osoroire,   
Inche amo naye bo;   
Nase ki togochay' obuya bwaye?   
Arure ase tore.

  **3.**   
O engaki ngoeta ere bwango,   
Ngotoetanie ere;   
'Mosunte n'amakweri ngocha bire,   
Bigotochera twensi.

  **4.**   
Borengererie obwanchani bwaye,   
Bw'Eira ase tore;   
Nonya twamochire natwabere bo,   
Aye nainche bori.

title: 144 Nkaigwa Yeso Ogokwana
markdown:
### 144 Nkaigwa Yeso Ogokwana   

  **1.**   
Nkaigwa Yeso ogokwana   
"Ninchwo otimoke;   
Ikaransa kwarosire,   
Bweegek' ase nde."   
Inkamochiera ndosete,   
Nde n'omoichano!   
Akang'a obotimoko,   
Ere ongokirie.

  **2.**   
Nkaigwa Yeso ogokwana,   
"Nigo nkorua bosa;   
Amache ya Obogima,   
Yanywe obe moyo".   
Ngacha ase Yeso nkanywa   
'Nsoko y'obogima;   
Erang'o yan' egasira,   
Nigo nche nde moyo.

  **3.**   
Nkaigwa Yeso ogokwana,   
"Ninche Omobaso;   
Ondigererie Orabe,   
Orabe botambe".   
Nkamorigereria Yeso   
'kang' eng'enang'eni   
Nintare as'oborabu,   
Nkore orogendo.

title: 145 Yes' Omorisi' Omuya
markdown:
### 145 Yes' Omorisi' Omuya   

  **1.**   
Yes' Omorisi' omuya,   
Okorangeirie,   
Gocha ase riicho,   
Otimoke nyomba;   
Nchwo bori nechinguru,   
kore omosae,   
Soa ase riicho,   
Enchera endonge.   
 Nkorangeria are,   
nobwanchani;   
Omotari inchwo ase Yeso,   
Nateneine akoganyete,   
Namororire Ere.

  **2.**   
Yes' Omorisi' omuya,   
Akerua as'ore,   
Bono nkorangeri' are,   
Omotari inchwo;   
Karue as' emechando,   
Yeso otebire,   
Soa ase riicho,   
Soa motimoke.

  **3.**   
Koganya noboriri,   
Chisese nchireo,   
Gochirigia ching'ondi,   
Chinsiru chichirie,   
Yeso Morisi' Omuya,   
Otebire oche,   
Soa riicho riaye,   
Erio otimoke.

title: 146 Igwa Eriogi Ria Yeso
markdown:
### 146 Igwa Eriogi Ria Yeso   

  **1.**   
Igwa Eriogi Ria Yeso,   
Rikorangeria iga,   
"Ing'o bwanchire kogenda,   
Korem' omogond' one?"   
Botambe nkorangeri' are,   
'Ng'eria yaye nenene;   
lng'o bwanchire atebe,   
"Naond' alga, ntoma".

  **2.**   
Onye tokwambok' enyancha,   
goiker' abasiru   
Mbare bataraonchoka,   
ang' as'ore bakonye   
'Takwane buna Paulo,   
gos' abamalaika   
Randi' obwanchani bwa Yeso,   
buna abakwerete.

  **3.**   
Onye tokob' Omorendi,   
'S' orwaki rwa Zayoni   
Korag' enchera ya igoro   
na kwerua ase bonsi   
As'ogosaba n'enibo,   
nokore aya igoro,   
'Mwegenwa buna Aroni,   
akonyet' Omobani.

  **4.**   
Kabant' abange bagokwa,   
Yeso okorangeirie   
Toigwek'aye kogoteba;   
"Kende nkeri ndakore".   
Bwata emeremo eye,   
Yekor' as' omogoko;   
Korarangerigwe teba;   
"Naond' aiga ntoma".

title: 147 Twarigure  Ring'ana
markdown:
### 147 Twarigure  Ring'ana   

  **1.**   
Twarigure ring'ana:   
Yes' er' Omotoria;   
Randia ring'ana onsi:   
Yes'er' Omotoria.   
Morarie ring'an' eri,   
Ense nonya n'enyancha,   
Igwera ogochika:   
Yes' er' Omotoria.

  **2.**   
Rigende ande onsi;   
Yes' er' Omotoria   
Abanyabibe manya:   
Yes' er' Omotoria   
Ebisinka bitere,   
chindiba chitaberie,   
Ense echenge mono,   
Yes' er' Omotoria.

  **3.**   
Motere as' esegi:   
Yes' er' Omotoria   
Agakwa akaboka:   
Yes' er' Omotoria   
'Bachandegete tera,   
Gokoromwa enkoro   
Tera nonya embera:   
Yes' er' Omotoria.

  **4.**   
'Mwaga noro orarie:   
Yes' er' Omotoria   
Ebisaku bigoke:   
Yes' er' Omotoria   
Bitunwa n'amagoko,   
Eriogi riigwekane   
Ogotera kw'obobui:   
Yes' er' Omotoria.

title: 148 Oyoraigwe
149 Geita Giasie Botambe
markdown:
### 149 Geita Giasie Botambe   

  **1.**   
'Geita giasie botambe,   
Natosoe bisieri,   
'Masase y'Omosalaba,   
'Bwanchani bw'Omotoria.   
 O amabera amange!   
Egeita ekio giasie   
Inche . . . (inche)   
nsoe . . . (nsoe)   
Egeita giasie.

  **2.**   
Egeita nigo giasie,   
Bonsi nabatorigwe;   
Omoke nomonene bo,   
Nakera egesaku.

  **3.**   
Tokore omokia mono,   
Egeita kogiasie;   
Bogoria omosalaba,   
natonyore egutwa.

  **4.**   
'Kero twambokire ng'umbu,   
Totig' omosalaba;   
Natonyore obogima,   
Na komwancha Igoro.

title: 150 Omogwenia Ore Ang'e
markdown:
### 150 Omogwenia Ore Ang'e   

  **1.**   
Omogwenia ore ang'e,   
Yes' omonyamabera   
Agosasokia chinkoro,   
Igw' eriogi ria Yeso.   
 Ter' abamalaika,   
Erieta riogwatora;   
Ogotera okuya,   
Rieta riaye Yeso.

  **2.**   
Obonene as' Engondi,   
Namwegenire Yeso   
Bono nanchir' Omotoria,   
Nanchir' erieta riaye.

  **3.**   
Riet' erio riseri' obwoba,   
Rieta rinde tiriyo   
Naki nkogokigwa koigwa,   
Erieta riaye Yeso.

  **4.**   
Gakoretana egutwa,   
Egutwa y'obogima   
Toikaranse amo nere,   
Togan' okoborigwa.

title: 151 K'ebibe Bire 'Birito
markdown:
### 151 K'ebibe Bire 'Birito   

  **1.**   
K'ebibe bir' ebirito   
Nchwo ase Nyasae;   
Keene nagotimokie,   
Koregen' Eng'ana.   
 Mwanche rioka,   
mwanche rioka,   
Mwanch' Ere bono,   
Nagokonye, nagokonye,   
'Gokonye bono.

  **2.**   
Agaitera amanyinga,   
Tonyore ebisio   
Bwetobek' amanyinga ime,   
orabe kegima.

  **3.**   
Yes' enchera, ekeene,   
'koru' ogotimoka   
Momwegene timonyorwa,   
Namoseseneke.

  **4.**   
Nchwo moso' as'omoganda,   
Mogende Igoro   
Komenya ense engiya,   
Mogoko botambe.

title: 152 Yeso Ngoet' Are
markdown:
### 152 Yeso Ngoet' Are   

  **1.**   
Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,   
'Meuko nchwo monyor' amaiso;   
Yeso bwanchire nabagwenie inwe,   
'Maiso ain' aramokie, morore;   
Inchwo Yeso aba' okorora.

  **2.**   
Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,   
'Nchw' ebirem' as' omogweni'o bonsi   
Manying' agaiteka abatorie,   
Naigw' okorangeria gw' ekerema   
Bono ngoet' are ase bonsi.

  **3.**   
Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,   
'Nchw' abataka namoigotigwe   
Nabarae inwe, nabaragerie,   
Yes' obachikire moigote   
'Nchwo Igor' as' ebiage bichire.

  **4.**   
Yeso ngoet' are, Yeso ngoet' are,   
Inw' abamochi, moche asare   
Twabasoroire, mwanche rero iga,   
Moche bwango Gakorangeria   
Inchw' abamochi, nomwanche Yeso.

title: 153 'Bogim' Obuya  Mbweng'e
markdown:
### 153 'Bogim' Obuya  Mbweng'e   

  **1.**   
'Bogim' obuya mbweng'e   
buna rito rikogwa   
Bun' ebigar' ebiom' obe ang'e.   
Matuko nkoer' are   
nababe batugutwe;   
Mabera nkoer' ar' obe ang'e.   
 Ob' ang'e, ob' ang'e   
Yeso gakorangeria obe ang'e   
Goteban' as' ebibe   
gesieri nagesiekwe   
Birero biao mbosa ob' ang'e.

  **2.**   
Bisicha biya bisira basae bagota,   
Tori n'engaki entamb' obe ang'e;   
Nyasae okorang'eirie tiga ogotayaya;   
Karwe as' obosiru obe ang'e.

  **3.**   
Bwang' engaki neete,   
emechando echiche,   
Tama goch' ase Yes' obe ang'e;   
Kab' aye omong'aini   
tosiekerwa isiko;   
Erio oche gosir' obe ang'e.

  **4.**   
Aye omonyabibe Igw'   
eriogo ria Yeso,   
Aba Igoro bagok' obe ang'e;   
Tama korw' omosunte   
Bweoroki' ase Yeso,   
'Chak' orogendo   
bon' obe ang'e.

title: 154 Tiga Yeso Ach' Enkoro
markdown:
### 154 Tiga Yeso Ach' Enkoro   

  **1.**   
Kwarosire n'egurub' endito,   
Tiga Yeso ach' erkoro   
Koganeti' obogima oboyia,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.   
 Tiga chitang'utang'u,   
Bono, takomokana   
Bono igor' enkoro,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.

  **2.**   
Onye nobochenu oganetie,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro   
Ensoko y'ogosibia nereo,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.

  **3.**   
Kore namatemwa otanyare,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro   
Kore nokogani' ens' etabue,   
Tiga Yeso ache nkoro.

  **4.**   
Gotegeneti abasani bao,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro   
Morore Mosani ki arabe,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.

  **5.**   
Koratere amo nababui,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro   
Korasoe as' obotimoko,   
Tiga Yeso ach' enkoro.   
 Ntige chitang'utang'u,   
Bono tinkomokana   
Naigoire enkoro,   
Yeso ache nkoro yane.

title: 155 Ir' Obogima Bwane
markdown:
### 155 Ir' Obogima Bwane   

  **1.**   
Ir' obogima bwane,   
Bochene bob'obwao,   
Ir' amaboko naro,   
'kore bun'origetie,   
'Kore bun'origetie.

  **2.**   
Ira amagor'ane,   
'B' amang' as' emeremo,   
Ira n'eriogi riane,   
Nter'ase Nyasae oka,   
Nter'ase Nyasae oka.

  **3.**   
Ir' ebikoba biane,   
Bikwan' ay' ar' ayao,   
Ir' amo n'echinibo,   
Tindigetie kobisa,   
Tindigetie kobisa.

  **4.**   
Ira chingaki chiane,   
chikobake botambe,   
Ir' obong'aini bwane,   
korer' ay' origetie,   
Korer' ay' origetie.

  **5.**   
Ira Ogwancha kwane,   
Gokore kob'okwao,   
Ira n'enkoro yane,   
Eb' obomenyo bwao,   
Eb' obomenyo bwao.

  **6.**   
Ir' obwanchani bwane,   
Nib'as' amagor'ao   
Ir' omobere bwensi,   
noyoo bono bori,   
Noyoo bono bori.

title: 156 Inchwo Bono
markdown:
### 156 Inchwo Bono   

  **1.**   
Inchwo bono,   
inchwo bono,   
Ase Yeso bono;   
Bono natochiche,   
ase Yeso bono.

  **2.**   
Nagotorie, Nagotorie,   
Nagotorie bono;   
Bono Omonene   
Nomotoria bono.

  **3.**   
Nanyar' Ere,   
Nanyar' Ere,   
Omonene Yeso;   
Bono nanyar' Ere,   
Omonene Yeso.

  **4.**   
Mwegen' Ere,   
Mwegen' Ere,   
Omonene Yeso;   
Bono mwegen' Ere,   
Omonene Yeso.

  **5.**   
Morangerie,   
Morangerie,   
Omonene Yeso;   
Bono Morangerie,   
Omonene Yeso.

  **6.**   
Nakoigw' Ere .............

  **7.**   
Rota Yeso .............

  **8.**   
Nakwabere .............

  **9.**   
Takomwanga .............

  **1.**   
Halleluya, Amen,   
.... Bono .............   
Amen

title: 157 'Bwanchani Boria Bwakare
markdown:
### 157 'Bwanchani Boria Bwakare    

  **1.**   
Yes' Omonen' agateba   
randi' ogokonyeka,   
Abanto bonsi bamanye   
Yes' osire gocha.   
 'Bwanchani boria bwa kare,   
'Bwanchani nobuya;   
'Bwanchani bwa kare   
Yeso bweka.

  **2.**   
'Mont' oyom' okaagacha   
's' amarab' amaya;   
Omwag' ogacha omotindi   
"Okayeiyeria".

  **3.**   
Oyond' er' akaagacha   
egetare igoro;   
Oboroso bwar' obuy'   
omwaga toyeiyeria.

  **4.**   
'Bonyansi bwonsi naboyie,   
'Bonyansi bosire,   
Emete yonsi nesire,   
Igena ritigare.

  **5.**   
Toagach' as' oboros'   
obuya nere Yeso;   
'Merindo yense neb'   
emenge tegotobua.

title: 158 Yeso Menya Ime Yane
markdown:
### 158 Yeso Menya Ime Yane   

  **1.**   
Yeso menya ime yane,   
'ye 'mogambi omuya   
Obe amairaneri',   
as'okogania kwane;   
Yeso menya ime yane,   
Kor'ayorigetie   
Nche nimboorokie,   
Obonene bwao.

  **2.**   
Nayerure ekaru,   
yasibigwe bori,   
Tig'oborabu bwao   
bomese korwa ime;   
Ense yonsi ekire,   
nonya nomobere,   
Eri 'omosob'oo,   
atar' as'ore rioka.

  **3.**   
Ebimo biaye bionsi,   
Biaigw'eriogi riao,   
Mbire ang'e bionsi pi,   
Gokor'emeremo yao;   
Gose tibiri korosa,   
tibiri kogania,   
Nony'eubi mbibwati,   
biarurue pi as'ore.

  **4.**   
Nenyango gekong'uswa,   
Teri gwanchereria,   
'Ganyet'eki' oratebe,   
'Ker 'orayerangerie;   
Yeso menya ime yane   
'ye 'mogambi omuya,   
Obe amairaneri' as'   
okogania kwane.

title: 159 Nkoro Yan'eyasiboirwe!
markdown:
### 159 Nkoro Yan'eyasiboirwe!   

  **1.**   
Nkoro yan'eyasiboirw'   
emotogie Nyasae,   
Nyigwe omoy'on'   
amanying' ari'aitegete.

  **2.**   
Ekweru'as' obokanyeku   
Asor' Omoboria,   
'Nkoro ekoigw' eriogi   
ria Krist'agambe ime.

  **3.**   
Nkoro eyakorirw'enyia   
yaichoirw' obwanchani,   
'Ng'ikeranu, endonge,   
'nchenu, 'ngiya buna ore.

  **4.**   
Chimbwa chiao aye ong'e   
'Monene nchwo bwango,   
Rik'erieta ri' enkoro   
yane ri'obwanchani.

title: 160 Ner Ensoko Y'amanyinga
markdown:
### 160 Ner Ensoko Y'amanyinga   

  **1.**   
Ner'ensoko y'amanyinga,   
Aya Imanweli;   
'Banyabibe bay'esibie,   
Bacheneke bori;   
Bacheneke bori,   
Bacheneke, bori;   
'Banyabibe bayesibie,   
Bacheneke bori.

  **2.**   
Omoibi ore gokwa   
'Karora ensoko;   
Nainche nimbe omobe bo,   
Ninsibigw' ebibe,   
Ninsibigw'ebibe,   
Ninsibigw' ebibe;   
Nainche nimbe omobe bo,   
Ninsibigw' ebibe.

  **3.**   
Ay' Emanwa manyingao   
Takoera nguru;   
Goik'ekanisa enchore,   
Yaborigwe bori,   
Yaborigwe bori,   
Yaborigwe bori,   
Goik'ekanisa enchore,   
Yaborigwe bori.

  **4.**   
'S' okwegena nkayarora,   
Manying' agoiteka,   
'Bwanchani n'eganga yane,   
Rioka goik' ogokwa;   
Rioka goik' ogokwa,   
Rioka goik' ogokwa;   
'Bwanchani n'eganga yane,   
Rioka goik' ogokwa.

  **5.**   
Omonene negenire,   
kwang'eire inche,   
Ekeegwa kiagorirwe,   
Ase amanyinga!   
Ase Amanyinga!   
Ase Amanyinga!   
Ekeegwa kiagorirwe,   
Ase Amanyinga!

  **6.**   
Ase ogoter' ogwansu,   
Ntere nguru Chiao;   
Ker'oromem' or' orobe,   
Rwaborigwe bori   
Rwaborigwe bori,   
Rwaborigwe bori;   
Ker'oromem' or' orobe,   
Rwaborigwe bori.

title: 161 Yeso Nche Nindigeti' Ogosibigwa
markdown:
### 161 Yeso Nche Nindigeti' Ogosibigwa   

  **1.**   
Yeso nche nindigeti' ogosibigwa,   
Nindigetie ay' omenye ase nde;   
Okeiyerie keria kegwekinia,   
Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.   
 'Morabu pi, nimb' omorabu,   
Aye koransibie nimb' omorabu.

  **2.**   
Aye Yeso ondigererie bono,   
Erio mbe ekeng'wanso kere moyo;   
Narure bionsi as'ore, n'omoyo,   
Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.

  **3.**   
'Monen' one inche nagosoroire,   
Ninkoganyete as' amagoro ao;   
Onsibie bono n'amanyinga oka,   
Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.

  **4.**   
'Monene nigo nkoganyete aye,   
Nyasae ontonger' omoy' omuya;   
Abakogochera tori kobanga,   
Onsibie bono imbe omorabu.

title: 162 Ngocha Nd' Omosalaba
markdown:
### 162 Ngocha Nd' Omosalaba   

  **1.**   
Ngocha nd' Omosalaba,   
Inch' Omwor' omouko;   
Natigire bi'ens'eye,   
Ntunyan' Omosalaba.   
 Nagwanchir' aye Yeso,   
Eng'ondi ya Kalwari;   
Nakunamir' as'ore   
Onkonye Omotoria.

  **2.**   
Nakorereira mono,   
Nabuirwe n'ebibe;   
Yes' otebire bori,   
"Nindabitinyie bionsi".

  **3.**   
Bionsi narur' as'ore,   
Ribaga ne chinguru;   
'Nkoro yane narure,   
Bibe biao botambe:

  **4.**   
Yeso nache naende!   
Naisanek' as'are,   
Ker' oyor' omochenu,   
Motogie Omotoria.

title: 163 Omonene Ndigeti' Eke
markdown:
### 163 Omonene Ndigeti' Eke   

  **1.**   
Omonene ndigetie eke,   
Kiagera nakomocheire,   
As'omorero n'amache,   
Onsibie mono kegima.   
 Onsibie ime naisiko;   
Gos'as'omorer' onsibie,   
'S'encher' ende yonsi nsibie;   
'Bibe bikwe ime yane.

  **2.**   
Koranyoroki' oborori,   
Ninyare kogoko mono,   
Kondabe n'enkor'enchenu,   
mbuy' ase nde,   
mbuy' ase nde.

  **3.**   
Bun'enkor' ey'er'enchenu,   
mbe n'oborori obonge;   
Naki as' obogima bwao,   
Ndor'ebinto ebichenu.

  **4.**   
Omonene natemire,   
gotanga ay'ar'amabe;   
Korende tinkonyara pi,   
gwechena nche omonyene.

title: 164 Gwachir' Ase Yeso?
markdown:
### 164 Gwachir' Ase Yeso?   

  **1.**   
Gwachir' ase Yes' as'ogosibigwa?   
Gwasibigwe n'amanying' aye;   
Mbwegenete obuya bwaye bono?   
Gwasibigw' as' amanying' aye.   
 'Manyinga y'eng'ondi'   
Gwasibekir' as' amanyinga?   
Ngobo chiao tichiri na kemoa?   
Gwasibigw' as' amanying' aye?

  **2.**   
Ngotar' ore botambe n'Omotoria,   
Gwasibigwe n'amanying' aye?   
Ngotimok' ore as' oyobambetwe,   
Gwasibigw' as' amanying'aye?

  **3.**   
Chingobo chiao nchirab' Ere kagocha,   
chichenek' as'amanying' aye?   
Mbwebeke ang'e ase obomenyo,   
N'osibigw' as' amanying' aye?

  **4.**   
Rusia chingobo chire na ebibe,   
Osibigw' as' amanying' Aye?   
Ensoko ner' egosibia enkoro,   
Osibek' as' amanying' Aye.

title: 165 Natayayire Kegima
markdown:
### 165 Natayayire Kegima   

  **1.**   
Natayayire kegima,   
Nkoirana nde;   
Natebanire ebibe,   
Nkoirana nde.   
 Nkoirana, gocha nka,   
Intatayaye;   
As' obwanchani Bwao,   
Ong'iranie nka.

  **2.**   
Nasiriri 'emiak'emenge,   
nkoirana nde;   
Neitirie n'amariga,   
Nkoirana nde.

  **3.**   
Narosire as' ebibe,   
Nkoirana nde;   
Nyegen' engan' obwanchani,   
Nkoirana nde.

  **4.**   
Nakw' ogosemeria kwane,   
Nkoirana nde;   
Ing'a Yes' er' onkwerete,   
Nkoirana nde.

  **5.**   
Ninganeti' amanying' ao,   
Nkoirana nde;   
Onsibie ndabe kegima,   
Nkoirana nde.

title: 166 'Motori' Agantebia
markdown:
### 166 'Motori' Agantebia   

  **1.**   
Motori' agantebia:   
'Nguru chiao chinke,   
Renda na gosaba,   
Nko' ebinto bionsi.   
 Agaakana, esira yonsi   
Ebibe bigansiria,   
Er' akabisibia.

  **2.**   
'Monene nanyora   
'Nguru chiao chioka;   
Chionchor' omobe   
're n'enkor'enkong'u.

  **3.**   
Timbwati ekiya,   
Ndanyorer' obuya,   
Nsibie ngobo yane,   
S' amanying' eng'ondi.

  **4.**   
'Bosio bw'ekerogo,   
Nintenene buya,   
Ebiegwa biane   
Nimbek' ase Yesu.

title: 167 Yes' As' Omosalaba
markdown:
### 167 Yes' As' Omosalaba   

  **1.**   
Yes' as' omosalaba,   
Nensoko engiya   
Ekogweni' oborwaire,   
Korw' ria Kalvari.   
 Kalvari, Kalvari,   
'Gotogia botambe,   
'Nkoro yan' etimoke,   
As'oroche ng'umbu.

  **2.**   
Agw' as' omosalaba,   
Nkanyor' amabera;   
'Ng'enang'eni ya mambia,   
'Ndaberi' amasaria.

  **3.**   
Ang' as' omosalaba,   
Ng'ondi ya Nyasae   
Nkonye ntare botambe,   
'S' ekiriria kiao.

  **4.**   
Ang' as' omosalaba,   
Nganye, nsemeretie,   
Goika ng'ike ens'eria,   
As' oroche ng'umbu.

title: 168 Bionsi Namoeire Yeso
markdown:
### 168 Bionsi Namoeire Yeso   

  **1.**   
Bionsi namoeire Yeso,   
'Moyo bwonsi narure;   
Mwanche amatuko onsi,   
Meny'asare botambe.   
 Bionsi as'ore,   
Bionsi as'ore,   
Bionsi as'ore,   
'Motoria, Narure bono.

  **2.**   
Bionsi namoeire Yeso,   
Natung'amir' as'ore,   
Nyetig' emegoko y'ense,   
Yeso ng'ire as'ore.

  **3.**   
Bionsi namoeire Yeso,   
Nimb' oyoo botambe;   
Tiga nyigwe ay'Omoika,   
Manye Aye noyone.

  **4.**   
Bionsi namoeire Yeso,   
Bono namororire,   
'Mogoko bw'ogotorigwa,   
Ntogie Erieta riao.

title: 169 Nosiboke Korwa As' Ebibe
markdown:
### 169 Nosiboke Korwa As' Ebibe   

  **1.**   
Nosiboke korwa as'ebibe?   
'Manyinga nare ne chinguru   
Nobibue ebib' ore nabio?   
Amanyinga ye chinguru.   
 Ne chinguru chia ogokumia;   
'Manyinga y'eng'ondi   
Ne chinguru chia ogokumia;   
As' amanyinga y'eng'ondi.

  **2.**   
Nosiboke korwa ogochaya?   
'Manyinga nare ne chinguru   
'Nchw' osibigwe aria Kalwari;   
Amanyinga' Aye chinguru.

  **3.**   
N'ocheneke na koraba mono?   
'Manyinga nare ne chinguru   
Ebimoa bi'ebibe bisire,   
Amanying' Aye chinguru.

  **4.**   
N'omokorer' Omogambi Yeso?   
'Manyinga nare ne chinguru   
Kera rituk' aye n'omotogie?   
Amanying' Aye chinguru.

title: 170 Nareo Onyanchete
markdown:
### 170 Nareo Onyanchete   

  **1.**   
Nareo onyanchet' agakw' agantoria   
Inch' omonyabibe mbe moyo   
Nchera Y' omosalab' akerua gotacha   
Bibe biane bionsi biaberwe.   
 Bionsi biabambirwe,   
Bionsi biabambirwe   
Agancha ere kobogoria   
N' oboror' obonge   
Yeso anyorete   
Kabibogori' ebibe biane.

  **2.**   
Nig' are omworor' omoremereria   
Ogochena enkoro yane,   
Tindi na ekina n' omosibore nde,   
Kebibe biane biabambirwe.

  **3.**   
'Menye as' Omotoria tinkomotiga,   
Ntare n' omogoko botambe,   
Nintere n'omonwa   
Goter' as' enkoro,   
Ebibe biane biabambirwe.

title: 171 Kwarosir' Aye?
markdown:
### 171 Kwarosir' Aye?   

  **1.**   
Kwarosir' aye na gochandeka?   
Motebie Yeso, Motebie Yeso;   
Gwechander' ayakona goeta?   
Motebie Yeso bweka.   
 Motebie Yeso, Motebie Yeso;   
N'omosani 'manyire,   
Tori na Mosani onde bun' Ere,   
Motebie Yeso bweka.

  **2.**   
Nig'okonakoiyeri' amariga?   
Motebie Yeso, Motebie Yeso;   
Nobwate ebibe bia bobisi?   
Motebie Yeso bweka.

  **3.**   
Kwoboire emechand' emenge,   
Motebie Yeso, motebie Yeso;   
Nig'ogwechandera aya ankio,   
Motebie Yeso bweka.

  **4.**   
Nigo kwarengereirie ogokwa?   
Motebie Yeso, motebie Yeso;   
Kwaganiri' obogambi bwa Kristo,   
Motebie Yeso bweka.

title: 172 'Bogima Mbore Omosalaba
markdown:
### 172 'Bogima Mbore Omosalaba   

  **1.**   
Bogima mbore Omosolaba,   
Yes'ateba "Ndigererie"   
'Nibo y'ense nig'ere bosa,   
Enibo engiya nase Yeso.   
 Rigereria Kalwari   
(rigereria kalwari),   
Onyore obogima   
(onyore obogima);   
Obogima bwa bosa   
(obogima bwa bosa),   
Rigereria kalwari   
(rigereria kaiwari rigereria).

  **2.**   
Nkarigereri' Omotoria one,   
Nere agansasokera;   
'Ker'amatemw' agonchichera,   
Nindigererie Omosalaba.

  **3.**   
Ndigereri'Omosalaba rioka,   
Nyegen'eira ya Nyasae;   
Onde takogw' as' amatemwa   
'yo bwegenete nguru chia igoro.

title: 173 Korabe Nyancha Ime
markdown:
### 173 Korabe Nyancha Ime   

  **1.**   
Korabe nyancha ime as'omwaga,   
Aroro okage gwaisire gokwa;   
Chaka kobara ebisio obwate,   
Nokumie mon' obuya bwa Nyasae.   
 Bar' ebisio, 'kemo ekemo,   
Many' eki Nyasa' atomire,   
Bar' ebisio, 'kemo ekemo,   
Nokumie 'buya bwa Nyasae mono.

  **2.**   
Korabe kwarosire n'egurube,   
Gokwarengereirie kwabuirwe,   
Chaka kobara ebiso obwate,   
'Mogoko ay' ogotera nonyore.

  **3.**   
Ker'okorora enibo y'abande,   
Inyor' eira y'enibo ya Kristo,   
Bar'ebisi' otagore ne chibesa,   
Ng'eria yao nenka ere igoro.

  **4.**   
Igo as'esegi tagoichana,   
Nyasa'ere bwanchire gotokonya,   
Bar'ebisio 'malaika mbabeo,   
Mbagokonye goika omoerio.

title: 174 Namwanchire Yeso Bweka
markdown:
### 174 Namwanchire Yeso Bweka   

  **1.**   
Namwanchire Yeso bweka,   
Naigur' amang'an' Aye   
Tinkoiroka gento kende ko   
namwanchire Yeso.   
 Namwanchire, namwanchire   
nanchir' amang'ana 'ye   
Namwanchire, namwanchire   
nanchir' amang'ana 'ye

  **2.**   
'Bibe biane moe Yeso   
'nsibirie n'amanyinga   
Nandende amatuk' onsi   
'kong'iki' ase Nyasae.

  **3.**   
Bono tinkoiroka kende,   
'nkoro yakwegenire   
Nchera neba omosunte,   
Yeso omorekire.

  **4.**   
Nkoro namoeire Yeso,   
nomober' one bwonsi   
'Matuk' onsi nanganyete,   
ang'ire omochi' oye.

title: 175 'Gosemeria Kw'Omokristo
markdown:
### 175 'Gosemeria Kw'Omokristo   

  **1.**   
Gosemeria kw' Omokristo,   
'Kero are ense.   
Koremia enkoro buya,   
Ense y' obororo.   
Koremia enkoro buya,   
Ense y'obororo.

  **2.**   
Gotworokia ens' engiya,   
'Baya baramenye.   
Toumerane n'abaya,   
Totatananeke   
Toumerane n'abaya,   
Totatananeke

  **3.**   
Ens' ebibe bitachiche,   
Amatemwa taiyo,   
Omogoko nomenyeo,   
Otaere rinde   
Omogoko nomenyeo,   
Otaere rinde

  **4.**   
Amariga takobao,   
Amakweri taiyo   
Abamenyi bagwekane   
Abamalaika   
Abamenyi bagwekane   
Abamalaika

  **5.**   
Amatuko era bwango,   
'Motoria nchwo bwango!   
Ntoganetie gokorora,   
Buna ore aye,   
Nagoika nka Igoro,   
Enka y'omogoko.

title: 176 'Mbura Netwe Korwa Igoro
markdown:
### 176 'Mbura Netwe Korwa Igoro   

  **1.**   
'Mbura netwe korwa lgoro,   
Neira y'obwanchani;   
Eyekomenta chinguru,   
chikorw' as'Omotoria.   
 Mbura y'ebisio,   
nero ntwe toganetie;   
Nonya gwatoir'amabera,   
ko nembura twasaba.

  **2.**   
"Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"   
Ekobokia chinkoro;   
'S'amagoko n'ebitunwa,   
'riogi ri'embur'enyinge.

  **3.**   
"Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"   
'Monene toyetwerie;   
Erio tonyore chinguru,   
Oikeranie eira.

  **4.**   
"Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"   
Tagototweria rero!   
Twatore amamoch'aito,   
Tokorangerie Yeso.

title: 177 Kemechando Eragoetanane
markdown:
### 177 Kemechando Eragoetanane   

  **1.**   
Kemechando eragoetanane,   
'nchera 'sobosio bwao nomosunte;   
'Borabu bosesenirie na Yeso:   
Koraborore nobue amatemwa.   
 Rora 'borabu bokobara,   
Oborabu boseri'obwoba;   
Rora Yeso 'mosunt'otame:   
Omwegene Yeso ng'ang'ar' as'ore.

  **2.**   
Nony'aye tomanyeti egurube,   
'Chandete bogima bwao as'ense;   
Beka omosalaba bosio bwao:   
Mwegene Yes'ase chinchera chionsi.

  **3.**   
Genda nokwegen'obu'amatemwa,   
Manya Yeso 'motoria nkomo more;   
'Segi neb' enkong'u tokwa omoyo:   
'Motori' orire eira yobobui.

  **4.**   
'Segi neba ndoro yogoichania,   
'Matemwa amanene arakobue;   
'Monene ng'ang'ar' akoe chinguru:   
Chiokobua 'matemwa 'racha 'sore.

title: 178 'Ker' Arache
markdown:
### 178 'Ker' Arache   

  **1.**   
'Ker'arache, 'Ker'arache   
'sangereri abaye;   
Abare abana baye,   
Abanchwa baye.   
 Buna ching'enang'eni,   
mbarab' as'egutwa   
Bamekameke buya,   
's'egutwa yaye.

  **2.**   
Nasangereri' Ere bwango,   
Abanchw' as'obonda;   
Chilulu 'kobara mono   
Abanchwa baye.

  **3.**   
Abana bonsi abake,   
'Banchet' Omotoria;   
Nabwo chilulu chingiya,   
Abanchwa baye.

title: 179 'Nkoro Yao Yamigirwe
markdown:
### 179 'Nkoro Yao Yamigirwe   

  **1.**   
'Nkoro yao yamigirwe,   
'baga ndiy'ase Yeso?   
Gwasibirwe n'ebi'ense,   
'baga ndiy'ase Yeso?   
Ngesieri ateneine,   
Gotur'omoigorere,   
Igwa ngosoror'are,   
'baga ndiy'ase Yeso?

  **2.**   
Gwasiria nsa chingiya,   
chiogokor' emeremo?   
Nakoe chinguru,   
chiogokor' emeremo.   
Takobugwa nebibe,   
bakony'abasaririe,   
Barigie abasiru,   
Kae Yeso ribaga.

  **3.**   
Ay'okorigi' ebi'ense,   
Kae Yeso ribaga;   
Tori na ibaga rinde,   
Komokorera Yeso.   
Emegoko n'enibo,   
Ebinto bi'ense mbosa,   
Gwechand' as'okwegokia,   
kae Yeso ribaga.

  **4.**   
Ekero totameti,   
chimbusuro chia Yeso;   
'Maboko are bosa,   
Rituko rie rigesa.   
Ntori na gento kende,   
'meremo yaito mbosa;   
Ntokonyora kogoka,   
Gatoramoror'Ere.

title: 180 Engaki Engiya Mono
markdown:
### 180 Engaki Engiya Mono   

  **1.**   
Engaki engiya mono,   
Bachenu bacha amo;   
K'Omotori' ar'eganga,   
'Kero bakomotera.

  **2.**   
Totere obwanchani,   
bwamosugetie Tata;   
Aroch'ens'etaraba,   
Akamoru' Omwan' oye.

  **3.**   
Ter'ogwancha kw'Omwana,   
bun' atigete igoro;   
Akaba buna tore,   
Agakwa atotorie.

  **4.**   
Obwanchani bw'Omoika,   
kwororobia chinkoro;   
Kero tware nobwoba,   
Gatoa Omotoria.

  **5.**   
Engaki engiya mono,   
'Bachenu baumerane;   
Yeso nabe eganga,   
Bamotere botambe.

title: 181 'Monen'Omobas' One
markdown:
### 181 'Monen'Omobas' One   

  **1.**   
'Monen'Omobas'one, nki ndairoke?   
Mobaso, botuko nare nainche;   
Ner'ogontoria korw' as'emechando,   
Nogosorora kw' Omoik' aretire.   
 'Monen' Omobaso, mogok'one;   
'Mobaso, botuk'ere nandae,   
'Manen'Omobaso, 'mogok'one,   
'Mobaso na botuko nandae.

  **2.**   
Monen'Omobaso'one, 'mare nacha,   
As'okwegena, nindore igoro;   
'Se Yes' Akogamba as'obonene,   
Naki ndatigar' Omosunte ime.

  **3.**   
Monen'Omobas'one, 'nguru chiane;   
Ase chinguru chiaye nimbue;   
'Maber' atubir' oboreu bwane,   
'S'okwegena ntare nere ker'ensa.

  **4.**   
Monen' Omobas'one, mbionsi ase nde,   
As'are ere mosunte toiyo;   
N'Omobori'Omogambi one,   
Nche ninkobake n'abachenu bande.

title: 182 Yeso Nkwegenete
markdown:
### 182 Yeso Nkwegenete   

  **1.**   
Yeso nkwegenete,   
'Manwa ya Kalwari,   
Omotoria:   
'Gw'ogosaba bono,   
Onsibie ebibe,   
Mb'Oyoo kegima   
korwa rero.

  **2.**   
Buya bwa' obonge,   
bomente chinguru,   
'Nkoro yane;   
Buna gwankwerete,   
Bwanchani as'ore,   
Bob'obochenu pi   
bore moyo.

  **2.**   
Naetananire,   
ime y'emechando,   
Ay'ondae;   
Seria Omosunte,   
Ontinyi' amariga,   
Tontiga ntayaye   
korw' as'ore.

title: 183 Tat'O Igoro Namanyete
markdown:
### 183 Tat'O Igoro Namanyete   

  **1.**   
Tat'O Igoro namanyete,   
'Merind'eratange nchera;   
Naserie chitang'utangu,   
'Mosunt'obe omobaso,   
'Mosunt'obe omobaso.   
 Omanyir' emerind'   
erantangen nchera;   
(Omanyire, ekeen'   
emerind'erantang'enchera yane)   
Omanyire, Atang'embeo kogusa,   
(Omanyire, ekeene,   
Atange embeo ekogusa)

  **2.**   
Tat'O Igoro namanyete,   
'Riogo rikogweni' obobe;   
N'ogokuna kw'obwanchani,   
Agweni'enkor'eye yane,   
Agweni'enkor'eye yane.

  **3.**   
Tat'O Igoro namanyete,   
Buna ntabu' ababisa;   
Narend' Okwegena kwane,   
Andende goik'omoerio,   
Andende goik'omoerio.

  **4.**   
Tat'O Igoro namanyete,   
K'orogendo rokoera;   
Tiga eker'ekio Tata,   
Ntoke nyebiset' as'ore,   
Ntoke nyebiset' as'ore.

title: 184 Nimba Omobe Mono
markdown:
### 184 Nimba Omobe Mono   

  **1.**   
Nimba omobe mono,   
Yes'ere nankwerete;   
Agakwa inkonyeke,   
Agakwa imbe moyo,   
Buna rit' as'omote,   
Imbe nere botambe.

  **2.**   
Obwanchani bwa Yeso,   
Botambe gochia igoro   
Bwaetania chindiba,   
Boreo korwa kare,   
'Bwanchani bwanyorete,   
'Kero nche nasirete.

  **3.**   
Nimba omobe mono,   
Kristo mbionsi ase nde;   
Omanyir,Okogania,   
Biane bionsi nebiaye,   
Nandende korwa ense,   
Ongacheir' Obogima.

title: 185 Nche Ninkoganetie
markdown:
### 185 Nche Ninkoganetie   

  **1.**   
Nche ninkoganetie, 'Kero gionsi   
Riogi rinde ndiri, Ri'omorembe.   
 Yeso nakorigirie, Nkorigetie rioka   
Nsesenie Omotoria, Nagocheire.

  **2.**   
Nche ninkoganetie, Omber' ange'   
'Matemwa tambua, Ker' or' ange'.

  **3.**   
Nche Ninkoganetie, 'S' obororo   
Nchwo bwang' obe nainche,   
'Rio tinsara.

  **4.**   
Nche ninkoganetie, Onyorokie,   
Ne chiira chiao, Kor' ase nde.

  **5.**   
Nche ninkorigetie, Omochenu   
Onkore mb'oyoo, Yes' omuya.

title: 186 Ekero Nkoba n'Omorembe Nchera
markdown:
### 186 Ekero Nkoba n'Omorembe Nchera   

  **1.**   
Ekero nkoba n'omorembe nchera,   
'Bororo bun' emerindo   
'Se kende gionsi aye kwanyorokirie,   
Goteba nga Mbuy'as'enkoro.   
 Imbuya . . . 'S'enkoro;   
Imbuya Imbuy' as' enkoro.

  **2.**   
Nonya Saitani naisa gontema,   
Ninyeremie ekiagera   
Kristo ororir' obwororo bwane,   
Okure as' ebibe biane.

  **3.**   
'Bibe biane bionsi gose tai bike,   
Biabambirw' Omosalaba   
Tinkoragererigwa as'ebibe,   
Motogi' Omonen' Omoy'one.

  **4.**   
Omonen' ayereri' ogocha kwao,   
'Goro rioba ndimanoke,   
'Konu nebug'ogocha Kw'Omonene,   
Nonyaigo mbuya as'enkoro.

title: 187 Gotara Na Yeso
markdown:
### 187 Gotara Na Yeso   

  **1.**   
Gotara na Yeso,   
as' eriarakwane,   
Enchera yaito morekire;   
Gokor' ayanchete,   
Namenye naintwe,   
Na baria, bonsi baregene.   
 Okwegena, encher' ende teiyo;   
Y'omogok' ase Yeso: Egene oigwere.

  **2.**   
Ntori n'omusunte,   
Nony' amare taiyo,   
Ere bweka obirusirie;   
'Tang'utang'u nchiyo,   
Nonya n'amariga,   
Gatoregene na Koigwera.

  **3.**   
Ntori n'egurube,   
n'obororo bwonsi,   
'Meremo yait' atoakane;   
Emechando teiyo,   
n'ogweitia nkoiyo,   
Nogosesenia 'S' okoigwera.

  **4.**   
Titokoenekia,   
obwanchani bwaye,   
Goika twerure Kegima;   
As'ogwanchereria,   
n'omogok' arure,   
Nebiab' abaramoigwere.

  **5.**   
As' okobwatana,   
toikarans' as'are.   
Gose totare amo nere;   
Kor'ekiaratebe,   
Gend'as' arachike,   
Toirok' egene, n'oigwere.

title: 188 Mbuya Komwegena Yeso
markdown:
### 188 Mbuya Komwegena Yeso   

  **1.**   
Mbuya komwegena Yeso,   
Ase ring'ana riaye,   
"Gwanch' eira na komanya",   
Otebir' Omonene.   
 Yeso naki mwegenete,   
Moenekie botambe;   
Yeso, Yes'Omuya Yeso,   
Nimente komomanya.

  **2.**   
O mbuya kwegena Yeso,   
'S' amanying' agosibia,   
'S' okwegena nantobeke,   
'S' amanying' okogwenia.

  **3.**   
Mbuya komwegena Yeso,   
ntig'ebibe kegima,   
'Se Yeso nyor'obogima,   
motimoko mogoko.

  **4.**   
Nagokire nkwegenete,   
'Muya Yes' Omosani,   
Namanyire nore nainche,   
Nobe nainche botambe.

title: 189 Naki Yes' Ar'omosani
markdown:
### 189 Naki Yes' Ar'omosani   

  **1.**   
Naki Yes' ar' Omosani,   
Koimoki'ebibe biaito!   
Ngesio ki koa Nyasae,   
Bionsi as'ogosaba.   
Morembe ki togosiria   
Birukunyo twaimokia,   
'Kiagera titomoeti   
Nyasa' as'ogosaba.

  **2.**   
Gose ntore n'amatemwa?   
Mochando nore ande?   
Ntokw' omoyo toirere,   
Monen' as' ogosaba   
Ntonyor' Omosani omuya,   
Torasang' obororo   
Yes' omanyir' oboreu,   
Moe as' ogosaba.

  **3.**   
Ntor' aboro n'egurube,   
Gochandwa n'okogania   
'Motoria nobotamero,   
Moe as' ogosaba   
Basani mbagotamire?   
Motebi' as'ogosaba   
Nakoagat' agokenge,   
Nonyor' omosasoko.

title: 190 'Monene Tari Ebi' Ankio
markdown:
### 190 'Monene Tari Ebi' Ankio   

  **1.**   
'Monene tari ebi'ankio,   
Ingosaba   
Nyasae ndende timocha,   
Rero rioka   
Nkonye nkore emeremo,   
Na gosaba   
Nkwane na oboitongo,   
Rero Tata.

  **2.**   
Tinkor' okogania kwane,   
'Mwango koigwa   
Onkonye inyare koigwa,   
Rero Tata   
Tinkwana ayan' amabe,   
Bwango bwango   
Mbwate ebikoba biane,   
Boire pi.

  **3.**   
Kero kende mb' omokiru,   
kende ngoke   
Nyegene obuya bwao,   
Rero Tata   
Monene tari ebi'ankio   
Ingosaba   
Ndende, Ondae, Onyanche,   
Boire pi.

title: 191 Monen' Omorisia
192 Rigi' Ob' Omochenu
markdown:
### 192 Rigi' Ob' Omochenu   

  **1.**   
Rigi' ob' omochenu,   
'Kwane na Nyasae,   
'Be Nere na koria,   
ring'ana'riaye;   
Okor' obosani,   
okony'aboro,   
'Tari kweba kende,   
origi' ebisio.

  **2.**   
Rigi' ob' omochenu,   
'Nse nkoagag' ere,   
Obe aye bweka,   
Amo na Yeso;   
Komoroche Yeso,   
Nomogwekane,   
'Banto mbamorore,   
'Se chimbwa chiao.

  **3.**   
Rigi' ob' omochenu,   
'B' Omorai oo,   
Tomotang'anera   
kende na keba;   
'Mogok', obororo,   
Mobwatie Yeso,   
Komoroche Yeso,   
'Ncha ng'ana Yaye.

  **4.**   
Rigi' ob'omochenu,   
Otoerere,   
Ebirengererio,   
biragwe Nere;   
Oragwe n'Omoika,   
As'obwanchani,   
Bwango nogwenere,   
'Meremo Igoro.

title: 193 Igwa Amang'ana A Yeso
markdown:
### 193 Igwa Amang'ana A Yeso   

  **1.**   
Igwa amang'ana a Yeso,   
'Mang'an' obogima bori   
Otari gosaba, igwa inyora,   
Basesenigw' abagokora.   
 Ababwatete amachik' Aye,   
Mbare negesio negesio   
Ababwetete amachik' Aye,   
Mbuya, mbuya, mbuya bare.

  **2.**   
Koigwa bosa nkori kende,   
chiira nachibe bosa   
Kobigwa, kwoboa, mbigototoria,   
Basesenigw' abagokora.

  **3.**   
Baso' omochie n'omogoko,   
Abachenu abasera   
Basibekire bare n'obonene,   
Barie Omote bw'obogima.

title: 194 Tar' Enchera Y'Omonene
markdown:
### 194 Tar' Enchera Y'Omonene   

  **1.**   
Tar' enchera y'Omonene,   
'Korae botambe   
Omoik' oye korwa igoro,   
Oseri' omosunte   
 Tar' enchera, Tar' enchera   
(Tara ase oborabu bwa Nyasae,   
Tara ase oborabu bwa Nyasae)   
Tar' enchera   
(Tara ase oborabu bwa Nyasae)   
Tar' enchera ya Nyasae.

  **2.**   
Tar' omobaso bw'Enjili,   
okorwa igoro   
Okorae kor'omoke,   
'Mwegeni o Nyasae.

  **3.**   
Tar' omobaso, 'mosunte,   
Noribia boeto;   
Omosunte norasire   
Emiaka n'emiaka.

  **4.**   
Tar' omobaso omanye,   
Nyasa' Omwanchani;   
Obwanchani nabokine,   
Igoro bokume.

title: 195 And'onsi Na Yeso
markdown:
### 195 And'onsi Na Yeso   

  **1.**   
And'onsi na Yeso nigo ndagende,   
Karantang'an' and'onsi as'ens'eye;   
Mogoko tori Monene ataiyo,   
And'onsi na Yeso tindi nche bweka.   
 And'onsi, and'onsi tindi kwoboa,   
And'onsi na Yeso nigo ndagende.

  **2.**   
And'onsi na Yeso tindi nche bweka,   
Basani mbantiga Ere noyone;   
Karanda' ase chinchera chinkong'u,   
And'onsi nimosasim' Omotoria.

  **3.**   
And'onsi na Yeso ningende ndare,   
'Mosunte nimoinyore Omonene;   
Tingosira korwa enchera yaye,   
And'onsi na Yeso nimenye n'Ere.

title: 196 Yeso N'Omosani Omuya
markdown:
### 196 Yeso N'Omosani Omuya   

  **1.**   
Yeso n'Omosani omuya,   
Ekero okobugwa n'ense   
Nakogwenie omoyo,   
Nagokoa chinguru   
Yeso n'Omosani omuya.   
 Yeso nomosani omuya   
(Yes' omosani, Omosani omuya)   
Yeso nomosani omuya   
(Yes' ornosani, Omosani omuya)   
Nagokonye gokogwa,   
Nakoigwe gokorangeria   
Nomosani obuete bonsi.

  **2.**   
Yeso n'Omosani obuete!   
Andemia na kong' omorembe;   
Ambwate n'okoboko,   
Tinkoiroka kende,   
Yeso n'Omosani omuya.

  **3.**   
Nimba nomoichan' omonge,   
Nonya namakweri nachicha,   
Tinkoigwa kende,   
Omotoria ng'ang' are   
Yeso n'Omosani omuya.

title: 197 Kae' Mbeo' Bwoba
markdown:
### 197 Kae' Mbeo' Bwoba   

  **1.**   
Kae'mbeo 'bwoba,   
Rema osemeria,   
Tat'omanyir' obororo,   
Nakoimokie igoro.

  **2.**   
Goet'emechando,   
'Koroseri'enchera,   
Gany'engaki yaye   
botuko bob'omobaso.

  **3.**   
Tiger'Omonene   
anche na gochika   
Motayayi nob'oyoye,   
Ere nomong'aini.

  **4.**   
Ogosemia kwaye,   
nokonene mono   
Gakorire emerem'   
eyio yakwoboetie.

title: 198 Yes' Omorisi' Oito
markdown:
### 198 Yes' Omorisi' Oito   

  **1.**   
Yes' Omorisi' oito,   
Tinyi' amariga;   
Gatore as'are,   
Nki toroboe?   
Tomotunye rioka,   
'S' aratorae;   
Gochia as' eroro,   
Gos' oborisia.

  **2.**   
Yes' Omorisi' oito,   
Twamany'eriogi;   
Okomanya kwaye,   
Gwatogokirie   
Nig' akogorora,   
As' obwororo;   
Ner' oratorae,   
Nabaye tore.

  **3.**   
Yes' Omorisi' oito,   
Otokwerete,   
Gaiter' amanyinga,   
'Se ker' eng'ondi   
Ker' eyem' abeka,   
Kemanyererio;   
'Tebir' "Ab' Omoika,   
Abwo nabane".

  **4.**   
Yes' Omorisi' oito,   
Otorendire;   
'Bibengi nabicha,   
Tibigotora   
'Mwenya bw'amakweri,   
Ogotwoboyia;   
Ntokwobo' obobe,   
'Babui b'embera.

title: 199 Ens' Engiya Y'ogosaba
markdown:
### 199 Ens' Engiya Y'ogosaba   

  **1.**   
Ens' engiya y'ogosaba,   
Kondusi' ense y'emechando   
Nakong'ira ase Tata,   
Motebie kogania kwane   
Ekero nde n'obororo,   
Moy'on'onyor' okoremia   
Erio mbua omotemi,   
Ens' engiya y'ogosaba.

  **2.**   
Ense engiya y'ogosaba,   
Ira gosorora kwane   
Gochi' as' Ere omwegenwa,   
Oyokoru' ogosesenia   
'Ntebirie morigererie,   
Nyegene 'Ng'ana n'obuya   
Nimoe ker' ogwechanda,   
Nganyet' Ensa y'ogosaba.

  **3.**   
Ens' engiya y'ogosaba,   
Nyore okoremia kwao   
Korw' egetunwa gia Pisga,   
Ndor'enka yane ndagende   
'S' obogima nintenene,   
Mbwat' ekeegwa gia kare   
Ng'ak' eriogi as' embeo,   
"Mbuya Ensa y'ogosaba".

title: 200 'Nsa Ngiya Y'ogosaba
201 Ningotunye Omotoria
markdown:
### 201 Ningotunye Omotoria   

  **1.**   
Ningotunye Omotoria,   
And' ons' as' okong'ira   
As' ogochia ninkobwatie,   
Monene ningotunye.   
 Ningotunye Omotoria,   
Ogankwer' as' omote   
Banto bonsi mbagotiga,   
'S'obuya ningotunye.

  **2.**   
Nonya n'enchera erembe,   
Bun'emerindo nyancha   
Gwatang'anire enchera,   
N'omogoko ngotunye.

  **3.**   
Nimba n'emechand' emenge,   
Nintemwa mono mono   
Nainyoir' Aye ngwatemetwe,   
'S' omochengo ngotunye.

  **4.**   
Nimba n'oboror' obonge,   
Ntigire omotaka   
Nomanyet' emechand'ense,   
Nindigetie ngotunye.

  **5.**   
Ning'eta as' amatemwa,   
Aye nig'okondaa   
Ngwaetet' as' emechando,   
Nche ningotunye rioka.

title: 202 Ntererie Roik' Abaminto
markdown:
### 202 Ntererie Roik' Abaminto   

  **1.**   
Nterene riok'abaminto,   
Mang'an' obogima   
Ndore obosera bwaye,   
Mang'an' obogima   
Amang'an' amaya,   
Nyegeri' okwegena.   
 Namasera, y'ogokumia;   
Mang'an'obogima,   
Mamasera, yo'ogokumia.

  **2.**   
Yes 'omuya otoeire,   
Mang'an'obogima   
Monyabibe tegerera,   
Mang'an' obogima   
Otoeire bosa,   
Tong'uswe gochia nka.

  **3.**   
Tiga bono toyarandie,   
Mang'an' obogima   
'Korua kwabera, Morembe,   
Mang'an' obogima   
Yeso Omoboria,   
Tochene botambe.

title: 203 Buna Nde
markdown:
### 203 Buna Nde   

  **1.**   
Tindi na egetamero,   
Manying'ao 'ngitekera,   
Gwantebirie nchich' as'or'   
Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

  **2.**   
Buna nde intaganyeti   
Gwetinyi 'Omoy'on' ekebe,   
Manyingao 'tinyi 'ebibe   
Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

  **3.**   
Buna nde nkorutwarutwa,   
Nechitang'u tang'u chionsi,   
'Segi ime bwoba 'sik   
'Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

  **4.**   
Nd'Omotaka omouko,   
Kogweni' ebirengererio,   
Nakwo nganetie as'or'   
Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

  **5.**   
Buna nde Aye nong'ire,   
Ondosi 'onyaber 'onsibie,   
Negenir'eira yao   
Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

  **6.**   
Buna nde Bwanchani bwao,   
Bwatagoire Ker'etoto,   
Bono mb'oyoo kegim'   
Eng'ondi ya Nyasae, Nchiche.

title: 204 Naigw'eriogi Riao
markdown:
### 204 Naigw'eriogi Riao   

  **1.**   
Naigw'eriogi riao,   
Kondangeria nchiche,   
Nsibigwe n'amanyinga o   
'Tegete Kalwari.   
 Ngochand' as'ore,   
Ngocha nde bono,   
Onsibi' as' amanyinga,   
'Tegete Kalwari.

  **2.**   
Nonya nche nd'omworo,   
nomente chinguru,   
Nonsibi 'obobe bwane pi,   
Goika mb'omochenu.

  **3.**   
Yeso ondangeirie,   
mb'omoikeranu,   
Gosemeria n'omorembe,   
As'ense na Igoro.

  **4.**   
Goker'amanyinga   
Buya bw'okoboria,   
Gokera Yes'Ekeegwa,   
Oboronge bwaito.

title: 205 Nche Nomwan'oo
markdown:
### 205 Nche Nomwan'oo   

  **1.**   
Nche nomwan' oo kwandangeirie,   
Many'obwanchani bwao;   
Ko nindigetie as'okwegena,   
Kong'uswa ang'e n' Aye.   
 Ng'usa ang'e (ang'e)   
ang' Omonene,   
Ase gwatokwerete;   
Ng'usa ang'e, ang'e,   
ang'Omonene,   
Nimbe naye botambe.

  **2.**   
Onchene bono as' emeremo,   
'S' okobua kw'obuya;   
Nkogaramer, erio ngosemerie,   
Kogania kob' as'ore.

  **3.**   
Mogoko bw'eng'aki er'enk as' ore,   
As 'ekerogo kiao;   
'Kero nkogosaba Nyasae One,   
Nkwana bun' omosani.

  **4.**   
N'obwanchani obonge nche ntamanye,   
Goika ng'amboke nyancha;   
Noreo mogoko nche ntamanye,   
Goika ntimok 'as'ore.

title: 206 Ira Ense Yonsi Ong'e  Yeso
markdown:
### 206 Ira Ense Yonsi Ong'e  Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ira ense yonsi ong'e   
Yes' omogoko one;   
'Bwanchani bwaye tibori   
Goonchoka nonya ng'ake.   
 'Maber' ay'ogokumia;   
Bwanchani bwaye obonge;   
Gotorigwa gw'ekeene,   
Kw'obogima botambe.

  **2.**   
Ira ense yonsi ong'e   
Yes' Omoremia one;   
Omotoria karandende,   
Ninter' as' emechando.

  **3.**   
Ira ense ong'e Yeso   
Ndor' omosasok' oye;   
Ase orogendo rwane,   
Amoreker' enchera.

  **4.**   
Ira ense yonsi ong'e   
Yes' Omosalab' one;   
Goik' Omonene ogocha,   
Morore as' obosio.

title: 207 Ir'obogima Bwane
markdown:
### 207 Ir'obogima Bwane    

  **1.**   
Ir'obogima bwane,   
Bochene bob'obwao,   
Ir'amaboko naro   
'kore bun'origetie.   
 Nsibi' as'amanying   
'Omotoria (Manying'aye),   
Nsibi' as' amanying'   
agochena (Agochena),   
'Monene narure bionsi as'ore,   
Bib'ebiao botambe.

  **2.**   
Ira amagor'ane,   
'B' amang' as'emeremo,   
Ira n'eriogi riane,   
Nter'ase Nyasae oka.

  **3.**   
Ir' ebikoba biane,   
Bikwan' ay'origetie,   
Ir'amo n'echinibo,   
Tindigetie kobisa.

  **4.**   
Ira chingaki chiane,   
Chikobake botambe,   
Ir'obong'aini bwane,   
Korer' ay'origetie.

  **5.**   
Ira Ogwancha kwane,   
Gokore kob'okwao,   
Ira n'enkoro yane,   
Eb'obomenyo bwao.

  **6.**   
Ir' obwanchani bwane,   
Nib' as'amagor'ao,   
Ir' omobere bwensi,   
noyoo bono bori.

title: 208 Ens'enyia Y'Omwando
209 Ong'use Ang'e N'aye Tata
markdown:
### 209 Ong'use Ang'e N'aye Tata   

  **1.**   
Ong'use ang'e n'Aye Tata,   
Nganeti'onyagate,   
Ang'e ase amabok'ao,   
Nyare gotimoka.   
 Ong'use n'obwanchani,   
(Ong'us' ong'use n'obwanchani),   
Ng'us' ang'e, Igor'as'ore   
(Ong'us n'obwanchani,   
Goch'as'ore Igoro,)   
Ng'usa ange Gocha as'ore.

  **2.**   
Ong'use ang'e Omotoria,   
Timba inche bweka,   
Ombwate n'okoboko kwao,   
Erio nintimoke.

  **3.**   
Ong'us' as' Omoik omuya.   
Erio nkogwekane;   
Onsibie, onchene, nindabe,   
Goika mbe omuya.

title: 210 Aye Nobe Buna Yeso
markdown:
### 210 Aye Nobe Buna Yeso   

  **1.**   
Aye nobe buna Yeso Omochenu pi?   
Notare n'Ere nchera enyerere?   
Aye nomoe chigurube chiao chionsi?   
Ancha agotang'ane.   
 Chinguru chiaye nchibe as'ore,   
Amanyinga aye nagosibie;   
Obwanchani Bwaye nobonyore,   
Ng'a mbuya, bwanche akorae bo.

  **2.**   
Nabwanche agosibore omotunyane?   
Nomanyete omoremb' okonyora?   
Nabwanche agokony' erio tocha gosira?   
Ancha agotang'ane.

  **3.**   
Nonyore obomenyo as' obonda Bwaye?   
Nabwanche komanya chinguru Chiaye?   
Botambe nokor' emeremo ne chinguru?   
Ancha agotang'ane.

title: 211 Yes' Omosalaba One
markdown:
### 211 Yes' Omosalaba One   

  **1.**   
Yes' omosalaba one,   
Bono naywetwekire;   
Ngotunyan' Omonen' one,   
Natigir' ebiens' eye.   
Tindengerereti enibo,   
Enibo y' ense eye:   
Inche nomonguru' as'ore,   
Monyamwando o Nyasae.

  **2.**   
Nonya ngochandek' ens' eye   
Ningaramere Yeso;   
'Mechando neba emenge,   
Nindemereri' as'ore.   
Emechando teri gento,   
Ninde n' obuya bwao,   
Nairaneirie mbuya mono,   
Ninyore bions' as'ore.

  **3.**   
'Nkoro ira obogima,   
'Konyek' amatuk' onsi;   
Obue ebibe n'obwoba,   
Gendereria emeremo,   
'Moika nore as'ore,   
N' Obwanchani bwa Tata,   
Omotoria nere oyoo,   
Ogokweret' omote.

  **4.**   
Oyominto ayerera,   
Bweboe okwegena,   
Bwebo' ebinto bi'esegi,   
Toraika ense enyia;   
Yeso nomotang'ani oo,   
Sab' asare botambe,   
'Ker' oraike Igoro,   
Nomogok' omonene.

title: 212 Nanchire Koba Omwan' Oye
markdown:
### 212 Nanchire Koba Omwan' Oye   

  **1.**   
Nanchire koba omwan' oye;   
Imanye enchera;   
Nkor' emeremo y' Omotoria,   
Onkonye bono.   
 Noyoo (Yeso), Noyoo (Yeso),   
Noyoo eye neira;   
Noyoo (Yeso), Noyoo (Yeso),   
Noyoo nde kegima.

  **2.**   
'Nibo y'ense ig' ere bosa,   
Otari aroro;   
Natigire bionsi kegima,   
Naye enibo.

  **3.**   
Kondatugut' ebinto bi'ense,   
Ika ang'e  nainche;   
Ebigochia kare as'ore,   
Binkonye inche.

title: 213 Okogacherwa Yeso
markdown:
### 213 Okogacherwa Yeso   

  **1.**   
"Okogacherwa Yeso,"   
Na nguru chia Nyasae   
Ndendwe korw' ebimoa,   
Ntare buna Yeso.   
 Ndendwe as' Omonene,   
Ngw' as' amagor' Aye   
Tingwenereti, kende, kende,   
Obe bionsi Ase nde.

  **2.**   
"Okogacherwa Yeso,"   
Nkore bun' anchete   
Imbe oyoye bori,   
nkore emeremo.

  **3.**   
"Okogacherwa Yeso,"   
Ngachwe korwa ense   
Moitongo as' omoika,   
'Mochenu as' enkoro.

  **4.**   
"Okogacherwa Yeso,"   
Nimb' oyoye bori   
Mbe oyoye botambe,   
Mbe oyoye bweka.

title: 214 Bono Ngocha Nde
markdown:
### 214 Bono Ngocha Nde   

  **1.**   
Natayayire ar'Omonene,   
Bono ngocha nde nka;   
Nganetie ng'irane as'obuya,   
Bono ngocha nde nka.   
 Ee ngocha nde,   
Tata ngocha nde,   
Bono ngocha nde nka;   
Ee ngochande,   
Tata ngocha nde,   
Bono ngocha nde nka.

  **2.**   
Narosire n'ens'eye y'ebibe,   
Bono ngocha nde nka;   
Omotoria nang'ariganie nka.   
Bono ngocha nde nka.

  **3.**   
'Manyir' Omotoria nantimokie,   
Bono ngocha nde nka;   
Ko nganetie gotimok'as'are,   
Bono ngocha nde nka.

  **4.**   
Nasabire nonya nobosomba,   
Bono ngocha nde nka;   
Gicha nyor'obuya bw'Omotoria,   
Bono ngocha nde nka.

  **5.**   
Togi'Omonene Omotori'one,   
Bono ngocha nde nka;   
'Ganyet'ang'ariganie nch'omobe,   
Bono ngocha nde nka.

title: 215 Kwarure Ebinto Bionsi Ekeng'wanso?
markdown:
### 215 Kwarure Ebinto Bionsi Ekeng'wanso?   

  **1.**   
Kwaganirie omorembe, n'okwegena,   
Gwasabire as'ogweitia?   
Kotogotimoka; gos'osesenigwe,   
Goika bono bweru'ekeng'wanso.   
 Kwarure ebinto bionsi ekeng'wanso?   
Omoika ngokoraa Are?   
Norasesenigwe, onyor'omorembe,   
Koramo' omobere n'enkoro.

  **2.**   
Nobe n'Omonene 'se Ringana riaye,   
Obe n'omoremb 'oisaneke.   
Korer'ogochika, Ob'omochenu pi,   
Oru'ebiao bionsi ekeng'wanso.

  **3.**   
Titokomany' eki Omonen 'atoeire,   
As'ebisi'ebi twasabire.   
Mebere, chinkoro, goik 'abigambere,   
Bionsi torue as'ekeng'wanso.

  **4.**   
Mbori gotebek' obwanchani-atoeire,   
Chinkoro chiaito na chigoke,   
'Buya bw'ogosanga tosange Nere,   
Gatwarure bionsi ekeng'wanso.

title: 216 Buna Nde Nachire as' ore
markdown:
### 216 Buna Nde Nachire as' ore   

  **1.**   
Buna nde nachir' as'ore,   
Inche tingwekor' omuya   
'Manyinga oka ngosaba,   
Ntorie as' amaber' ao.   
 Buna (Buna inde),   
inde (Buna inde)   
Buna nde nachir' as'ore   
(Buna inde)   
Nyingw 'Onsesenie onkonye,   
Buna nde nachir' as'ore.

  **2.**   
Buna nde ko namanyire,   
"'Manyinga ok' aisanire"   
Gonsibia ndabe kegima,   
Erio nkwegene kegima.

  **3.**   
Buna nde nachire rero,   
"'Moy'one okorereire"   
Tinkomenya are naye,   
Noyoo nganetie koba.

  **4.**   
Nkoro yane n' obogima,   
Gotimoka nyor' as'ore   
Gantayayete ndosete,   
"Ntimok 'obwanchani bwao".

title: 217 Tata Nachire As' Ore
markdown:
### 217 Tata Nachire As' Ore   

  **1.**   
Tata nachire as'ore,   
Nay' ogotoreka,   
Korantige inche bweka,   
Kai nche ndagende?   
 Namanyire, negenire,   
Yes' Otokwerete,   
As' omote amanyinga,   
Akang'itekera.

  **2.**   
Nanchire Omwana oo,   
Ng'a chinguru chiao,   
Ong'isanekie na bionsi,   
As'engaki eye.

  **3.**   
Omochaki bw'okwegena,   
Nakorigereirie,   
Nyore ekeegwa kiao,   
kebe obogima.

  **4.**   
Togontiga inche nsire,   
Kwana erio menye,   
Ntimoke ntari korosa,   
Goik'ong' Omoik' oo.

  **5.**   
Naki Omoy'on 'oragoke,   
Kondakoror' aye,   
Tiga nyigw'eriogi riao,   
Nyaberw' as' obuya.

title: 218 O Yeso Narire Eira
markdown:
### 218 O Yeso Narire Eira   

  **1.**   
O Yeso narir' Eira,   
Kogokorera,   
"Kabe nainche", Botambe,   
'Monen' omosani.   
Tinkoiroka esegi,   
Korabe ase nde,   
Tinkorw' as' enchera,   
'ker'orantang'ane.

  **2.**   
Nkoigwe ang'e ase nde,   
Ense ng'ang'e ere,   
Tindi korora buya,   
"'Mariogi agontema".   
Babisa ng'ang'e bare,   
Bang'etananire,   
O Yeso inchwo ang'e,   
Ntange korw'ebibe.

  **3.**   
"Yeso kwarir'eir   
'as 'abakogotunya"   
Agw'or' as' obonene,   
Mosomb'oo nabe,   
Yeso narir' Eira,   
Kogokorer' Aye,   
Ng'obuya 'nkobwatie,   
'Monen' omosani.

title: 219 Tokwan' Amang'an' Amabe
markdown:
### 219 Tokwan' Amang'an' Amabe   

  **1.**   
Tokwan' amang'an' amabe   
Korw' oromeme rwao;   
'Nkoro eyarengererie   
Atararwa omonwa.   
 "Anchana inwe", Er'otebire;   
"Bana igw'amachiko a Tata"   
"Anchana inwe", Er'otebire;   
Abana igw' amachiko.

  **2.**   
'Bwanchani obochenu mono,   
Amo n' obosani bo;   
'Boriri bw' egek' egeke   
'Go borasarie bionsi.

  **3.**   
'Mang'an' amabe namango   
Na ebirengererio;   
'Kegosaria obosani   
Ring'an' erimo ribe.

title: 220 Ondaire, Ondaire
markdown:
### 220 Ondaire, Ondaire   

  **1.**   
Ondaire, ondaire,   
n'amang'ana okoremia,   
Ase onsi ense eye,   
Omonene ondaire.   
 Ondaire, ondaire,   
Omonene ondaire   
Nokoboko kwaye igo,   
Omonene ondaire.

  **2.**   
'Kero kende nomobaso,   
'Kero kende nomosunte;   
S'amache na ase ense,   
Omonene ondaire.

  **3.**   
Tinkonyara gotogonya,   
As' emeremo ndaegwe,   
Ekiagera namanyire,   
Omonene ondaire.

  **4.**   
Koyaerir' emeremo,   
Konabuire ebibe,   
Nony'ogokwa tinkoiroka,   
Omonene ondaire.

title: 221 Ang'e N' Aye Nyasae
markdown:
### 221 Ang'e N' Aye Nyasae   

  **1.**   
Ang'e n'Aye Nyasae,   
Ang'e kobua,   
Omonene one,   
Ang'e kobua.   
Amatuko onsi,   
Nimbe ang'e naye,   
Ang'e n'aye Nyasae,   
Ang'e kobua.

  **2.**   
Nonya nagendire   
'Mosunte ime,   
Nay' obotamero   
Emiaka yonsi   
Ase okorota   
nindigetie koba   
Ang'e naye Nyasae,   
Ang'e kobua.

  **3.**   
Bionsi Aye kwang'eire,   
N'amaber' ao,   
'Malaika bonsi   
Bandangeirie,   
Korwa ense eye,   
As'ore Igoro   
Ang'e n'aye Nyasae,   
Ang'e kobua.

  **4.**   
Ne chinguru chiane,   
Ninkobake,   
Egetare kiane   
Kia obuya   
Emechando yonsi,   
Twaretir' as'ore;   
Ang'e naye Nyasae   
Ang'e kobua.

title: 222 Ekerengererio Kiang'iranereire
markdown:
### 222 Ekerengererio Kiang'iranereire   

  **1.**   
Ekerengererio,   
Kiang'iranereire;   
Naikire ang'e na seito,   
Kobua riria kare.   
 Ang'e seito,   
Ang'e seito;   
Angie seito rero, rero,   
Kobua riria kare.

  **2.**   
Ang'e nka ya Tata,   
'S'obomeny' obonge;   
Ase Yeso akogamba,   
Nyancha y'ekerore.

  **3.**   
Ang'e goika seito,   
Ntore chigurube;   
K'emechando yaerire,   
Mbek'egutw' engiya.

title: 223 Goika Nche Mbe N'Omotoria
markdown:
### 223 Goika Nche Mbe N'Omotoria   

  **1.**   
Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,   
Tingotara nche bweka,   
'Moigwe ore ang'e nainche'   
Mabok' ay' amboanie.   
 Moy'one tokwoboa (tokwoboa),   
'S' arandae ningende (ningende)   
Gose tinkwemurungania,   
Mbwatie chinchera chiaye.

  **2.**   
Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,   
'Kiagera nd'omoreu;   
Nanyare kong' oboremu,   
Ond' atanyare bori.

  **3.**   
Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,   
As' orogendo rwane;   
'S'emechando n'as'obuya,   
Nonya nase chisegi.

  **4.**   
Goika nche mbe n'Omotoria,   
Ab'Omorai nchera;   
Goika ngik'ekiambokero,   
Nsoe as'ens'eri'enyia.

title: 224 Omotoria Ondaire
markdown:
### 224 Omotoria Ondaire   

  **1.**   
Omotoria ondaire;   
Ninki rende mborire?   
Tinkoba na tang'utangu,   
Ere n'Omorai one;   
Nere okong'a omorembe,   
Nimenye ime Yaye;   
Kende nagecha ase nde,   
Ere nandende buya;   
Kende nagecha ase nde,   
Ere nandende buya.

  **2.**   
Omotoria ondaire,   
Nony' enchera er' embe;   
"Ng'obuy' ekero ngotemwa",   
Ndagera y'obogima;   
Kondagochwe amagoro,   
Na korang'a kegima;   
Korwa ase egetare,   
Narorire ensoko;   
Korwa ase egetare,   
Narorire ensoko.

  **3.**   
Omotoria ondaire,   
As'obwanchani Bwaye!   
Ninyore ogotimoka,   
As'omochie o Tata;   
'Kero keria ndabokigwe,   
'Moerio bw'orogendo,   
Nyare gotera botambe:   
Yeso ndae enchera;   
Nyare gotera botambe:   
Yeso ndae enchera.

title: 225 Nda' Omonene Yehova
markdown:
### 225 Nda' Omonene Yehova   

  **1.**   
Nda' Omonene Yehova,   
'Moeti bwens' ey' embe,   
Nd' omworo, Ay' Omonguru,   
mbwate as'okoboko,   
 Endagera ya Igoro,   
Ondagerie nyigote, (nyigote)   
Ondagerie nyigote.

  **2.**   
Tubora Ensok' engiya,   
'Sok'Amach' okogwenia,   
Tiga rire ri'omorero,   
Rinda' as'orogendo,   
 Omoboria Omonguru,   
Obe chinguru chiane, (nyigote)   
Obe eng'aya yane.

  **3.**   
Ngoik' engegu ya Yordani,   
Osiri' obwoba bwane,   
Ong'etie as'omorindo,   
Ng'ike ng'umbu Kanaani;   
 Amatera y'okobaka,   
Ningoterere Aye, (nyigote)   
Ningoterere Aye, Amen.

title: 226 Nkonyeget' Ase Yeso
markdown:
### 226 Nkonyeget' Ase Yeso   

  **1.**   
Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,   
'S' egekuba kiaye,   
Gakonyoroki' ogwancha,   
Nintimok' omoyo.   
'Gw' eriogi ri'amalaika,   
Banterera buya   
Bitii bi' obonene,   
'Nyancha y'ekerore.   
 Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,   
'S' egekuba kiaye,   
Gakonyoroki' ogwancha,   
Nintimok' omoyo.

  **2.**   
Nkonyeget' ase Yeso,   
Korwa ogwechanda,   
Korw' amatemwa y'ense,   
'Bibe mbikombua.   
Tinkoba n'obororo,   
'Bwoba, tang'utang'u;   
Amatemwa make Igo,   
'Mariga make igo!

  **3.**   
Yeso, obotamero,   
Yeso onkwereire,   
Nimbek' ogosemia,   
'S' Egetare ki' Emiaka;   
Nganye ntari korosa,   
Nd' obotuko boere;   
Goika ndore emambia,   
'Gonkiera igoro.

title: 227 Yeso Nakire?
markdown:
### 227 Yeso Nakire?   

  **1.**   
Yeso nakir' as' obororo,   
Ntagoke gose gotera   
'Gurub'endito birengererio   
Orogendo rokondosia.   
 Nkondend' ar'amaene igo   
Oigure emechando,   
Mobaso ndosa Botuko   
ng'iroka Omotoria ndenda.

  **2.**   
Yeso nakir' as'omosunte,   
Konde nobwoba obonge;   
Omobas'ore botuko bocha,   
Ere nkomber'are ang'e.

  **3.**   
Yeso nakir' as'amatemwa,   
Ekero nche nasinyirwe;   
Boror' obonge ntatimogeti,   
Marig' akonagoiteka.

  **4.**   
Yeso nakire kamakweri,   
Agwatanana abanchwa;   
Omoy'oichana ang'e n' ogwoka,   
Tagokira atandore.

title: 228 Namanyire Oyokondaa
markdown:
### 228 Namanyire Oyokondaa   

  **1.**   
Kemerind' eng'etanaine,   
'Bis' enchera y'obogima,   
Tinkwoboa ekiagera   
namanyir' oyokondaa.   
 Namanyir' oyokondaa,   
As' enyancha y'emechando   
Emerindo y'emechando,   
Yes' andae onsi mbuya.

  **2.**   
Kemerindo ekonucha,   
'Se bitarre bi' emechando;   
Tinkwoboa ekiagera   
namanyire oyokondaa.

  **3.**   
Kamatemw' agonchichera,   
Nyancha neba embe mono;   
Korende ning'ike ng'umbu,   
Namayire oyokondaa.

  **4.**   
Obwanchani bw' Omotoria,   
Bontang'aine as'enchera;   
Nimwegene goika ng'ike,   
Namanyire oyokondaa.

title: 229 Omotoria  Ntang'ane
markdown:
### 229 Omotoria  Ntang'ane   

  **1.**   
Omotoria ntang'ane,   
Ase chinchera chionsi,   
Nde buya kond' as'ore,   
Mb' as' obwanchani bwao.   
 Ndae, ndae,   
Omotoria tinsira;   
Ndae amatuk' onsi,   
Ndae chinchera chionsi.

  **2.**   
Naye obotamero,   
'Kero emechand' ere,   
Nde buya kore ang'e,   
Nsemeretie as'ore.

  **3.**   
Ndae goik' omoerio,   
'Mechando yaerire,   
"Ngik' as' ense botaire,   
Marig'aratinyigwe.

title: 230 K'emechando Y'ens' Egocha
markdown:
### 230 K'emechando Y'ens' Egocha   

  **1.**   
K'emechando y'ens'egocha,   
'Segi nyancha na ense;   
Nindigi 'as' obotamero,   
'Se kiriri kia Nyasae.   
 Nambise nche, Nambise nche   
Ase ntanyor' emechando,   
Nambise nche, Nambise nche   
'Se kiriri kia Nyasae.

  **2.**   
Karandeter' emechando,   
Ninsemerie Igoro;   
'S' obwanchani, nandongeyie,   
Takworoki' endamwamu.

  **3.**   
Ababisa bakondigia,   
Saitani ondigetie;   
Yeso aonchor' amabe,   
Kob'omogok' omonge.

  **4.**   
Kobogori' omosalaba,   
Ndor'emechando y'ense;   
Yes'orendet 'Omoy' one,   
Tagontiga nche nsire.

title: 231 Ande Onsi Gantangaine
markdown:
### 231 Ande Onsi Gantangaine   

  **1.**   
Ande onsi gantang'aine,   
Nindagende mwegenete;   
Nkoinyora bun'ankwerete,   
Akabambw'aria Kalwari.   
 Yeso nandae botambe,   
Yeso nandae and'onsi;   
Omosani bw'Ogokumia,   
Agankwer 'ase Kalwari

  **2.**   
Nagokire komoigwera,   
Nagokire gantangaine   
'Gwancha kway'ogwansu ase nde,   
Gochenire na Kalwari.

  **3.**   
Nindagende tinkoiroka,   
Ngoke Kristo kare ang'e;   
Nsemeretie komorora,   
Yes'Omosani onkwerete.

title: 232 Nay' Enchera
markdown:
### 232 Nay' Enchera   

  **1.**   
Nay'enchera togotaniera   
korw' amakweri;   
Noyokorigia Tat'   
amorigie goeta as'ore.

  **2.**   
Nay'ekeene ng'ana   
yao eru' obongaini;   
Naye okoru' obonga'ini   
nagochen' enkoro.

  **3.**   
Nay' Encher', Ekeene,   
'bogima many' enchera;   
Torend' ekeene naki'   
omogoko botambe.

title: 233 'Monen' Emerindo Nere
markdown:
### 233 'Monen' Emerindo Nere   

  **1.**   
'Monen' emerindo nere!   
Nig'ekogusa mono!   
'Mare a igoro amwamire,   
Boigamo mbori ang'e.   
'Gokirete togosira?   
Ng'aki orarare!   
Kera etageka gekogosa,   
Gototindeka nyancha.   
 "Mbeo n'emerindo mbinyigwe,   
'morembe,   
Neba endamwamu y'enyancha,   
Gos'ebirecha,   
gose monto onde,   
Mache takomera bwato as'   
Omonene bw'enyancha   
n'ense are,   
Ng'a bigwer' okogania kwane,   
'Morembe,   
'Morembe Ng'a bigwer'   
okogania kwane Omorembe"

  **2.**   
Monen' nigo ngweitia,   
Nyekany' as 'obororo,   
'Nkoro yane yachandekire,   
O! boka na Ontorie.   
'Merindo y'ebib'ebinge,   
Yambuir' enkoro;   
Nasirire Nasirir'   
Omonen' ayerera onkonye.

  **3.**   
Yes'obwoba bwasirire,   
'Morind' okanyekire,   
'Mobaso ororekanire,   
Im'as'enkoro yane.   
Ganya Omoboria one,   
Tontiga nche bweka;   
Ntimoke as'ore n'omogoko,   
As' engegu y'ebisio.

title: 234 Mogambi Ngoch'are Bwango
markdown:
### 234 Mogambi Ngoch'are Bwango   

  **1.**   
'Mogambi ngoch'are bwango,   
'Ri'okweret' abanyabibe,   
Nache kwoyia abachenu,   
Abaire Igoro.   
 Ngoch'Are, ngoch'Are,   
Ogocha kwaye ng'ang'e kore;   
O! Nachiche, O! Nachiche,   
Nachiche gototoria.

  **2.**   
Twaror'ebimanyererio,   
Bikworoki' ogocha kwaye;   
Matuko bwango naere,   
Natogende Igoro.

  **3.**   
Amatuk' onsi nesegi,   
Titori n' ogotimoka;   
Goik' Omotoria asirie,   
'Bibe n'amakweri.

  **4.**   
Ens'eyio ya Igoro nenyia,   
Toraikaranse botambe;   
Toboyigwe Ogotakwa,   
Tomenye botambe.

title: 235 Mboare Ki Erio Ng'ike Nka?
markdown:
### 235 Mboare Ki Erio Ng'ike Nka?   

  **1.**   
Mboare ki erio ng'ike nka?   
Ner' omorendi akairania;   
"Botuko bono bwaerire,   
Ang'e bokiamoke.   
Tagoichana ayerera,   
'Gosemeria gokorae;   
Goik' onyore obonda,   
Bw' obarabu Igoro.

  **2.**   
Nkamoboria omorwani,   
Naboigo n'er 'akandemia;   
"Bwata mono okorwana,   
Gwaisire koera   
Tagoichana remereria,   
Kor'emeremo eere,   
Twatebigwe ekeegwa,   
'Kero torabue".

  **3.**   
Erio nkaboria naende,   
Ense yonsi ekairania;   
"Orogendo rwaerire,   
Nka teri are mono,   
Tagoichana twakureirwe,   
N'ebimanyereri' ebinge;   
Ebitongwa mbiganyete,   
'Riogi ri' Omonene".

  **4.**   
Tari are goika nka bori,   
Ekerengereri'ekiya;   
Kegotogwenia chinkoro,   
'Gotiny 'amariga   
Tagoichana ntoumerane,   
'Se totatayaye rinde,   
Tobe n'omogoko bori,   
As' omochie o Tata.

title: 236 Amang'an 'Amay' As' Omogendi
markdown:
### 236 Amang'an 'Amay' As' Omogendi   

  **1.**   
Amang'an 'amay' as' omogendi,   
'Yotayayete korwa nka;   
Omotoria mbwang'arairan'ense,   
N'obonda bwaye boche.   
 Ngoch' are, Mbwang'arairan'ens' eye;   
Namanya nairane bwango,   
N'abagendi bonsi, baegw'obonene,   
'Ker' Omotori'aragambe.

  **2.**   
Chimber'as' abachenu baraire,   
Nachimanorwe kegima;   
Baria bonsi baraire mbaboke,   
'Rio naende bamenye.

  **3.**   
Ntoumeran' as'enka y'omogoko,   
Toter' ogotoreka;   
Korwa chinsinyo chionsi chi'ense'eye,   
Tomosasim' Omogambi.

  **4.**   
Haleluya amen Haleluya nabo,   
Gatoregene ntoike nka;   
Tosabe mono torendete,   
Ntobek'egutw'enyia.

title: 237 Abachenu Bono Renda
markdown:
### 237 Abachenu Bono Renda   

  **1.**   
Abachenu bono renda,   
Igoro yanyegerigwe;   
Mochiokie chitaya chiaino,   
Chibe ang'e kagoch'Ere.   
 Ngoch' are, Ere Yeso;   
Ig' agocha n' obonene;   
Erio agambe botambe,   
Ngoch' are, Ere Yeso.

  **2.**   
Eira ya Omotoria,   
Nwe mwabeirwe kegima pi;   
Chianga chiasibigwe bo,   
Tebi' aband' okoborigwa.

  **3.**   
Amagambi agure pi,   
Yeso mbwang' agocha bono;   
Morandie obuya bwaye,   
Amatuk' ataraera.

  **4.**   
Ebisaku nabisire,   
Yeso nachiche bwango bo;   
Onsi ay'ense naete,   
Tera Yeso ngocha are.

  **5.**   
Abamochi, inchwo bwango,   
Amatuko ng'ang'e are;   
Ayerer' atarasieka,   
Monyore obuya bwaye.

title: 238 Bugi' Engoma
markdown:
### 238 Bugi' Engoma   

  **1.**   
Bugi'engoma twora n'echinguru,   
Yeso nache naende;   
'Bagendi goka, tera mochenge,   
Yeso nache naende.   
 Nkoiran'are, Nkoiran'are'   
Yeso nache naende.

  **2.**   
Chisororo chiarw' as'ebitunwa,   
Yeso nache naende;   
Ngoch'ar'ere n'obonen' obonge,   
Yeso nache naende.

  **3.**   
Ndirandigwe n'emerindo nyancha,   
Yeso nache naende;   
Rirandigw' as' abanto bonsi pi,   
Yeso nache naende.

  **4.**   
Chiburuburu chiatworokirie,   
Yeso nache naende;   
Mechando yabeire 'nsinyo chionsi,   
Yeso nache naende.

  **5.**   
'Bisaku bionsi biabeanire,   
Yeso nache naende;   
Rora chisemi chiamentekire,   
Yeso nache naende.

title: 239 Rituko Rinene Ngocha Rire
markdown:
### 239 Rituko Rinene Ngocha Rire   

  **1.**   
Rituko rinene ngocha rire,   
Yeso nachiche   
Koira abana abageni,   
Enka y'omwando.   
 Natorore ogokia kw'emambia,   
Kogoseria Omosunte   
Natorore ogokia, Kw'emambia,   
kogwata chimbera.

  **2.**   
'Mang'ana yenchili   
narandigw' ebisaku bionsi,   
Monene bw'enyangi   
tateban' amarandi abuge.

  **3.**   
'Ba igoro bonsi bamokobe   
namar' agwoka,   
Omogambi ache abair'abaye   
ase batakwe

  **4.**   
Bari' abasani twatiganete,   
Natororane,   
Baria barosir' emioyo   
batinyigw' amariga.

title: 240 Eira Yarurw' As' Abegenete
markdown:
### 240 Eira Yarurw' As' Abegenete   

  **1.**   
Eira yaruru' as'abagenete,   
"Ngocha nde bwango   
mbair' abar'abane;   
Morende mono goika nachire,   
Timorara buna abande renda".   
 "Morende mono goika nachire,   
Nimbae ense" N'eira yaye;   
"Soa 'mogoko, namotimoke,   
Monyore chigutwa,   
mobwate mono.

  **2.**   
Torende mono as'ogosaba,   
Nacher'abande buna omoibi;   
Twamanyire nigo are ang'e,   
Ko titomanyeti rituko renda.

  **3.**   
Ee! ntore na ogosemeria,   
Ng'a Yeso Omonene oito nache;   
Chiira chiaye nechi'ekeene,   
"Mbwango ndach' aseigo   
mobwate mono".

title: 241 Ntomanyeti Ere Kagocha
markdown:
### 241 Ntomanyeti Ere Kagocha   

  **1.**   
Ntomanyeti Ere kagocha,   
Mambia na mobaso gati;   
Ande nachiche mogoroba,   
Gose nobotuko gati;   
Otebire torende mono,   
Titochirimia chitaya,   
Erio Er' ekero agocha   
Atonyore toganyete.   
 Ntokoganyete   
(Ntokoganyete' Aye, Ntorendete)   
Ntokoganyete   
(Ntokoganyete' Aye, Ntorendete)   
Ntokoganyete   
(Ntokoganyete' Aye, Ntorendete)   
Nigo tokoganyet' Aye.

  **2.**   
Nainyoire amaber' Aye,   
Ageret' agatokwera;   
Agatig' obonene bwaye,   
Gokwera abasirete;   
Kero kende nache kogoka,   
Arore abw'akwerete,   
Bagokeret'ogocha kwaye,   
'S'okoganya n'okorenda.

  **3.**   
Yes' Omwanchw'   
Omoboria one,   
kwamanyire ningwanchete   
Nasemeirie ninkoror',   
Aye, Erio ong'arigani' as' ore;   
Korache konacha ekina,   
Ase baria baratame,   
Ningokwani' erio Omosani,   
Nkoganyete nakorenda.

title: 242 Gok'ens' Omonene Nache
markdown:
### 242 Gok'ens' Omonene Nache   

  **1.**   
Gok'ens' Omonene nache,   
Rotot' Omogambi,   
Ker'oyomo amoganye,   
Ere kagochicha,   
Ere kagochicha,   
Ere, Ere kagochicha.

  **2.**   
Gok'ens' Omonene agambe,   
Banto bamotogie,   
Bonsi na bionsi Motogie,   
Motogie kobua,   
Motogie kobua,   
Moto-motogie kobua.

  **3.**   
Nagamb' ense as' obuya,   
Bisaku bimanye,   
Obonene bwaye bori,   
Obwanchani bwaye,   
Obwanchani bwaye,   
'Bwanchani 'bwanchani bwaye.

  **4.**   
'Bib' obororo mbikoba,   
gos'amagw'as'ense,   
Naretan' ogosesenia,   
gotub' amab'onsi,   
'Y' okoragereria,   
'y' oko-'y' okoragereria.

title: 243 Nore Ang' Omonene Bw'enyangi Kagochicha
markdown:
### 243 Nore Ang' Omonene Bw'enyangi Kagochicha   

  **1.**   
Nore ang' Omonene   
bw'enyangi kagochicha,   
Nore ang' Omonene   
bw'enyangi kagochicha,   
Ngoch'are, Ngoch'are,   
Kabe ang'e,   
Bweboyi'obe ang'ere   
kagocha.   
 Ror' Omonene   
bwe'nyangi ngoch'are,   
Ror' Omonene   
bw'enyangi ngocha'are,   
Ngoch'are, ngoch'are   
kabe ang'e,   
Bweboyi'obe ang'   
Ere kagocha.

  **2.**   
Chitaya chiano ngwoka   
chire Ere kagocha,   
Chitaya chiano ngwoka   
chire Ere kagocha,   
Nachiche bwango,   
Nachiche bwango,   
Orotot' Omonene   
kagocha.

  **3.**   
Togende tomorotote   
kagocha, kagocha,   
Togende tomorotote   
kagocha, kagocha,   
Togende tomorotot' ekero,   
Omonene bw'enyangi   
Agochicha.

  **4.**   
Natotere haleluya,   
kagocha kagocha,   
Natotere haleluya,   
kagocha kagocha,   
Tera huleluya! haleluya!   
Omonene bwenyangi   
ngoch'are.

title: 244 Toiroka Ababisa
markdown:
### 244 Toiroka Ababisa   

  **1.**   
Toiroka ababisa,   
Nyasae nakorende;   
Ins'ase chimbaba chiaye,   
Nyasae nakorende.   
 Nyasae nakorende,   
'Kero gionsi nchera chionsi,   
Igo nakorende,   
Nyasae nakorende   
(nakorende)

  **2.**   
Kero ki' amatuk'amabe,   
Nyasae nakorende;   
Nony' as' obororo bwonsi,   
Nyasae nakorende.

  **3.**   
Nako' okogania kwao,   
Nyasae nakorende;   
Takwang' ogosaba kwao,   
Nyasae nakorende.

  **4.**   
As' amatemw' ande onsi,   
Nyasae nakorende;   
'Morosu eegek' asare,   
Nyasae nakorende.

title: 245 Gose Mambia Erioba Rikooroka
markdown:
### 245 Gose Mambia Erioba Rikooroka   

  **1.**   
Gose mambia erioba rikooroka,   
'Mobas'oseri' omosunte n'ekiriri;   
Yeso narache n'obonene bwaye,   
Kwoyia abanto baye.   
 O! Yeso Kristo ndiriri,   
Natoak'eriogi?   
Yes'ochire, haleluya,   
haleluya nabo   
Haleluya Amen.

  **2.**   
Gose mobaso gati gose ko bwaira,   
Gose nebe obotuko bw'ekeigoro,   
Neb'omobaso korw'obonene bwaye,   
'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.

  **3.**   
'Buya n'omogoko titogokwa rinde,   
'Borwair' obororo n'ebirero mbio;   
Kobogorigwa as'obonene bwaye,   
'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.

  **4.**   
Emeganda yaye etere Hosana,   
Amalaika n'abachenu mbabeo;   
Obuya nabobe as' obosio bwaye,   
'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.

title: 246 Yeso Ngochich' Are
markdown:
### 246 Yeso Ngochich' Are   

  **1.**   
Yeso ngochich' are,   
kwoyi' abanto baye,   
Abachenu baye bonsi,   
Baikarans' as'are;   
Rigereria Igoro,   
Goka na gotera,   
Nache n'obonene bwaye,   
Yeso Omogambi.

  **2.**   
Ense netengeche   
igoro neete,   
Omobe ng'ai-   
orabe ase rituk'erio?   
Botamero mboiyo,   
nonya n'oboigamo,   
'Ndamwamu erorekane,   
Kamaber' aerire.

  **3.**   
Amais' ay'agwoka,   
Nasambe ababe,   
Onde tagwator'erieta,   
ria Yes'eker'ekio;   
Y'okogecha, taiyo,   
As' Abakrist' erio,   
Ogosaba n'ebirero   
Nabibe bos'erio.

title: 247 Rigesa Ri'ense Riabeire Ang'e
markdown:
### 247 Rigesa Ri'ense Riabeire Ang'e   

  **1.**   
Rigesa ri'ense riabereire ang'e,   
Omonene narigeti' abagesi;   
Bagese endagera yomire pi,   
Omonene ayegache kagocha.   
 Angoa . . . bwango . . .   
(Angoa abagesi, Angoa.   
Ira rigesa kiage, are nka)   
Angoa . . . bwango . . .   
Angoa . . . bwango . . .   
(Angoa abagesi, Angoa,   
Reta igesa nka).   
Toire nka.

  **2.**   
Rituko erio rigiya botambe,   
Ngocha rire bwango,   
bwango kegima;   
Ebibe biasiareire rigesa nchuo,   
Ayerera gesa ribaga ndire.

  **3.**   
Togese tore n'obwanchani mono,   
Ogokonywa nkorue aaria igoro;   
'Bwanchani bwatorangeirie togese,   
Rigesa nditoganyete togende.

title: 248 Ko Rirandi Rikobugigw' As'omoerio
markdown:
### 248 Ko Rirandi Rikobugigw' As'omoerio   

  **1.**   
Ko rirandi rikobugigw' as'omoerio,   
Natorore omobas' obarire;   
N' abatorigwe korw'ense   
baumeran'aria ng'umbu,   
Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.   
 Gakorangeri' amarieta,   
Gakorangeri' amarieta,   
Gakorangeri' amarieta,   
Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.

  **2.**   
Rituk'erio n'omogok'   
abachenu bakoboka,   
Nabakwete kare nababoke pi;   
Abachore nabagende   
na Nyasae igoro,   
Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.

  **3.**   
Natokore emeremo   
ya Nyasae eere,   
Tokwan'obwachani   
obo bw'ogokumia;   
Eri' emerem'ekoera   
natogende Igoro,   
Gakorangeri' amarieta nimbeo.

title: 249 Tindigeti Obonda
markdown:
### 249 Tindigeti Obonda   

  **1.**   
Tindigeti Obonda   
gose obonene,   
Tatiga mb' omochenu   
ing'ike igoro;   
'Getabu ki'obogima   
kerikire buya,   
Erieta riane rende,   
Naki ndirikire'?   
 'Rieta riane gose,   
ndirikir'aroro?   
'S'egetabu Igoro,   
naki ndirikire?

  **2.**   
'Bibe biane nebinge   
buna omokenye,   
'K'amanying' Omotoria   
nar' ang'isanire,   
Kwabekire eira   
"mbib' ebibariri,   
Nabirabe kegima,   
kegima naende".

  **3.**   
Ror'omochie omuya,   
chinyomba chinene,   
'Bamenyi babegete   
chianga chindabu;   
As'obobe botache   
gosaria amaya,   
Erieta riane rende,   
Naki ndirikire?

title: 250 Otorangeiri' Omogambi Oito
markdown:
### 250 Otorangeiri' Omogambi Oito   

  **1.**   
Otorangeiri' Omogambi oito,   
Toikarans' as' enyangi yaye;   
Naki erabe ase tore,   
Ere kagocha.   
 Ere kagocha minto,   
'Mogambi kagocha,   
Naki erab' ase tore,   
Ere kagocha.

  **2.**   
Nabekerw' obonene bwaye,   
Egutwa ribaga ri'amagwa;   
Kororekane ogosikwa,   
Ere kagocha.

  **3.**   
Bun'ekomesa engaki eyio,   
'Bia bobisi birorekane;   
Tororekane buna tore,   
Ere kagocha.

  **4.**   
Nagokere abatorigwe,   
Babegete chianga chi'enyangi;   
Naki ere buy' as' ababui,   
Ere kagocha.

title: 251 Ekero Toragambigwe
markdown:
### 251 Ekero Toragambigwe   

  **1.**   
Ekero toragambigwe,   
'Bogima gos' ogokwa;   
Natobe bun'edhahabu?   
Gose bun'amabiria.   
 Kwarengirwe n'Omonene,   
Kwarengirwe;   
Kwarengirwe nering'ana,   
Kwaremeirwe.

  **2.**   
Toigw' amang'an' amaya;   
"Omosomba omuya,"   
Gose nayare amabe,   
Kwaremeirwe omobe.

  **3.**   
Ntomoigwere Omoika,   
Tonyore amabera;   
Gose tebana ekina,   
Kia Nyasae kenachwe.

title: 252 Rituko Rinene Ngochicha Rire
markdown:
### 252 Rituko Rinene Ngochicha Rire   

  **1.**   
Rituko rinene,   
Ngochicha rire,   
'Go rikonagosuka gocha;   
Abachenu n'abanyabibe   
mbaatananwe,   
Nore ang' ase rituk'erio?   
 Nore ang'e, Nore ang'e,   
Nore ang'e rituko ri'ekina?   
Nore ang'e, Nore ang'e,   
'Se rituk'erio?

  **2.**   
Ituko rikomesa,   
Ngochicha rire,   
'Go rikonagosuka gocha;   
'Borabu bwaye bocher'-   
abanchet'Omonene,   
Nore ang' ase rituk'erio?

  **3.**   
Ituko ri'omoichano,   
Ngochicha rire,   
'Go rikonagosuka gocha;   
'Ker'ababe baraigwe   
"Genda timbamanyeti",   
Nore ang' ase rituk'erio?

title: 253 Ekina Giachakirwe Igoro
markdown:
### 253 Ekina Giachakirwe Igoro   

  **1.**   
Ekina giachakirwe Igoro,   
Naki ntwe torateneneo;   
Anache Nyasa' Omogambi,   
Ker'ogokora n'enchera.   
 Naki ntwe torantenene,   
Rituko riria rinene;   
'Go toratoke twaremeirwe,   
Gos'ebibe biatinyigwe?

  **2.**   
Abakure banacheirw' ekina,   
Erio nyuma abare moyo;   
Bonsi nabanyorerw' ekina,   
'Kina getari mabera.

  **3.**   
Naki torabe ase ekin' ekio,   
Ebibe bikoorokigwa;   
Kogiaikire konachwa,   
Kina getari goochoka.

title: 254 Ntomanyeti Ensa
markdown:
### 254 Ntomanyeti Ensa   

  **1.**   
Ntomanyeti ensa   
'Ker' Omonen' agoeha;   
Twarori' ebimanyererio ebinge;   
Twamanyire Ere nachiche,   
Korende ntomanyeti ensa.   
 Nachiche, Torende tobe ang'e,   
Nachiche, Omotoria haleluya;   
Nachiche, as' amare a Tata,   
Ko ntomanyeti ensa.

  **2.**   
Borabu mboreo 's'abagotoreka,   
'Keene nker' as' ebuku ya Nyasae;   
'Ker'obobani bwaraga ng'a ngoch'are,   
Ko ntomanyeti ensa.

  **3.**   
Torende, tosabe chitaya tochiokie,   
Tokor'emeremo goik' Omonen'ache;   
Natotere, togok'ere kagochicha,   
Ko ntomanyeti ensa.

title: 255 Tenen' As' Ekeene
markdown:
### 255 Tenen' As' Ekeene   

  **1.**   
Tenen' as' ekeene   
Gwer 'Omonene,   
Basike bari 'abake   
'Mogand' o Danieli.   
 Mobe buna Danieli,   
Tenena mweka,   
Mobe n'ogwancha   
okonge timoiroka.

  **2.**   
Bant' abange basir'   
as' obwoba bwabo,   
Ng'a mbab' abakong'u   
babe buna Danieli.

  **3.**   
Bant' abanene mono   
bare im'as'ense,   
Mbagwe bakoumer   
'omogand' o Danieli.

  **4.**   
Imoki' ebendera   
mobue 'babisa,   
Moserie Saitani   
as'eriogi ria Danieli.

title: 256 Nyasae Karache Kogambia
markdown:
### 256 Nyasae Karache Kogambia   

  **1.**   
Nyasae karache kogambia,   
Ebisaku bi'ense eye;   
Gatwarangerigw' ekin' ekio,   
Nkogamba ki toragambwe.   
 Nabobek' obori bwaye kiage,   
N'omoiruro nayotugute;   
Naki torab' as' ekin' ekio,   
Rituko ri' okobokigwa?

  **2.**   
Toigwe Yeso ogorotebia,   
"Mbuya mon'omosomb' one";   
Gose toserigwe kegima,   
N'abanto ababe bonsi.

  **3.**   
'Gok' eker'aror' abaye,   
Babwat' ekemanyererio;   
Babeke chianga chindabu,   
Batenene ang'e nere.

  **4.**   
Tosabe rigoro twaganya,   
chitaya chiaito chiogete,   
Ker'omonywomi akorangeria,   
Ntobe ang'e kogenda nka.

  **5.**   
Natomenye na gosemeria,   
'S' okogany' engaki eyio   
Ker' orogendo rwaerire,   
Toikarans' as' obonene.

title: 257 Ko Rirumbe Riasirire
markdown:
### 257 Ko Rirumbe Riasirire   

  **1.**   
Ko rirumbe riasirire   
korwa as'ebitunwa,   
Omobaso okobara   
ogotongia emambia;   
Natosome rirube riaye   
ri'obwanchani bwaye,   
Tomanyane twensi buya,   
rirumbe rigosira.   
 Tomanya --- ne buya pi,   
(Tomanya ---- ne buya pi)   
Totare ----- amo twensi,   
(Totare ---- amo twensi)   
Bogokia --- moka igoro,   
(Bogokia ---- moka 'goro)   
Rirumbe---- rigosira,   
(Rirumbe ---- rigosira)   
Bogokia ----mokaigoro,   
(Bogokia ---- moka 'goro)   
Rirumbe -----rigosira,   
(Rirumbe ----- rigosira)

  **2.**   
Tokomocha koinyora   
buna intwe namaroba,   
Togosaria amachiko   
na gochandeka tweka;   
Chimbaba chiaye chindabu   
chitub' ebibe biaito,   
Okorenda gokoera,   
rirumbe rigosira.

  **3.**   
Rirumbe rigototuba,   
Tata natomanyete,   
'Bosi' as'obosio tomanyane,   
na baria twanchete;   
Korwa ng'umbu yabarire buya,   
yakiamokire,   
Ekiriri kegoeta,   
rirumbe rigosira.

title: 258 Natororane Na Yeso
markdown:
### 258 Natororane Na Yeso   

  **1.**   
Natororane na Yeso,   
Obosio as' obosio;   
Nomochengo rituk' erio   
Kondaror' Omotoria.   
 Natororan' as'amaiso,   
aria seito Igoro;   
Nase obonene bwaye,   
Nimorore botambe.

  **2.**   
Tinkonyara komomanya,   
Buna are Ere bori;   
Korend' ekero arache,   
Nimorore bun'are.

  **3.**   
Biserigwe korw' as'are,   
'Mariga n' omoichano;   
Egesiru nakeirane,   
'Bobisi bomanyeke.

  **4.**   
Bosio as'obosi' ekeene!   
Omogoko nobeo;   
Nimbe n'omogoko bori,   
Kondaror' Omotoria.

title: 259 Ntoumeran' Aria Roche
markdown:
### 259 Ntoumeran' Aria Roche   

  **1.**   
Ntoumeran' aria roche,   
'S'Amalaik'amenyete,   
Morind'omokenonoku,   
Okorw' ase Nyasae.   
 Toumerane twensi roche,   
As' agay'oroch'oruya mono;   
Toumerane n'abaye bonsi,   
'S' oroche rwa Nyasae.

  **2.**   
'S'engegu y'oroche roria,   
Rw'amache akomesa;   
Totere na gosasima,   
Botamb' as' omogoko.

  **3.**   
Gator' ang'e goika roche,   
Totige chigurube;   
'S' obuya natotorigwe,   
Aru' eyanga n'egutwa.

  **4.**   
Bwango ntoik' aria roche,   
Tokore orogendo;   
Chinkoro chigoke mono,   
Totere n'omorembe.

title: 260 Emeremo Ekoera
markdown:
### 260 Emeremo Ekoera   

  **1.**   
Emeremo ekoera   
twamboke nyancha ng'umbu,   
Nindor' emambi'   
engiya y'obonene;   
Nimomany' Omotoria   
ko ndaike aria Igoro,   
Nankwanie n'omogoko   
Omonene.   
 Nimomanye, nimomanye,   
Ko ndatenene ang'e as'are.   
Nimomanye, Nimomanye,   
Kondarore amabok' aye.

  **2.**
