Naki ndagoke mono   
ko ndarore Nyasae,   
Kondaror' obosio   
bway'obwororo;   
Nimobake as' obwanchani   
n'obuya bwonsi,   
Bwandoseiri' obomenyo   
aria igoro.

  **3.**   
Abanchani baito bonsi   
abakure as'ens'aye,   
Bakwete n'okwegena   
kwa Nyasae,   
Natogoke mono koumeran'   
aria igoro;   
Ko ninganie korora   
Yeso kubua.

  **4.**   
Kondasoe omochie   
nechianga chindabu,   
Nandae as'emechando etari;   
Nintere n'omogoko   
n'ababuir'ebibe,   
Ko Ninganie korora   
Yeso koua.

title: 261 'Mosalaba Togoetera
markdown:
### 261 'Mosalaba Togoetera   

  **1.**   
'Mosalaba togoetera,   
Gochia nka igoro;   
Ntokwobo' emeganda y'ebibe,   
Tat' otorendire.   
 Nka, nka, nka,   
Gochia nka igoro,   
Mosalaba togoetera,   
Enka y'obwanchani.

  **2.**   
Mosalaba togoetera,   
Yes' otang'anire;   
Ntomobwatie chimbaratero,   
Nka engeg' engiya.

  **3.**   
Mosalaba togoetera,   
'Nchera neba embe;   
Nare' oratorae buya,   
Nka 'Monen' as'ore.

title: 262 Ntenen'engegu Yordani
markdown:
### 262 Ntenen'engegu Yordani   

  **1.**   
Ntenen'engegu Yordani,   
Na korigereria;   
Kanani engiy'omogoko,   
'S'enibo yan'ere.   
 Natomeny'ens'engiy'   
omogoko, Aria ngumbu   
as'engegu eri'engiya.   
Toter' ogotera kwa   
Musa n'Eng'ondi,   
Tobe na Yeso botambe.

  **2.**   
Ens'eri'engiy'erandete,   
Nomobaso rioka;   
Krist' agamba goika kare,   
Aseri' omosunte.

  **3.**   
Ndi ndaike as'agiya,   
Na gosesenigwa;   
Ndore obosio bwa Tata,   
Ntimoke botambe.

  **4.**   
Nkor' eichorwe n'omogoko,   
Tingoteban'ense;   
Nony'emerind'ekogusa,   
Ningendeo rioka.

title: 263 Eker' Emerem' Ekoera
markdown:
### 263 Eker' Emerem' Ekoera   

  **1.**   
Eker' emerem' ekoera,   
Abagesi nabairane;   
Bakoretana rigesa,   
Goika Yerusalemu.   
 'Mogoko nabayorore,   
'Mogok'otari koera;   
'Mogok' ekiagera bono,   
'Meremo yaerire.

  **2.**   
Rituko riria natotere,   
Komosaba, Komotogia;   
'Monene Yes' Omotoria,   
Aria Yerusalemu.

  **3.**   
Natobe n'omogok' aroro,   
As'obomenyo bwa Tata;   
Obwo bwabekirwe ang'e,   
Aria Yerusalemu.

title: 264 Nere Ens' Engiya Kobua
markdown:
### 264 Nere Ens' Engiya Kobua   

  **1.**   
Nere ens'engiya kobua,   
As'okwegena twayerora;   
Tata nigo atoganyete,   
Gotoroseria obomenyo.   
 'Ns'engiya ---- botambe ------   
('Ns'engiya bota - botambe)   
Toumeran'engegu-engiya   
(botambe)   
'Ns'engiya ---- botambe ------   
(Ns'engiya bota---- botambe)   
Toumeran'engegu engiya.

  **2.**   
Natotere ari' as'engegu,   
Amater'amay' abachenu;   
Ntokoba nobororo rinde,   
Gose kogania gotimoka.

  **3.**   
Ase Tat' omuy'ore igoro,   
Natomobake tomotogie,   
As'ekeegwa ki'obwanchani   
N'ebisio atosesenirie.

title: 265 Ntomeny' As' Amach' Obogima
markdown:
### 265 Ntomeny' As' Amach' Obogima   

  **1.**   
Ntomeny' as' amach' obogima,   
Nsok'enchenu engiya;   
Yes' atoganyet' atorosie,   
Korosigw' okuya.   
 Ntomeny' as' amach' obogima   
(Ntomeny' ase amache y'obogima)   
As' amache y'obogima   
(As' amache nsoko y'obogima)   
As' amache y'obogima   
(As' amache nsoko y'obogima)   
Ensoko y'obogima.

  **2.**   
Tokorosa as' orogendo,   
Mbuya totimoke;   
Ase amache akwongora,   
Igo akogokia.

  **3.**   
Aye nore n'erang'o gose?   
Inchwo ase Yeso;   
Yeso namache y'obogima,   
Oyanyw' otoreke.

title: 266 As' Ens' Eyio Engiya
markdown:
### 266 As' Ens' Eyio Engiya   

  **1.**   
As' ens' eyio engiya,   
Nor' omochi' omuya;   
Orabeo botambe,   
N'omosunte toiyo.   
 Totinyigw' amariga,   
Obororo bosire   
Mbari kobara engaki,   
'Mosunte toiyo.

  **2.**   
Bisieri bie chilulu,   
As' omochi' omuya;   
Chinchera chi'edhahabu,   
N'omosunte toiyo.

  **3.**   
Bisieri bitasiekwe,   
Gochi 'omochi' omuya;   
Mach' obogim' asoka,   
N'omosunte toiyo.

  **4.**   
Tibaganeti isase,   
As'omochi' omuya;   
Ng'ondi ner' omobaso,   
N'omosunte toiyo.

title: 267 Ngokor' Emeremo n'Amatemwa
markdown:
### 267 Ngokor' Emeremo n'Amatemwa   

  **1.**   
Ngokor' emeremo n'amatemwa,   
Nimb'as'engegu ekomekameka;   
Mb'ang'e n'Omonene ngosasima,   
Miaka yonsi n'obonen' ase nde.   
 Ig' erabe, obonene,   
obonene, obonene   
'S'obuya nimorore obosio   
Neb' obonene, 'bonen' ase nde.

  **2.**   
As' ekeegwa ki'obuya bwaye,   
Naeirwe ribaga aria igoro;   
Kobao ndore obosio bwaye,   
Miaka yonsi n'obonen' ase nde.

  **3.**   
Basani mbabe' aba nanchete,   
Mogok' omonge ong'etanane;   
'Manyir' omogoko bw'Omotoria,   
Miaka yonsi n'obonen' ase nde.

title: 268 Twaboigure Obuya Bw'Ense
markdown:
### 268 Twaboigure Obuya Bw'Ense   

  **1.**   
Twaboigure obuya bw'ense,   
Engiya echabeire,   
Obuya bwaye bw'ogokumia,   
Ng'aki erabe kobao!   
Chinchera nechia edhahabu,   
'Magacho ye chilulu,   
Tibogotebeka obuya,   
Ng'aki erabe kobao.

  **2.**   
Ntosiboke korw' as'ebibe,   
'Matemwa, n'obororo;   
Mechando ende tekobao,   
Ng'aki erabe kobao.   
Obwanchani Obonge mono,   
Tobek'eang'endabu,   
'Kanisa y'Omotangi o Igoro,   
Ng'aki erabe kobao.

  **3.**   
Mechando yaito yonsi eere,   
Rituko ri'omogoko;   
Torore omochi'ogoika,   
Ori'ochabeire mono.   
Buya buna omoriakari,   
Kourner' Omonene;   
Goichana tigokobao,   
Mosunte tokobao.

  **4.**   
Ninchandeka ime as'ense,   
Nindengererie igoro;   
Bwango nainche nimanye onsi,   
Ng'aki erabe kobao.   
Ntororane aase agare,   
As'obonen' obonge,   
Abachenu bonsi mbabeo,   
Yeso nere nabeo.

title: 269 Titori Na Obomenyo
markdown:
### 269 Titori Na Obomenyo   

  **1.**   
Titori na obomenyo;   
Omochie tori aiga:   
Toremigw' as'eng'an'eye,   
Togany' omochie ogocha,   
Togany' omochie ogocha.

  **2.**   
Titori na obomenyo;   
Torigi' omochie orache:   
Zayoni nka y'Omonene,   
Okomeka, miaka yonsi,   
Okomeka, miaka yonsi.

  **3.**   
Obomenyo bw'omorembe;   
'Batorigw' batimoke;   
Onye nabwate chimbaba   
Nkoiruruka narenge,   
Ing'iruruke ntimoke.

  **4.**   
Omoy'one kira igo!   
Omonene omanyire;   
Konda' nkor'obuya bwaye,   
Ner' ogonchorer' engaki,   
Ey'ogotimoka kwane.

title: 270 Bagendi Ng'ai Mogochia?
markdown:
### 270 Bagendi Ng'ai Mogochia?   

  **1.**   
Bagendi ng'ai mogochia,   
Nechinyimbo koboko?   
Na togende orogendo,   
'As'ogochika Kwaye.   
Ebitunwa n'amagoko,   
Nkogenda tore nka bwoye,   
Nkogenda tore nka Bwoye,   
Ase ense engiya x2

  **2.**   
Bagendi nki morigetie,   
As'enseria engiya?   
Yanga ndabu ne chigutwa,   
korwa as'Omotoria.   
Tonyw'amache y'obogima,   
Tomeny' amo na Nyasae,   
Natomeny' amo botambe,   
Ase ense engiya x2.

  **3.**   
Bagendi togende nainwe,   
Gochi' ens' eria engiya?   
Inchwo bono mwancheirwe,   
nchwo, Mosoe 'mogand' oito.   
Inchwo, nchwo, timototiga,   
Krist' oganyir' atoire.   
'Ganyir' atoire Bwoye,   
As' ens' eria engiya x2.

title: 271 Ngoika Nka
markdown:
### 271 Ngoika Nka   

  **1.**   
Mbek'egutwa y'edhahabu ngoika nka,   
Ntore chigurube chiane ngoika nka;   
Mboyigw'obonene, Ninter'omogano,   
Bw'Omotoria one ngoika nka.   
 Ngoika nka (ngoika nka),   
ngoika nka (ngoika nka),   
Bororo bwonsi mboere ngoika nka;   
Ngoika nka (ngoika nka),   
Ngoika nka (ngoika nka)   
liororo bwonsi mboere ngoika nka.

  **2.**   
Mosunte bwonsi noete ngoika nka,   
'Moerio ndor'oborabu ngoika nka;   
Borabu bwa igoro, Bomorek'enchera,   
Bondae botambe goika nka.

  **3.**   
Ndor'obosio bw'Omotoria ngoika nka,   
Nter'obuya bw'Omotoria ngoika nka;   
Nintenen'as'are, Erio mosasime,   
Mbe nere botambe ngoika nka.

title: 272 Nayeigure Ense
markdown:
### 272 Nayeigure Ense   

  **1.**   
Nayeigure ense, Egotoka are,   
Nomochi' omuya as' enkoro;   
Yes'oyoagachire, Aria titogokwa,   
Nense totakogota rinde.   
 Totagote totagote,   
'Nse ase totagote rinde;   
Totagote totagote,   
'Nse ase totagote rinde.

  **2.**   
As'ens'eyi'engiya 'se totatayaye,   
Toigwanane rioka botambe;   
Totogi'Omogambi, s'ogotera rioka,   
Nense ase totakwe rinde.

  **3.**   
'Merem'ekoera tonyore egutwa,   
'Mechando n'amatemwa aere;   
Bororo boere, mariogi aigwanane,   
Nabanchwa abakwete kare.

title: 273 Nkorengereria Nde
markdown:
### 273 Nkorengereria Nde   

  **1.**   
Nkorengereria nde Ens' eria engiya,   
Ndaike k'erioba rikogwa;   
As' obuya bwa Yeso ntenene aria,   
Ninyor' eng'enang'eni gose?   
 Ninyore eng'enang'eni as'egutwa   
Mogorob' erioba rikogwa   
(rikogwa)   
Gonkoboka n'abachenu as'omochi' oria,   
Ninyor' eng'enang'eni gose?   
(Ninyore?)

  **2.**   
Ase chinguru chiaye Yeso nindandie,   
Nindende mobu' omobisa;   
Erio ching'enang'eni nachib' echiane,   
Okobakwa kwaye koigweke.

  **3.**   
Naki ndagok' ekero nche ndamorore,   
Nintung'ame komosasima;   
'Moy'one nogok' omochie bw'edhahabu,   
'Ninyor' eng'enang'eni gose?

title: 274 Nyancha Ng'umbu
markdown:
### 274 Nyancha Ng'umbu   

  **1.**   
Nyancha ng'umbu   
gati y'ense y'emechando,   
Naria Igoro   
Ense nere botakoira,   
'S'amarig' aratinyigwe   
 Nyancha ng'umbu,   
nyancha y'emerindo,   
naigur' abanchwa   
bakondangeria,   
 (Nyancha ng'umbu   
nyancha nyancha y'emerindo)   
(Naigur'abanchwa 'banchwa   
bakondangeria)   
Bwango natotige emechando,   
Tomenye n'Omonene botambe.   
(Bwango, bwango   
natotige emechando),   
Tomenye n'Omonene botambe.

  **2.**   
Nyancha ng'umbu,   
'S'Omorembe,   
'Bibe n'ense biaetire,   
Emechando yaerire,   
Abarosu batimoke.

  **3.**   
'Yaetire, takoinyorwa,   
Emioy'enyore chinguru;   
Takobao amariga,   
Ase baria batorigwe.

  **4.**   
Nyancha ng'umbu, 'motimoko,   
Yes'arangerie abaye   
Emerindo yaetire,   
'Malaika bagotera.

title: 275 Nchw' As' Omotoria
markdown:
### 275 Nchw' As' Omotoria   

  **1.**   
Nchw' as' omotoria totebana,   
'Ngana riatworokirie enchera;   
Na'are naintwe aiga rero,   
Nkorangeri'are nchwo.   
 Omogoko natoyorore,   
Chinkoro ko chiachenekire,   
Natororane n'Omotoria,   
'S' enk'eyio botambe.

  **2.**   
'Ban' abake igw'eriogi riaye,   
Nkoro chichenge n'omogoko;   
Tomochor' ere ab'oyoito,   
Tagotebana nchwo.

  **3.**   
Rengereria nar' amo naintwe,   
Igw'eriogi riaye oigwere;   
'Gwa ngosoror' ar' ogoteba,   
"'Nw'abana bane nchwo".

title: 276 Ter' Obwanchani Bwa Yeso
markdown:
### 276 Ter' Obwanchani Bwa Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ter'obwanchani bwa Yeso,   
N'amabera, N'obuya   
As'omochie bw'oborabu,   
'Toroseri' obomenyo.   
 Togoi . . . ka Igoro,   
'Mogoko ki orab'eker'ekio;   
Tomoro . . . re Ye . . . so,   
Totere as'obobui.

  **2.**   
Gatore as'orogendo,   
'Mare natub'erioba;   
Korende ko rwaerire,   
kweumia ngokobao.

  **3.**   
Tiga tobe abegenwa,   
Tomokorere rioka;   
Okomorigereria iga,   
natonyor' obogima.

  **4.**   
Gochia bosi' as'ekeegwa,   
Bwango natomorore;   
Egeita nakeigorwe,   
Totar'Omochi'Omuya.

title: 277 Naikir' Ense Y'Omwando
markdown:
### 277 Naikir' Ense Y'Omwando   

  **1.**   
Naikir'ense Y'omwando   
'S'enibo nairwe bosa,   
Ens'eyio tibori koira,   
Omosunte oetire.   
 Ens'engiya, 'Ngiya mono,   
Gantenein' as' egutunwa;   
Nindore Ngumbu Y'enyancha,   
Ase ndoseiri' obomenyo   
Ndoro'engegu Y' obonene,   
'Bomenyo bwane botambe.

  **2.**   
Nintare n'omonen'one,   
tori'emes'engiya nere;   
's'amaig'andae n'okoboko,   
chinsinyo chi'ense ya igoro;

  **3.**   
Gotiok'okuya gokorwa,   
's'ebisicha bitakuoma;   
Bi'emete Yamet igoro,   
'sechinsoko chi'obogima.

  **4.**   
Mariogi'amaya nareo,   
Ay'ogotera kwa igoro;   
'Malaika bagotera;   
Amo nabwo babuire.

title: 278 'Buya Mbore Nka
markdown:
### 278 'Buya Mbore Nka   

  **1.**   
'Buya mbore nka   
k'obwachani boreo,   
'Mogok'oigweke   
k'obwanchani bore nka;   
'Morembe n'omoigoto,   
N'omogoko bibeo,   
Ng'aki ere buya   
k'obwanchani bore nka.   
 'Bwanchani, bore nka,   
Ng'aki ere buya   
k'obwanchani bore nka.

  **2.**   
'Mogoko nyomba   
k'obwanchani boreo,   
Moko tegocha,   
k'obwanchani bore nka;   
Bisicha biam'as'ense,   
As'emegond'emiya,   
Bogima bwagokigwa,   
'Bwanchani nyomba.

  **3.**   
lgor'egoka k'obwanchani   
bore nka,   
Ens'eichorw'obwanchani   
ko bore nyomba;   
Agansoko gatera,   
Igoro ner'eraba,   
k'obwanchani bore nka,   
Yes'agokigwa.

  **4.**   
Yeso nkore mb'oyoo   
bwanchani boche,   
Nsang'ekeng'wanso kiao,   
'Rio twanchane nka;   
Ntimoke korw'obobe,    
Tindengereri 'ebibe,   
'S'obuya nseseneke,   
Bwanchani nyomba.

title: 279 Tenena ase Chiira Chia Yeso
markdown:
### 279 Tenena ase Chiira Chia Yeso   

  **1.**   
Tenena ase chiira chia Yeso,   
Nigo aratogigw'Ere botambe;   
Moterer' Omonene bw'emeganda,   
Tenen' ase chiira chiaye.   
 O-te-ne-ne   
(Tenen'ase chiira   
chi tenen'ase chiira)   
Tenena'ase chiira chi'omonene   
o-to-ne-ne   
(Tenen'ase chiira,   
Tenen'ase chiira)   
Tenen' ase chiira chiaye

  **2.**   
Tenena ase chiira chia Yeso,   
Omobe Saitani tagotema;   
Gochia enchera yaye eria embe,   
Tenen' ase chiira chiaye.

  **3.**   
Tenena ase chiira chia Yeso,   
Mogende n' Er' esegi timorosa;   
Moyeb' emeganda ya Saitan,   
Tenen' ase chiira chiaye.

title: 280 Toumerane N'Abasani
markdown:
### 280 Toumerane N'Abasani   

  **1.**   
Toumerane n'abasani   
as'ens 'engaki egoeta,   
Twaichana korengereria   
ng'a, goika totigane.   
 Ntogotigana Igoro   
titogotigana.   
Ens'engiya y'omogoko,   
titogotigana.

  **2.**   
Twasemeirie 'ker'emeremo   
y 'ens 'ekoera,   
Ntomeny'amo n'abasani   
baito twatiganete.

  **3.**   
Mang'ana y'ogotigana   
takab'as'enk'eri' enyia,   
Toter'amatera y'omogoko   
kare na kare.

title: 281 Gokw' Ase Yeso!
markdown:
### 281 Gokw' Ase Yeso!   

  **1.**   
'Gokw'ase yeso! Nokuya   
ond'ataboke korera;   
Nobotimoker'obuya,   
Botasarigwe n'obobe.

  **2.**   
Gokw'ase yeso! o mbuya   
ase oy'ogosundoka;   
Gotimok'as'okwegena,   
Gosemeria 'sesenirie.

  **3.**   
Gokw'ase yeso! 'Morembe,   
'koboka gosesenirie;   
'Nguru chi'omotoria nchigotangwa   
n' obobe, n'obwoba.

  **4.**   
Gokw'ase Yeso!   
Nobok'egetureri gekobuga;   
Chimbera nachimanoke,   
Baboke tibakwa rinde.

title: 282 Narorir' Ensok'Engiya
markdown:
### 282 Narorir' Ensok'Engiya   

  **1.**   
Narorir'ensok' engiya,   
'Nsok'entamb'eng'are   
Yes'Omonen'ogotoria,   
Ror'amaot'aye.   
 Ndoch'ensoko y'ogosibia,   
Nsoe im'ensibie kegima,   
Baka Tata yansibirie,   
yansibirie, yansibirie.

  **2.**   
Bagim'oboyia bwachire,   
Manying'agokwana;   
Akwan'obobe bosira,   
Ins'as'omorindo

  **3.**   
Ngotara nd'asoborabu,   
kobua ebibe,   
Nkor'enchenu, ang'endabu,   
Nkrist'omenyete ime.

  **4.**   
'Buya bw'ogokumi'ens'aa,   
Manying'aitegete,   
Yeso bweka namanyire,   
Yes'ori'onkwerete.

title: 283 Otobatise, As' Omoik'Oo
284 Yeso Ng'Endagera Y'obogima
markdown:
### 284 Yeso Ng'Endagera Y'obogima   

  **1.**   
Yeso ng'endagera Y'obogima,   
Buna gwakorete ang'e nyancha;   
As'amarik'ao ninkorigie,   
Nkoro nekoganetie, "Ring'ana!"

  **2.**   
Seseni'ekeene namanyire,   
Buna gwaseseneti'omogati;   
'Bosomba bosire n'ebisibo,   
Nyore omorembe ase bionsi.

  **3.**   
'Mang'an'ao Moika n'obogima,   
Ko tindi na nguru chi'okoigwera;   
Naye ogokonywa n'obogima,   
Nganetie nyigwer'amang'an'ao

title: 285 Egetare Ki' Emiaka
markdown:
### 285 Egetare Ki' Emiaka   

  **1.**   
Egetare ki'emiaka,   
Nyebise im' as' ore;   
Amache n'amanyinga,   
Bikorw' omober' oo;   
Bib' eriog' as'ebibe,   
Nkonye korwa ebibe.

  **2.**   
Meremo y'amaboko,   
Tegonkorera gento;   
Nonya n'omokia bwonsi,   
'Mariga naiteka;   
Ase nde 'bibe mbosa,   
Naye bwek' orankonye.

  **3.**   
Tindi koreta gento,   
'Mosalaba ndaimokie;   
Mbosa nde aye mboyie,   
Nakorigereire;   
Ay' ensoko 'bogima,   
Onsibie tinkwa ense.

  **4.**   
Kangokor' orogendo,   
Mobui bw' ababisa;   
Ng'iruruke gochi' are,   
nkoror' As'ekerogo;   
Egetare ki'emiaka,   
Nyebise ime as' ore.

title: 286 Igw' Eriogi Ri'Omorisia
markdown:
### 286 Igw' Eriogi Ri'Omorisia   

  **1.**   
Igw'eriogi ri'Omorisia,   
Korw'eror' Omosunte ime;

Ang'e naye Omonene,   
Basabire obakonye.

  **2.**   
Naintwe bono mogoroba,   
Twachire n'obob'obonge,   
Nonya titokorochi aye,   
Twamanyire nao ore.

  **3.**   
Omotoria seri'obwoba,   
'Bande nabarwaire bare,   
'Bande mbaragwancha buya,   
Abande babosiririe.

  **4.**   
'Nde tari nogotimoka,   
Taiy'otakoreti ebibe   
'Bakogokorera buya   
Beigwa mbanyabibe bare.

  **5.**   
'Koboko kwao nkwa nguru,   
Ng'ana yao tekogwa bosa   
Igwa bono mogoroba,   
Ase obuya togwenie.

title: 314 Ntor'as' Orogendo
markdown:
### 314 Ntor'as' Orogendo   

  **1.**   
Ntor' as' orogendo,   
Kogenda igoro,   
'Bomenyo bw'abaya,   
Mogoko botambe,   
 Timori kogenda?   
Timori kogenda?   
Minto nchwo togendenka   
seito igoro

  **2.**   
Ase ense eria,   
Mbareo 'bachenu,   
Tibari gwechanda,   
Gose gochandeka.

  **3.**   
'Bisieri chindwaki,   
Bikomekameka,   
Mwateba timori,   
Kogenda igoro.

  **4.**   
Nainw'abatayayi,   
Igoro neyaino,   
Mwateba timori,   
Kogenda igoro.

title: 315 Yeso Atotebia Tomoreke
markdown:
### 315 Yeso Atotebia Tomoreke   

  **1.**   
Yeso atotebia tomoreke,   
Bun'etay' ekomoreka botuko;   
Ense nomosunte 'Gotorabe   
agw'as'ore Nainch'ase nde.

  **2.**   
Yeso atotebia tomoreke,   
Arore obororabu tiborima;   
Korwa igor' arora,   
'Gatorabe agw'as'ore   
Nainch'asende.

  **3.**   
Yeso atotebia tomoreke,   
'Mosunt' Oetananire ens'engima;   
'Bibe nobororo, 'Gatorabe   
agw'as'ore Nainch'asende.

title: 316 Abang'ina Bakareta Abana
markdown:
### 316 Abang'ina Bakareta Abana   

  **1.**   
Ker'abang'ina baretera   
Yes'abana,   
'Borokigwa'as'obotindi   
bakabaseria;   
Yes'akarora bagotam-   
'agateba n'obwororo,   
"Aban'abake nabach'ase nde."

  **2.**   
"Nimbaire mbabogori'   
as'egekuba kiane,   
Mb'Omorisia bwe   
ching'ondi tagochiseria;   
Kobarang'e chinkoro chiabo   
mbameny'as'Obonene,   
"Aban'abake nabach'ase nde."

  **3.**   
'Motori'Omuya   
Okoarigani'abana,   
Mbar' abange   
batamanyeti rieta riaye;   
'Motori' Omuya toigwe   
gotogosaba otebe,   
"Aban'abake nabach'ase nde.

  **4.**   
Bwango tig'abanto   
b'ebisaku nechinse,   
Bach'ase Yeso   
batugute chisanamu;   
Nabarab'erio bakomanye   
Nyasae bw'obwanchani.   
Beger'Omotoria bach'as'ore.

title: 317 Nkarora Omonto Orosete
markdown:
### 317 Nkarora Omonto Orosete   

  **1.**   
Nkarora ase enchera,   
Omont'oyom' orosete,   
Akabwati' Omosalaba   
Bun'omogendi omuya;   
Orosire, nechingiki   
chichire obosio bwaye,   
"Ng'ai kwarusi'Omokia"?   
agantebia "Okwegena".

  **2.**   
Na oyomo nkamorora   
Ne ritimo na enguba,   
Akarwana nechinguru   
Eri'anyore egutwa;   
Nonya orosire mono;   
Tachieti kwemurungania,   
"Ng'ai kwarusi' omokia"?   
Agantebia "Okwegena".

  **3.**   
Nar'oyom' otiget'abasani   
Bobosae bwaye,   
'Gatig' esiko n'emegoko   
Atar'as'obokong'u,   
Nony'amatemw'areo 'Koroki-   
'omosasok' obosio,   
"Ng'ai kwarusi'omokia"?   
Aganetebia "okwegena".

  **4.**   
Bun'abaeti as'orogendo   
As'ense'eye yebibe,   
Gochaywa, 'bokong'u, nogosikwa,   
Nonya nas'embera,   
Goika Omogambi ache   
'Toire ntw'abasakore nka,   
"Nki kiabaeire Omokia"?   
Neke gioka, "Okwegena"

title: 318 Abanto Emeganda
markdown:
### 318 Abanto Emeganda   

  **1.**   
Abanto emeganda,   
Ne chianga chindabu,   
Barina ase amare,   
Kogenda Igoro;   
Bakorir'okorwana,   
N'ebibe bi'ens'eye,   
Ebisieri mbimanorwe,   
'Babui basoe.

  **2.**   
Batera Aleluya!   
Ense na Igoro,   
Amariogi y'amakano,   
Arari'obobui;   
Rituko ri'omogoko   
'S'ebitongwa bionsi,   
Emechando n'amakweri,   
Biaerire bono.

  **3.**   
Rituk'erio abaya,   
Nabaumerane,   
Abakwete n'abasani,   
Tibagotigana;   
Amais'onsi ng'arabe,   
Amarig'asire,   
Chintakana nachinyore,   
Abaibori babo.

  **4.**   
Reta ogotereka,   
Ngwakweret'ababe,   
Kora Korika ebuku,   
Inchwo eri'ogambe;   
Ika ay'Omonene,   
'Banto mbaganyete,   
Oroki'ekemanyererio,   
Mogambi Omotoria.

title: 319 Mogambi One
markdown:
### 319 Mogambi One   

  **1.**   
Mogambi one, ninkobake,   
'Bonene nobwao,   
Tinyeb'egutwa y'amagwa,   
Ndae goika Kalwari.   
 Tinyeba Gethesemane,   
Tinyeb'emechando yao;   
Tinyeb'obwanchani bwao,   
Ndae goika Kalwari.

  **2.**   
Nyoroki'embera Kwaraire,   
Buna beumetie;   
'Malaika bakarenda,   
Ekero kwaraire.

  **3.**   
Nainche bun'ere Mariamu,   
Nchiche n'ekeegwa;   
Nyorokie oboina bwasie,   
Ndae goika kalwari.

  **4.**   
Omonene nimbogorie,   
'Mosalaba rioka;   
Nsange emechando yaye,   
Kwambogoreirie onsi.

title: 320 Nkwegenete Omonene Yeso
markdown:
### 320 Nkwegenete Omonene Yeso   

  **1.**   
Nkwegenet' Omonene   
Yeso Aye bweka.   
Nkwegen'as'ogotorek'   
okonene.

  **2.**   
Nkwegenet'as'okwabera   
Ningosasime.   
As'obuya n'amabera amaya,   
Nkwegene.

  **3.**   
Ninkwegenete Ondae   
Naye bweka igo;   
Amatuko onsi   
Nong'isanekie.

  **4.**   
Ninkwegen'ase chinguru   
Chiao chitagwe;   
Amang'ana ao   
Okorua Nabue.

  **5.**   
Nkwegen' Omonene Yeso   
Totiga ngwe nse;   
Ninkwegene rioka   
rioka Botambe.

title: 321 Ntang'ane Omotoria
markdown:
### 321 Ntang'ane Omotoria   

  **1.**   
Ntang'ane Omotoria,   
'Merinda y'obogima;   
Neruma bosio bwane,   
'Bitare nabintuba,   
Bimbise Korw'as'ore,   
Ntang'ane Omotoria.

  **2.**   
Nokirie emerindo,   
Buna ng'ina Omwana;   
'Merindo nekoigwere,   
Korayetebie "Kira,"   
Omogambi bw'enyancha,   
Ntang'ane Omotoria.

  **3.**   
Ngoika ang'e n'engegu,   
's'emerind' ekoruma;   
'sende n'omotimoko,   
Ko nyeegeget' as'ore,   
Ninkoigwe Kogontebia,   
"Toiroka ninkorae."

title: 322 Yeso n'Omotoria Bw'ogokumia
323 Yeso n'Omosani On'are
324 Mbigusuigwe Aria Kaiwari
markdown:
### 324 Mbigusuigwe Aria Kaiwari   

  **1.**   
Bororo, gwechand'okonge,   
Biarosia chinkoro,   
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,   
Yeso nare ang'e.   
 Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,   
Kalwari, Kalwari,   
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,   
Yeso nare ang'e.

  **2.**   
Tigera Yes'onsi rero,   
Bwoba n'ogwechanda,   
Mbigusuigwe aria Kaiwari,   
Yeso nare ang'e.

  **3.**   
Mochandeku Yes'Arora,   
mechando, mariga,   
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,   
Yeso nare ang'e.

title: 325 Ndw' Obosibwa Nas'Emechando
markdown:
### 325 Ndw' Obosibwa Nas'Emechando   

  **1.**   
Ndw'obosibwa nas'emechando   
Nche nachire Yer'as'ore,   
S'obosibore nomogoko   
Yeso nagocheire;   
Ndw'as'Oborwaire 'Rio ngwenigwe   
Ndw'obotaka 'Rio ntenetakigwe   
Ntig'ebibe Nchiche as'ore,   
Yeso nagocheire.

  **2.**   
Ndw'as'obosoku bw'ogosinywa   
Nche nachire Yes'as'ore   
Nyor'Obuya bw'omosalaba,   
Yeso nagocheire;   
Ndw'as'obororo ombogorie,   
Ntimoke nemorindo yense,   
Ndw'as'obokong'u ntere ngoke,   
Yeso nagocheire.

  **3.**   
Ndw'as' obotindi Nogwekaga   
Nche nachire Yes'as'ore   
Erio nkor'okogania Kwao,   
Yeso nagocheire;   
Nyetige meny'as'obwanchani,   
Nyimoke ntig'ogokw'omoyo,   
Nyiruruke buna riruma   
Yeso nagocheire.

  **4.**   
Ndwe as'obwoba bw'amakweri,   
Nche nachire Yes'asore   
'S'omogok' oborabu bwa nka   
Yeso nagocheire;   
Ntam'obosareku ntatebe   
Nyor'omoremb'ase riicho,   
Ndor'obosio bwa'obosera   
Yeso nagocheire.

title: 326 Mbwat' Omorisia
327 Mang'an' Omonw'one
markdown:
### 327 Mang'an' Omonw'one   

Mang'an'omonw'one,   
Nebirengererio bi'enkoro,   
Biancherwe ase ore,   
Naye chinguru n'Omotoria,   
Amen.

title: 328 Ter' Ogotera Okuya
markdown:
### 328 Ter' Ogotera Okuya   

  **1.**   
Ter'ogotera okuya,   
Ret'amasari'amaya;   
Seria omoichano bwonsi,   
'S'ogotogi 'okonene,   
Moterer 'otorendire,   
Koumer'abasani;   
'Riogi riaye ritwegeria,   
Ncher'as'amagor'aye.   
 Tera Ogotera   
'Gotera kw'omogoko;   
(Tera Ogotera)   
Tera Ogotera,   
Koria kw'obobui;   
(Tera Ogotera)

  **2.**   
'S'omogoko ter'orabe,   
Ntoike rituk'erio;   
Twora Hosan'omogoko,   
Erio tomosasime;   
Toter'obonene Bwaye   
'Moki'ebirengererio;   
Teb'omogano o kare,   
Bwanchani bw'ogotoria.

  **3.**   
O mbuya! Tat'Omochenu,   
'S'amabera y'omwaka;   
Gotok'ase ker'enkoro,   
'Gotogia gw'ekeenee,   
O mbuy'Omotori'Omwanchwa!,   
Gontori'as'amanyinga;   
Totweri'Omoik'Omochenu,   
Tung'us'ase Nyasae.

title: 329 Obonene Ase Tata
markdown:
### 329 Obonene Ase Tata   

Obonen' ase Tata, n'Omwana,   
N'Omoik'Omochenu,   
Buna Yar'omochakano,   
Nab'ere goika kare. Amen

title: 330 Borabu Ndae
markdown:
### 330 Borabu Ndae   

  **1.**   
Borabu ndae as' omoichano,   
Ndae rioka,   
Obotuko, ng'arende korwa nka,   
Ndae rioka,   
Ndend' amagoro;   
Timboreti korora egeka,   
Kogoro okomo kong'isane.

  **2.**   
Tinanarete iga, gosaba ng'a,   
Ay'ondae   
Nigo nanchete gochor' ayane,   
Bono ndae.   
Ngancha omogoko ko inde omwoba,   
Nkaenena,   
Toinyor' ayaetire.

  **3.**   
Chinguru chiao chiansesenirie,   
Nchindae rioka   
As'amanani nas' emerindo,   
Goika bokie   
Kobwakire 'Malaika bagoka,   
'Banyanchete ko bansireirie ake.

title: 331 Gosira Korw'ase Yeso
markdown:
### 331 Gosira Korw'ase Yeso   

  **1.**   
Gosira korw'ase Yeso,   
Gochia ase abe;   
Gosira botuko 'Mobaso,   
Gosira aye bweka.   
 Gosira korw'ase Yeso,   
korw'obwanchani bwaye;   
Ng'ora eker'agokorangeria,   
Ngosir'ore korw'as'Are.

  **2.**   
Gosira korw' ase Yeso,   
'Yorakogusuyie;   
Gosira botuko 'mobaso,   
Gosira korwa as'Are.

  **3.**   
Gosira korw' ase Yeso,   
kogenda moeneno;   
Gosira botuko 'mobaso,   
Gochia 'ngongo chi'obobe.

  **4.**   
Gosira korw' ase Yeso,   
Malaika beumia;   
Ning'otera' somogoko,   
korw'as'endib'etambe.

title: 332 Totere Bono
markdown:
### 332 Totere Bono   

  **1.**   
Totere bono totere n'omogoko   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito;   
'Kanisa entigari nero erabue,   
'S'egek'egeke' ntoike seeito.   
 Ee nabo bwango,   
Ee nabo bwango,   
Natoike Igoro,   
Natobaror'abatigari ba Yeso,   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

  **2.**   
Tokore bon'emeremo n'amaboko   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito;   
'Buya bwa Tata nabotoe chinguru,   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

  **3.**   
Abw'abarosu tonyare kobaremia,   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito;   
Natoboroki'abareu obwanchani,   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

  **4.**   
'Mogoko ang'e ore n'ogotima.   
'S'egek'egeke ntioke seito;   
N'amariga takob'as'omochi'oria,   
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

title: 333 Mobake Nyasae
334 Egetunwa Nkere Are
markdown:
### 334 Egetunwa Nkere Are   

  **1.**   
Egetunwa nkere are,   
Getabwati orwaki;   
As'Omonen' abambetwe,   
'Gakwa Atotorie.   
 O ng'aki atwanchete bori,   
Naintwe natomwanche;   
Tosemeri'amanying'Aye,   
Na komokorera.

  **2.**   
Kegima titokomanya,   
'Boror'Anyorete;   
Korende igo twegenete,   
Nintwe Akwerete.

  **3.**   
'Gakwa tonyor'okwaberwa,   
Atokor'abaya;   
Omoeri'Atoire lgoro,   
'Manying'Atotorie.

  **4.**   
Taiy'ond'orenge konyara,   
Goakan'esira;   
Ner'oigoret'egesieri,   
Kia Igoro tosoe.

title: 335 Inwe Abarwani Mweroisie
markdown:
### 335 Inwe Abarwani Mweroisie   

  **1.**   
Intwe abarwani,   
Mbweroisie kegima,   
Mobe noboremu,   
Mogende nomokia.

  **2.**   
Nonya bono segi,   
Mobe nokwegena,   
Oyo 'barangerie,   
Nare amo ninwe.

  **3.**   
Gaki motenene,   
Mobe nokwegena   
Moyetache ense,   
Omosunte bwonsi.

  **4.**   
Gaki motenene,   
Mobe nokwegena   
Moyetache ense;   
Omosunte bwonsi.

  **5.**   
Nabae chiguru;   
mogese kegima,   
Timoba 'batamu;   
Ase 'segi ime.

  **6.**   
Rigori mokobua;   
Ne chinguru chiaye,   
Igoro mogende,   
Nobonene mono.

title: 336 Nar'Omosani Onyanchete
markdown:
### 336 Nar'Omosani Onyanchete   

  **1.**   
Nar'Omosani onyanchete,   
Kobua bonsi ab'ens'eye;   
Nere Kristo Omochenu,   
Omonen'Ere n'oyone.   
 N'oyon'Ar'O . . . mosani oyo,   
Nare ang'e . . . 'Kero gionsi;   
(Nare ang'e 'kero gionsi,   
'kero gionsi);   
Buy'obonge . . . 'moetanaine   
('moetanaine)   
N'amay'onsi Ere n'oyone.

  **2.**   
N'oyon'Are ekiagera,   
Ankweret'erio ntoreke;   
'S'omogoko 'mosasime,   
Nimobak'Ere n'oyone.

  **3.**   
Ig'Ar'oyone ekiagera,   
Are ime y'enkoro yane;   
Bun'orosagia rw'omote,   
Nde ime yay'Ere n'oyone.

  **4.**   
Ituk'erim'ase chinchera,   
Chia Igoro nimoror'Ere;   
K'amboanirie nintere,   
'S'egeturi Ere n'oyone.

title: 337 Mobake Omonda Yeso
markdown:
### 337 Mobake Omonda Yeso   

  **1.**   
Mobake Omonda Yeso,   
Mo'ekengw'anso bono   
Er'otwabeir'ebibe   
Omogwenia oito;   
Momobake, momobake,   
Omogambi botambe.

  **2.**   
Mobake as'obwanchan   
Aorogeti'ens'eye'   
Mobak'Ere botambe,   
Otosibiri'ebibe;   
Momobake, momobake,   
Ner'Oyo bw'ekeene.

  **3.**   
Buna Tat'ogotorenda   
Ere otomanyire,   
Atotaboria rioka   
Korw'ase ababisa;   
Momobake, momobake,   
Abar'ang'e na aare.

  **4.**   
Amalaika mobake,   
Inwe morochaine,   
Erioba n'omotienyi   
Bikomotung'amera;   
Momobake, momobake,   
Yes'Omond'O igoro.

title: 338 Ndater'Ase Yeso
markdown:
### 338 Ndater'Ase Yeso   

  **1.**   
Ndater'ase Yeso, As'obuya bwaye,   
Nigo nkonyora ogosesenigw'as'are;   
Natoter'ase Yeso ekengw'anso kiaye,   
Aiteret'amanyinga Omokonyi one.

  **2.**   
Ndater'ase Yeso amatuko onsi,   
Kondanyare koinyor'obuya bwaye bwonsi;   
Ndater'ase Yeso nony'as'emechando,   
Ere nadende ase amaboko Aye.

  **3.**   
Ndater'se Yeso, Gonkogend'enchera,   
Ning'use orogendo, ng'ike asare;   
Nainche ninsoe egesieri keria,   
Nimoterere Yeso, Igoro botambe.

title: 339 Ense Engiya
markdown:
### 339 Ense Engiya   

  **1.**   
Gochi' as'ens'engiya ng'umbu,   
Malaika bagotera,   
Haleluy'as' Omotoria.   
Hosan' as'Omogambi;   
Togotara noboremu,   
Tokoragwa na Tata,   
Korw'ense y'ebibe   
nobororo goch'ens' engiya.   
 Omogoko togoika,   
Natobeke chigutwa;   
As'ens'eria engiya,   
As'ens'eyi' engiya ng'umbu.

  **2.**   
'Bachenu bande mbachit-   
'asen'eyio riria kare.   
'Ngaki bono yaerire,   
Erio naintwe tosoe;   
Ntogende bosio rioka,   
Tobe nabwo batorigwe,   
Ntotogi' Erieta riaye botamb'   
as'ens'eyi' engiya

  **3.**   
As'ens'eyio obomenyo   
bwarosigw'ase bonsi,   
'Ba begenet' Omotoria   
na koigw'eriogi riaye;   
'Ngaki y'omogoko ngoch'er-   
'Omonen' arachike,   
Toyetig'ense ey'embe,   
Togend' as'ense'eri engiya.

title: 340 Abakoreri B'Enchili
markdown:
### 340 Abakoreri B'Enchili   

  **1.**   
Inyora abaisraeli,   
Bakemurunganeria Musa;   
'Ndamwamu ya Nyasa'egacha,   
Basirera as'eroro.   
 Datani, Kora, Abiiramu,   
'S'endamwamu y'oborai;   
Rikamanoka bakarimera,   
Nekiorokereri'ase tore.

  **2.**   
'Moik'omochenu abarae,   
Timobek'endamwamu bosio;   
As'ogochor'abakoreri,   
Toma Enchili ense yonsi.

  **3.**   
Abachorwa b'obokoreri,   
Timomenya Yerusalemu;   
Mwarangerigwe Makedonia,   
Genda o erio mobakonye.   
 'Monene Yeso'orangerie,   
'Bange bakur'as'ebibe!   
'Manying'abo narigigw'as'ore,   
Otachieti eri'obokonye.

  **4.**   
Mbwachani bwa kerengo ki obo?   
'Monene gokwa igoro yaito;   
Erio tonyare koborigwa,   
'Babe twabeir'abana baye.

title: 341 'S'Emambia Y'okobokigwa
markdown:
### 341 'S'Emambia Y'okobokigwa    

  **1.**   
'S'emambia yokobokigwa,   
getureri nkebuge,   
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.   
'Bachenu mbachenge gocha,   
'mariga takobao, Ntoboke   
(Halleluya! 'mambi eyio Natoboke)   
Ntoboke.   
 (Ntoboke) Halleluya   
(Ntoboke) Amen   
Ntoboke (Halleluya)!   
'S'embambia yokobokigwa   
Ker'amakweri arabugwe,   
Ntoboke   
(Halleluya 'mambi'eyio Natoboke)   
Ntoboke.

  **2.**   
'Semambia yokibokigwa naki'   
Mogand'orabe!   
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.   
Tata, Baba, Banchwa bonsi,   
kero torarorane, Ntoboke   
(Halleluya 'mambi'eyio Natoboke)   
Ntoboke.

  **3.**   
'Semambia yokobokigwa   
'Birengereri'ebiya,   
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.   
Morore Motori 'omwanchwa,   
Bwerwete agankwera, Ntoboke   
(Halleluya' manbieyio Natoboke)   
Ntoboke

  **4.**   
'Semambia yokobokigwa,   
Ntoumeran' amare,   
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Natoboke.   
Ntoirwe as'obonene'   
s'enk'engiy'ekomesa, Ntoboke   
(Halleluya! Mambi'eyio Natoboke)   
Ntoboke.

title: 342 Omochie Omuya zayoni
markdown:
### 342 Omochie Omuya zayoni   

  **1.**   
'Mochi'omuya nore aria ng'umbu,   
'Makweri taiyo nonya mbororo,   
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni   
As'agiy'omogoko botambe   
As'agiy'omogoko botambe,   
 'Mochi'omuya, (Zayoni)   
Zayoni n'omochie bw'abachenu;   
(Zayoni)   
Tomenye o, (Tomenye)   
Tobe n'omogok'omonge mono,   
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni   
Yeso tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni.

  **2.**   
Abarameny'omochi'o Zayoni,   
Mbaria babegete 'yanga ndabu   
Yeso ner'orab'omobaso' obo,   
Botuko mbokoba o naende,   
Botuko mbokoba o naende.

  **3.**   
Nkarigereri'omochi'o zayoni,   
Nkaba n'okogania 'nso'aroro;   
Yes'ombwat' okoboko Onyimokie   
Erio nsoe omoch' O Zayoni   
Erio nsoe omochi o Zayoni   
 Yeso mbwate, (koboko)   
'Koboko nso'omochi'o Zayoni;   
(Zayoni)   
Nyimokie nche (Nyimokie)   
Ng'ikarans'okoboko kwao   
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria (Zayoni x2)   
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni.

title: 343 'S'Eri'eta Ria Yeso
markdown:
### 343 'S'Eri'eta Ria Yeso   

'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso,   
'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso;   
Ntore Nobobui!   
'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso;   
'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso   
Saitani natame!   
'Ng'oratobue Togwatora   
Eriet'eri RINENE?   
Yeso; Yeso; Yeso; Yeso!   
"Ntore N'obobui"

title: 344 'Botuk 'Obochenu
markdown:
### 344 'Botuk 'Obochenu   

  **1.**   
'Botuk'Obochenu,   
'Boser'Oborabu   
Bor'ase ng'ina n'omwana,   
'Mwan'omochenu Omoitongo,   
'Raire n'omorembe,   
'Raire n'omorembe.

  **2.**   
'Botuk'Obochenu,   
'Borabu bwachire,   
'Malaika bagotera;   
Alleluyah 's'omogambi!   
Oiboirw'Omotoria,   
Oiboirw'Omotoria.

  **3.**   
'Botuk'obochenu   
Omwan'o Nyasae,   
'Borabu bwarwa a'sare;   
Bogotori'as'obuya,   
Oiborw'Omonene,   
Oiborw'Omonene.

  **3.**   
'Botuk'obochenu,   
Ng'enang'eni raba   
Totere n'amalaika;   
Alleluya 'Mogambi!   
Oiboirw'Omotoria,   
Oiboirw'Omotoria.

title: 345 Kira Tegerera
markdown:
### 345 Kira Tegerera   

  **1.**   
Kira tegera,   
'Kemonyo nkere,   
Kira tegerera,   
Toigwe ring'ana.   
 Tara ng'or'Omonene   
nao Are aa,   
Tara ng'or'Ateba,   
Tosuke ang'e.

  **2.**   
Kira tegerera,   
N'achenu aas'aa,   
'Matabau atebe   
Ng'ana ri'obuya.

  **3.**   
Kira tegerera,   
Torw'ogosaba,   
Tun'ay'Edeni,   
Tosange amo.

  **4.**   
Kira tegerera,   
Amaber'Aye,   
Kira tegerera,   
Gany'Omonene.

title: 346 Twarema Emegondo
markdown:
### 346 Twarema Emegondo   

  **1.**   
Twarema emegondo,   
Na koyebusura,   
Nyasae orw'embura,   
N'oborendi obuya;   
Areta riberera,   
Areta 'mbokendu,   
'Mbe'engiya n'omobaso,   
N'embura y'okwamia   
 Ebiegw'ebiya,   
Nigoro bikorwa,   
Mbuya, Mbuy' as'Omonene,   
's'obwanchani bwaye.

  **2.**   
Mbuya, Tat'Omwachani,   
As'amaya onsi,   
Risimeka, rigesa,   
'Bogima, 'ndagera;   
Ntobwati ebitorarwe,   
As'obwanchani obo,   
Ko ekioganeti'Aye,   
Ne chinkoro chiato.

  **3.**   
Titokoba'abande,   
Bun'Er'atoeire!   
Tobakony'abanto,   
Kogenda Igoro;   
Torw'esadaka yaito,   
Yangoyi 'abotomwa,   
Bwa Kristo im'as'ense,   
N'ogotoreka bo.

title: 347 Yeso Nguru Chiane
markdown:
### 347 Yeso Nguru Chiane   

  **1.**   
Yeso nguru chiane,   
Nko' ogwenchanda kwane;   
Nkwegen'as'obokanyeku,   
'Gw'ogosaba kwane.

  **2.**   
Ing'enkor'engiya,   
Erio nyeange nche;   
Tintara chinchera chimbe,   
Na tingoki'amabe.

  **3.**   
Ing'enkor'endemu,   
'S'emechando yonsi;   
'Nyoteneni'Omasalaba,   
'Nyorende bokong'u.

  **4.**   
Ing'ogokoiroka,   
N'eriso eriongo;   
Gokorigereria Aye,   
K'ebibe bir'ange.

  **5.**   
Ong'e na Omoika,   
Ore ang'e rioka;   
'Y'orendet'ekero gionsi,   
Ase ogosaba.

title: 348 'Ng'ana y'Omonene
markdown:
### 348 'Ng'ana y'Omonene   

  **1.**   
Ng'ana y'Omonene,   
'Torae botambe   
Oyoriegenete,   
Nanyor'Omogoko.

  **2.**   
'Babisa mbabao,   
Ntonyore chinguru,   
'Ng'ana ri'okoremia,   
'Ret'ogotoreka.

  **3.**   
K'emerind'egocha,   
N'amar'atotuba,   
'Ng'ana riao ribe,   
Eng'ay'as'enchera.

  **4.**   
Ng'oranyare kwera,   
'Mogok'ore naki,   
Oyotwanyorire,   
Korw'ase ring'ana?

  **5.**   
'Ng'ana y'amabera,   
As'abare moyo,   
Rikorw'oboremu,   
Ase abagokwa.

  **6.**   
Gatwamanyire bo,   
Obochenu bwaye;   
Togwanch'Omonene,   
Tobe naye rioka.

title: 349 Yes'otorangeirie
markdown:
### 349 Yes'otorangeirie   

  **1.**   
Yes'Otorangeirie Korwa,   
'S'egeturi gi'ens'eye;   
Botambe nkorangeri'are,   
"Omokristo ntunyana".

  **2.**   
Naki aborokigwa baye,   
Mbaigwet'okorangeria;   
Bagatig'ebinto bionsi,   
Babakorer'abande.

  **3.**   
'Torangeirie totige   
gosasim'emegwekano;   
Ateba "Mokristo nyanche   
mono kobua ense".

  **4.**   
'S'amatuko yomogoko.   
Nonya nay'emechando;   
Arangeria, "Omokristo;   
Nyanche mono kobua"

  **5.**   
'Torangeiri'as'amabera,   
Tokony'erio tokoigwe;   
Tokoigwere na kogwancha,   
Togokorere buya.

title: 350 'Malaika A Ayasaye Bamenye
markdown:
### 350 'Malaika A Ayasaye Bamenye   

  **1.**   
Malaika a Nyasaye bamenye;   
Ang'e ange, ang'e naintwe;   
Nabakonye abegeni; Botambe.   
 O rire ri'omorero,   
rire ri'omorero,   
Ntang'ana inche botambe   
O rire ri'omorero,   
rier ri'omorero,   
Ntang'ana goika igoro.

  **2.**   
Emechando ker' as' enchera   
Natokonye, natokonye;   
Natonyor' obotamero As'Are.

  **3.**   
As' orogendo rwaito rwonsi,   
Omonene, Omonene,   
Natotang'ane botambe As'ens'eye.

title: 351 'Moe Yes'ebibe Biane
markdown:
### 351 'Moe Yes'ebibe Biane   

  **1.**   
'Moe Yes'ebibe biane,   
'Ng'ondi ya Nyasae,   
'Bibogori'antimokie,   
Korw'as'emechando.

  **2.**   
'Moe 'Kogania Kwane,   
Oyo bw'oboikeranu,   
Angwenia Oborwaire,   
Abori'omoy'one.

  **3.**   
'Moe 'bororo bware,   
N'ogwechanda gwonsi,   
Nansibore Korwa o,   
'Sange nainche onsi.

  **4.**   
Nganetie mobwekane,   
'Mwororo, 'moitongo   
Ngwekane buna Yeso,   
Omwan'O Nyasae.

title: 352 'Monene Ituko Riaerire
markdown:
### 352 'Monene Ituko Riaerire   

  **1.**   
'Monene ituko riaerire,   
Obotuko bwaikire;   
Natokobake n'ogotera,   
'Motimok'osesenirie.

  **2.**   
Twairaneirie buya'as'ore,   
'Kanisa yao terairi;   
Nig'erendete'as'ens'engima,   
'Botuko n'omobaso bo,

  **3.**   
Igor'as'ebisinka bionsi,   
Boira, bwakia kera rituko;   
'Riogi ri'ogosaba ndiereti,   
Nonya neriogokobaka.

  **4.**   
Borwoti bwao mbokoera.   
Buna amanda y'ens'eye;   
Mbokine rioka goika Kare,   
Bana bao bair'omwando.

title: 353 Nimenye As' Egetunwa
markdown:
### 353 Nimenye As' Egetunwa   

  **1.**   
Nimenye as' egetunwa,   
As' omobaso 'muya;   
'Mochie bw'obuya obonge,   
Aase ay'omogambi.   
Ens' ere n' omoik' omuya,   
Ebisicha bikwama,   
Ase engegu y'ensoko,   
bitari kwoma rinde.

  **2.**   
Natonywe 'mache 'chinsoko,   
Ense 'nyia toramenye;   
Amache ay'obogima   
Tonywe toisaneke;   
Titokoba na erang'o,   
Gose 'gwechanda konde   
Gatwanyorire emonga,   
Etari gosareka.

  **3.**   
Moinyore 'mosalaba,   
'Monene abambetwe,   
Ase emechando y'ense,   
Atworokie enchera;   
Monene 'torangeirie,   
Yoimokie 'mosalaba,   
Nakoroseirie 'nchera,   
Oraike Igoro.

title: 354 Oyo Nere, Ngoik' Are
markdown:
### 354 Oyo Nere, Ngoik' Are   

  **1.**   
Oyo mere, ngoik' are,   
Oria orwet' ense;   
'Malaika bamokobe,   
Koirana naende;   
Haleluya!   
Rituko riaye ng'ang'e.   
Haleluya!   
Rituko riaye ng'ang'e.

  **2.**   
Intwe twensi, tomorore,   
Kagoika n'amare;   
'Banto babe bairoke,   
Mbamokorete bobe;   
Nabarer,   
Bakomorora ense.   
Nabarere,   
Bakomorora ense.

  **3.**   
Rituko erio agocha,   
Toumeran' Igoro;   
Na barabwo babokire,   
Nbwo nabaonchoke;   
'Banto 'bande,   
nogokwa baganyete.   
'Banto 'babnde,   
nogokwa baganyete.

  **4.**   
Amakweri, n'oborwaire,   
Nabiere kegima;   
Obwanchani n'omogoko,   
Nabomenye as'ense;   
Haleluya!   
Tonyore omorembe.   
Haleluya!   
Tonyore omorembe.

  **5.**   
Intwe twensi natomenye,   
As'obosio bwao;   
Chinguru chionsi nobwate,   
Obutore ekina;   
Nchuo 'Monene!   
Intwe abanto bao!   
Nchuo 'Monene!   
Intwe abanto bao!

title: 355 'Kwegena Kw'Abatata
markdown:
### 355 'Kwegena Kw'Abatata   

  **1.**   
'Kwegena kwa abatata!   
Nonya bachandetwe moko,   
Chinkoro chiaito chiagoka,   
Gotwaigure ring'an erio,   
Okwegena ogochenu!   
Ntwegene goik' amakweri.

  **2.**   
'Batata ase chichela   
'Basibor' ase chinkoro,   
Mogoko ki abana babo,   
Baisa gokwa bun'abaise,   
Okwegena ogochenu!   
Ntwegene goik' amakweri.

  **3.**   
'Kwegwena kwa aoatat!   
Ntwanch' abasani, babisa,   
Ntorandie Yeso kobua;   
'S'obogima n'amang'ana,   
Okwegena ogochenu!   
Ntwegene goik' amakweri.

title: 356 Agwo Kare Yes'Omwanchani
markdown:
### 356 Agwo Kare Yes'Omwanchani   

  **1.**   
Agwo kare Yes'Omwanchani,   
Akoroki'ense obonene Bwaye,   
Akarina etiger'emori,   
Agw'abana bagatera, Hosana.   
 Hosan'Asare, Hosan'Aleluya;   
Otocheir'as'Erieta ri'Omonene,   
'S'Are Hosana 'bare igoro mono;   
Kristo n'Omwan'o Daudi, Hosana.

  **2.**   
Oyi'Omorwoti obachire,   
Nere Omworor'okworokereria,   
Akarina etiger'emori,   
'Banto bakarabi'enchera, Hosana.

  **3.**   
Tiger'ekagenda igor'ase chianga,   
N'amat'amakendo bamwarerete,   
Omochi'omogi'ogategokana,   
Ng'oyio mogotogiamono, Hosana.

  **4.**   
'Bagak'emioyo yabo ten miya,   
Tibancheti baegwe ogosikwa,   
Bateba teri buy'Omonene,   
Baigwe buna bagotera, Hosana.

  **5.**   
Ogotogia kogaikeranigwa,   
Nab'abana bagotera Hosana,   
Ogotogia kogaikeranigwa,   
Nab'abana bagotera, Hosana.

title: 357 Nyasae Oito N'orwaki
markdown:
### 357 Nyasae Oito N'orwaki   

  **1.**   
Nyasae oito norwaki,   
Nguba nekerwanero,   
Natokonye korw' obobe   
obwo bwatobuire;   
Omogambi bw' obobe   
Oimokereirie igoro,   
Bong'ainereri' obonene   
'bekire 'kero eke;   
As' ens' etari mosani.

  **2.**   
Ntokonyara kwerwanera,   
Bwango nigo toraitwe,   
'Monto nar' ogotokonya,   
Nyasae bwek' omorure;   
Mwaboria ning'o 'yo?   
n'kristo Yes' akorokwa;   
Omwan' o Nyasae;   
Bweka, onde tari,   
Orabue 'se 'segi.

  **3.**   
Nebirecha bikaer' enseye,   
'Ganyete gotosiria,   
Titwayabeka 'moyo ime,   
Titogotobua 'ntwe;   
'Mogambi 'gosaria.   
Naba bun' arabe,   
Takonyara nonya,   
Nakio erikeire;   
"Ring'ana" narimoite.

  **4.**   
Biblia se chinguru chiabo,   
Tageka tekoera,   
'Nki 'nkeba goikebue,   
Nyasae arigete bweka;   
Nachitour' obogima,   
Nibo, bana, Nyomba,   
Ng'eria yabo nenke;   
Bionsi nabisire o   
Nyasae otigare.

title: 358 Ari'As' Obweri
markdown:
### 358 Ari'As' Obweri   

  **1.**   
Ari'as'obweri borere mbwareo,   
Omwan'oyo Yeso nao araire,   
Ching'enang'eni chikamomoreka,   
Ase Yes'arareret' obonyansi.

  **2.**   
Chiombe chikwana chiatura Omwana,   
Ko Omwana Yeso tari korera;   
Nche ningwanchete Yeso ndigererie,   
Mbesie Yeso goika mambia bokie.

  **3.**   
Mbere ang'Omonene nasabire,   
Ombwate, Onyanche nagosabire;   
Osesenie abana orendete,   
Nario toragwener' agwo igoro.

title: 359 Natotere Bono Buya
markdown:
### 359 Natotere Bono Buya   

  **1.**   
'Natare bono buya,   
Ogotera ok'obuya,   
Yeso Obuete ebibe,   
Otokorire boronge.   
 Okobua, ebinto bionsi,   
Tera ig'abanto bonsi,   
Yeso Obuete ebibe,   
Otokorire boronge.

  **2.**   
Nonya twanyor'as'ens'eye,   
'Mechando n'ogotemwa,   
Ring'an'eri narisane,   
Otokorire boronge.

  **3.**   
Na Ka Yeso andangeirie,   
Kogenda Igor'as'are,   
Nin'ter'ogoter'okoyia,   
Otokorire boronge.

title: 360 Tom'Omobaso
markdown:
### 360 Tom'Omobaso   

  **1.**   
Tom'omobaso, 'mobas' omuya,   
Omorek'ens'oseri'emechando,   
Abaminto bonsi baganyete;   
Tom'omobas'omuya.   
 Tom'omobas'omuya,   
Tom'omobas'omuya,   
Tom'omobaso, tom'omobaso;   
Tom'omobas'omuya,

  **2.**   
Tom'omobaso chinsa chionsi,   
Mbare n'enchera ase ring'ana;   
Simeka chimbusuro chingiya;   
Tom'omobas'omuya

  **3.**   
Tom'omobaso rituko rionsi,   
Ebisio nabisoe ase nde   
Onde Tatoa tatiga Yeso,   
Tom'omobas'omuya.

  **4.**   
Tom'omobas'emiaka yonsi;   
Goika Yes'airane ase ense,   
Erio twensi natogende Igoro,   
Tom'omobas'omuya.

title: 361 Intw' Abarwani b'Omonene
markdown:
### 361 Intw' Abarwani b'Omonene   

  **1.**   
Intw'abarwani b'Omonene,   
Oyore nokobua,   
Twarir'eira y'okorwania,   
Mobere n'ebibe.   
 Bon'Omonene natokonye   
Toserie Saitani;   
Bon'Omonene natokonye   
Toserie saitani.

  **2.**   
'Bamonto mwensi motenene,   
As'ebender'eye,   
Togende amo n'Omonene,   
Omorwoti o igoro.

  **3.**   
'Kemanyererio twanyorire,   
'Kero ki'ebatiso,   
Bamura n'abaiseke mwensi,   
Moinyore Kristo.

  **4.**   
Timwancha mobe abasomba   
B'omorwoti bw'ense,   
'Moik'O Nyasae nabarae,   
Timorengereria.

  **5.**   
Mogende amo n'ogosaba,   
Moramoki'amaiso,   
'Motemi bw'ens'eker'agocha,   
'Nyore morendete.

title: 362 Ning'o Bw'Omonene?
markdown:
### 362 Ning'o Bw'Omonene?    

  **1.**   
Ning'o bw'Omonene, ning'ore ang'e?   
Abanto barigetie kogend'esegi;   
Ning'o origeti'aret'abamwabo,   
Bache gokonyeka tibacha gosira?   
 Ogokonya nokwao n'obuya bwonsi,   
Ogokonya nokwao n'obuya bwonsi;   
Ntob'ensemo yao 'Monene botambe.

  **2.**   
Tindigeti'obonene gos'ogosikwa.   
Gatwasoir'egonde ya Yes'Omuya;   
Intwe n'obwanchani bwatoretire!   
Oyorangerigwe Oyio noyoye.

  **3.**   
Agatogora tari n'edhahabu.   
Rigori'ri'amanyinga eri'ogokumia;   
Yes'otoichoiri'Omoik'Omochenu,   
Twatigir'ebibe, Nabaye tore.

  **4.**   
Esegi nendoro tiga torore,   
Oyorayebu'egonde y'Erwoti;   
Nse as'ebendera twatenenire,   
Nao torabuere na'omorembe.

title: 363 Omoy'one Igwa
markdown:
### 363 Omoy'one Igwa   

  **1.**   
Omoy'one oki' etaya yao,   
Buya tongia bwang'aiga tari mwao;   
Chinguru chi' ense chionsi chireo,   
Igorabue chionsi, koranche Yeso.

  **2.**   
'Mobisa Saiatani chinguru chiaye,   
Yeso ochibuire nogokwa   
'Nguru tori, tori 'moremu,   
Aye nomwororo, mwororo mono.

  **3.**   
Imoka ne mambia obotong'ane,   
Saba mono, tur' emiaka yonsi   
Esegi nekare, obe namaiso,   
Oboe ne chinguru chisonsi chia Iso.

  **4.**   
Omonene Yeso nere Omorisia,   
'Ng'ana y'omonene nokobua   
Igoro naete nense naende   
'Ng'ana y'omonene ig'eragende.

title: 364 Omonene Ng'ang' Are Gocha
markdown:
### 364 Omonene Ng'ang' Are Gocha    

  **1.**   
Omonene ng'ang' Are gocha,   
'Banto bateba;   
Ng'enang'eni chiarimire,   
Nebe ogokia kwe rituko.   
 Ee neb'gokia kwe rituko!   
Ee nebi'Ogokia kwe rituko!   
'Botuko mboere, rituko richiche;   
Ee neb'ogokia Kwe rituko.

  **2.**   
Ebimanyererio biabeire,   
Risase n'omotienyi;   
'Kurat'as'abanto bonsi,   
Ogocha kw'Omonene ng'ang'e Kore.

  **3.**   
N'eng'aki as'ekanis'enganyi,   
Gotig'obweanchi;   
Korenda, gwokia chitaya,   
Baganye rituko rigokia.

  **4.**   
Genda bwango as' ebinchera,   
N'epar'enene bo;   
Ranger'ebirema, 'meuko,   
Babe ang'ase rituk'erio.

title: 365 Yeso Omonene Nyigwa
markdown:
### 365 Yeso Omonene Nyigwa   

  **1.**   
Yeso Omonene nyigwa,   
'Go ndasir'ontankonyeti;   
Ong'obuya bwa'Obonge,   
Naboigo ng'ira.

  **2.**   
Nche n'omonyen'ebibe,   
'Manyinga'o nyegenete;   
Kondach'as'ore, tokwanga,   
Naboigo ng'ira.

  **3.**   
Okoegwa kw'ogokonyeka,   
Komanya nindengererie;   
Ndich' as'ore rebisanyi,   
Naboigo ng'ira.

  **4.**   
As'origetie gontoma,   
Ntoma nainche nindegende;   
Ime na isiko n'obuya,   
Naboigo ng'ira.

  **5.**   
As'origetie ong'e buya,   
Ng'a n'obwanchani oboyia;   
Ime na Isiko boichore,   
Naboigo ng'ira.

  **6.**   
Erio esegi ekoera,   
Nyuma okobua gokoera;   
Nao abwo ndakorere,   
Naboigo ng'ira.

title: 366 Natogende Intwe  Twensi
markdown:
### 366 Natogende Intwe  Twensi   

  **1.**   
Natogende intwe twensi,   
as' emeremo yaye   
Natokore nomogoko,   
ne chinguru chionsi,   
'banto bonsi baganyete,   
as' ogokonywa gwaito,   
Natobatang'ane bona,   
enchera y'Omonene.   
 Nchwo togend', as' omogondo,   
as' emeremo yaye,   
Nonya 'meke, gos' emenge,   
ninyekore nomokia,   
'Banto bonsi, nimbakonye,   
nobwanchani, nobuya,   
Nchwo 'Monene, nkonye bono,   
nkore emeremo yane.

  **2.**   
Natogende, aborokia,   
as enyomba ya Nyasae,   
Toborokie abanto bonsi,   
chingencho chia Nyasae,   
Titokwa Moyo,   
as' ense tiga tosabe mono,   
Erio natong'use abange,   
ase Omokonyi Oito.

  **3.**   
Natokonye Abakristo,   
as' emeremo yaye,   
Kabe ang'e koyeimokia,   
'mesigo 'merito,   
Tab'ang'e gochiimokia   
'gurube chindito,   
Natoike seito bori,   
as' Obonda bwa Yeso.

title: 367 Togw'as'amatemwa
markdown:
### 367 Togw'as'amatemwa   

  **1.**   
Togw'as' amatemwa,   
Kogwa nebibe,   
Korabu'okomo,   
Nobu'ayande;   
Orwane gesacha,   
Tiga 'ngencho chimbe,   
Rigeria Yeso,   
Nagokony'obue.   
 Saba Omotoria,   
Akaoe chinguru,   
Nanchet' agokonye,   
Nagokony'obue.

  **2.**   
Tig'abant'ababe,   
chinkwana chimbe,   
'Rieta ria Nyasae,   
Risike mono;   
Nach'ebiri'ebiya,   
Ob'omoitongo,   
Rigereria Yeso,   
Nagokony'obue.

  **3.**   
Er'oyorobabue,   
Nonyor'egutwa,   
'S'okwegena ntobue,   
Nonya tokogwa;   
Er'Omotori'oito,   
Naratokong'ie,   
Rigereria Yeso,   
Nagokony'obue.

title: 368 'Kero Kia Botuko Gati
markdown:
### 368 'Kero Kia Botuko Gati   

  **1.**   
Kero kia botuko gati,   
Malaik' agatera,   
Ogotera Kw'Obonene,   
'Makan'echahabu;   
'Morembe n'obuy'as'ense,   
Korw'ase Nyasae,   
Ense egakira eigwe,   
Malaik' agotera.

  **2.**   
Naende abande bagacha,   
'Maganda ya Igoro,   
'Gotera okwo gokaigweka,   
'b'ense yarosire;   
Igoro y'ebitii ebio,   
Bakairurukao,   
'Riogi riabo nikaigweka   
as'ens'ey'embe.

  **3.**   
'Ba more inse y'egurube,   
'Ba mwaisire gokwa,   
Mwechandete as'enchera,   
Y'emechand'emenge;   
Rora engaki y'obuya,   
Ngoch'er 'as' obwango,   
Timok'as'encher' ensemo,   
Moigwe bagotera.

title: 369 Nomwegene Yeso
370 Orogendo Rwa Yeso
markdown:
### 370 Orogendo Rwa Yeso   

  **1.**   
Orogendo rwa Yeso,   
Mogoko noyoino,   
Motunyane Yeso   
Oino Imanweli.

  **2.**   
Koborab'obororo,   
Tari ban'obwaye,   
Enchera mogoeta,   
Nero aetete.

  **3.**   
'Mosalaba O Yeso,   
Nainwe moimokie,   
N'engata abegetwe,   
Nainwe negwenerete.

  **4.**   
Ogwanch'okwo okwaye,   
Mobe nakorokwo,   
Na Obwanchani bwaye,   
Boikaranse nainwe.

  **5.**   
Chingencho mwakorerwe   
mwanche igo nomokia,   
Mwensi morek' enchera   
igo bun' etaya.

  **6.**   
'Bororo n'emekono,   
N'emechando Yaino;   
Ogotemwa ao ao,   
Goika ogokwa kwaino.

  **7.**   
Yonsi nero eng'eria,   
Bun'Ere anyorete,   
Nebe buna obororo,   
Igoro korw'ense.

  **8.**   
Orogendo rwa Yeso,   
Rigereria Igoro;   
'Mechando Y'ense'eye,   
Nyebue asare.
